messages.content: Yaar mujhe samajh nahi aa raha calculus ka concept kaise revise karu. Kal test hai aur main bilkul blank feel kar raha hoon.

Hmm kal test hai aur calculus abhi tak clear nahi hai, yeh toh stressful hai yaar. Blank feel hona make sense karta hai jab concepts dhundhle lagte hain. Kya tumne basics ek baar quickly dekhe hain ya directly hard problems try kar rahe the?
I have three assignments due this week and I haven't even started one. I keep procrastinating and now I'm panicking.

Three assignments at once and you haven't started - no wonder you're panicking. Procrastinating and then feeling this pressure is such a tough cycle. What's making it hardest to begin? Is there one assignment that feels more overwhelming than the others?
Mere professor ne mujhe class mein call kiya aur main answer nahi de paya. Sab ke saamne embarrass ho gaya yaar.

Arey yaar sab ke saamne answer na de paana really embarrassing hai, I totally get it. Wo moment kaafi uncomfortable raha hoga tumhare liye. Kya tumhe wo topic samajh mein aaya tha pehle ya suddenly blank ho gaye the?
I got 45% in my mid-semester exam. I studied so hard but still failed. I don't know what I'm doing wrong.
You studied so hard and still got 45% - that must feel really defeating. It feels like your effort didn't pay off at all. How did you prepare - through notes, textbook, or some other way?
Yaar group project mein koi kaam nahi kar raha aur presentation parso hai. Main akela sab kuch kaise karun?

Presentation parso hai aur sab kuch tumhare upar aa gaya hai, yeh toh bohot unfair aur frustrating hai yaar. Akela handle karna feels like too much. Kya tumne group ko remind kiya hai ya wo log respond hi nahi kar rahe?
My parents think I'm not studying enough but I'm literally studying 8 hours a day. They don't believe me.

You're studying eight hours daily and they still think it's not enough - that must feel really frustrating. It's like your effort isn't being seen at all. Are they worried about your results or do they generally doubt what you tell them?
maine poori raat padhai ki lekin subah exam mein sab kuch bhool gaya tha dimag hi khaali ho gaya tha

Poori raat padhai karne ke baad bhi exam mein sab bhool jaana bohot heartbreaking hai yaar. Dimag khaali hone ka feeling really scary hai. Kya exam hall mein jaake nervous ho gaye the ya pehle se hi neend ki kami thi?
I don't understand anything in my statistics class. The professor explains too fast and I'm too scared to ask questions.

The professor explains fast and you're scared to ask questions - that's making it really hard to keep up. Not understanding and then falling behind is such a helpless feeling. Are other students in class also struggling or does it feel like just you?
Yaar library mein sab log padh rahe hain aur main social media scroll kar raha hoon. Mujhe focus hi nahi ho raha.

Library mein dekh ke sab focused hain aur tum scroll kar rahe ho, yeh tumhe guilty aur zyada stressed feel kara raha hoga. Focus na hona jab tum actually padhna chahte ho, bohot frustrating hai yaar. Kya dimag mein bahut saare thoughts chal rahe hain ya bas energy nahi hai?
mujhe lagta hai main apne batchmates se bohot peeche reh gaya hoon sab mujhse acha kar rahe hain

Lagta hai tum peeche reh gaye ho aur sab tumse better kar rahe hain, yeh comparison tumhe bohot weigh down kar raha hai. Peeche rehne ka feeling itna heavy hai. Kya kisi specific subject mein ya overall feel ho raha hai tumhe aisa?
Yaar assignment deadline kal hai aur maine abhi tak sirf introduction likha hai. Pura project pending hai.

Kal deadline hai aur sirf introduction ready hai, yeh toh bohot stressful situation hai yaar. Pura project pending hone ka pressure samajh sakta hoon. Kya tumhe idea clear hai ki kya likhna hai ya planning mein hi stuck ho?
I failed my viva today. The panel kept asking questions I couldn't answer and I just froze.

You failed the viva and froze when the panel asked questions - that sounds really overwhelming. Freezing in those moments happens when pressure gets too intense. Did you know the material but couldn't recall it, or were the questions completely unexpected?
Mera attendance short hai aur professor ne warning de di. Agar aur classes miss kiye toh exam nahi de paunga.
Attendance short hai aur warning mil gayi, ab exam dene pe bhi risk aa gaya hai. Yeh tension toh hogi hi. Kya health issues ki wajah se miss hua tha ya kuch aur reasons the?
Everyone in my batch is doing internships and publishing papers. I haven't even started anything.

Everyone around you is doing internships and publishing while you haven't started - that comparison must feel really heavy. It's like you're watching everyone move ahead. What's been holding you back from starting - lack of opportunities or something else?
Yaar mera lab report galat ho gaya aur marks cut gaye. Maine procedure follow kiya tha phir bhi wrong results aaye.

Lab report galat ho gaya aur marks cut gaye jabki tumne procedure follow kiya tha - yeh toh unfair lag raha hoga yaar. Wrong results aane pe confusion bhi hoti hai. Kya professor ne explain kiya ki kahan mistake hui ya bas marks deduct kar diye?
My roommate studies half the time I do but still gets better grades. I don't understand what I'm doing wrong.

Your roommate studies less but scores better - that must feel so frustrating and confusing. It's like your effort isn't translating into results. How do you usually study - do you focus on understanding concepts or mostly memorizing?
mujhe lecture samajh nahi aata kyunki professor sirf slides padhte hain aur explain nahi karte kuch bhi

Professor sirf slides padhte hain aur explain nahi karte, isse lecture samajhna mushkil ho jata hai. Yeh frustrating hai jab concepts clear na ho. Kya tum baad mein khud se padhne ki koshish karte ho ya classmates se help lete ho?
Yaar mere notes incomplete hain aur kisi se maangne mein sharam aa rahi hai. Exam paas aa raha hai.

Notes incomplete hain aur maangne mein sharam aa rahi hai jabki exam paas hai - yeh double pressure hai yaar. Sharam feel hona natural hai but yeh tumhare prep ko affect kar raha hai. Kya koi close friend hai class mein jisse comfortable feel hoga puchne mein?
I have back-to-back exams for five days straight. I don't know how I'll prepare for all of them.

Five days of back-to-back exams without a break - that's an exhausting schedule. Not knowing how to prep for all of them must feel really overwhelming. Which exam are you most worried about, or is it the sheer volume that's stressing you out?
mera presentation achha nahi gaya aur professor ne sab ke saamne criticize kar diya bohot bura laga

Presentation achha nahi gaya aur sab ke saamne criticize hona bohot bura lagta hai yaar. Public criticism ka feeling really uncomfortable hai. Kya unhone specific feedback diya ya bas generally criticize kiya?
Yaar mujhe coding assignment mein error aa raha hai aur debug nahi ho raha. Submission kal hai.

Coding assignment mein error stuck hai aur kal submission hai - yeh bohot frustrating hota hai yaar. Debug na hona aur time pressure dono saath mein aa gaye. Kya error message samajh aa raha hai ya completely confusing hai?
I studied the wrong chapters for today's test. I wasted three days preparing completely useless material.

You studied the wrong chapters and wasted three days - that must feel devastating. All that effort on material that won't even be tested is so disheartening. How did the mix-up happen - unclear syllabus or miscommunication?
Mere seniors ne bola tha yeh subject easy hai lekin mujhe bohot difficult lag raha hai. Shayad main hi stupid hoon.

Seniors ne easy bola tha lekin tumhe difficult lag raha hai, aur ab lag raha hai shayad tum hi problem ho - yeh self-doubt bohot hard hai yaar. Har kisi ka experience alag hota hai subjects ke saath. Kaunsa part specifically tough lag raha hai tumhe?
My thesis guide is never available for meetings. I keep emailing but get no response and my deadline is approaching.

Your guide isn't available and doesn't respond to emails while your deadline approaches - that's so stressful and frustrating. Feeling stuck without guidance when time is running out is really hard. Have you tried reaching out through other channels or speaking to someone else in the department?
Yaar online classes mein mera internet connection itna kharab hai ki main proper attend nahi kar pata. Phir recordings bhi clear nahi hoti.

Internet connection kharab hai toh online classes properly attend nahi ho pati aur recordings bhi clear nahi hain - yeh double problem hai yaar. Miss hone ka tension alag hota hai. Kya college mein physically jaane ka option hai ya alternatives explore kiye tumne?
I can't afford the textbooks for this semester. The library copies are always issued and I'm falling behind.

You can't afford textbooks and library copies aren't available - that's putting you at a real disadvantage. Falling behind because of something out of your control must feel really unfair. Have you checked if there are PDF versions online or if seniors have old copies they could lend?
mujhe practical exam mein instrument use karna nahi aata tha aur examiner ke saamne fail ho gaya bohot embarrassing tha

Practical exam mein instrument use nahi aata tha aur examiner ke saamne fail hona bohot embarrassing hai yaar. Wo moment mein pressure aur uncomfortable feeling dono hote hain. Kya tumhe pehle practice karne ka mauka mila tha ya seedha exam mein hi use karna tha?
Yaar mera best friend mujhse zyada marks la raha hai aur ab comparison hone laga hai ghar pe. Relationship mein bhi tension aa gayi.

Best friend zyada marks la raha hai aur ghar pe comparison ho raha hai, ab friendship mein bhi tension hai - yeh toh kaafi painful situation hai yaar. Comparison aur relationship dono affect ho rahe hain. Kya tumne apne friend se baat ki hai ya avoid kar rahe ho abhi?
I got accused of cheating in an exam even though I didn't. Now there's a disciplinary hearing and I'm terrified.

You got accused of cheating when you didn't and now there's a hearing - that must be absolutely terrifying. Being wrongly accused of something serious like this is so stressful. Do you have any evidence or witnesses who can support your side of the story?
mere paas padhne ke liye koi quiet jagah nahi hai ghar pe shor bohot hota hai aur hostel nahi mil raha

Ghar pe padhne ke liye quiet jagah nahi hai aur hostel bhi nahi mil raha - yeh concentration ke liye bohot mushkil hai. Shor mein focus karna tough hota hai. Kya paas mein koi library ya cafe hai jahan tum thode time ke liye padh sakte ho?
Yaar mera GPA itna gir gaya hai ki scholarship cancel ho sakti hai. Parents ko afford nahi hoga fees.

GPA gir gayi hai aur scholarship risk mein hai, aur parents afford nahi kar paayenge - yeh toh bohot heavy pressure hai yaar. Financial stress aur academic stress dono ek saath aa gaye. Kya abhi bhi GPA improve karne ka koi chance hai ya already decided hai?
I don't understand why I need to study subjects that have nothing to do with my career goals. It feels pointless.

Studying subjects unrelated to your career goals feels pointless - that disconnect can make it really hard to stay motivated. When things don't make sense, effort feels wasted. Which subject specifically feels most irrelevant to you right now?
Mere teacher ne mujhe class se bahar nikal diya kyunki main late aa gaya tha. Ab attendance bhi miss ho gayi.

Late aane pe class se bahar nikal diya aur attendance bhi miss ho gayi - yeh toh double punishment jaisa lag raha hoga. Publicly nikalna embarrassing bhi hota hai. Kya yeh pehli baar hua ya regular late jaate ho?
I have to choose between studying for exams and completing a major project. Both are due the same week.

Exams and a major project both due the same week - having to choose between them is such an impossible position. Both feel equally important and urgent. Which one do you think will impact your grades more if you don't give it enough time?
Yaar mera handwriting itna kharab hai ki teacher ko read nahi hota. Marks kat dete hain isiliye.

Handwriting kharab hai aur teacher marks kaat dete hain - yeh toh unfair feel hota hoga jab content sahi ho. Presentation ke liye penalize hona frustrating hai. Kya tumne typed assignments submit karne ki permission maangi hai kabhi?
My lab partner never shows up and I end up doing all the work alone. But we both get the same grade.

Your lab partner never shows up but gets the same grade as you - that's so frustrating and unfair. Doing all the work alone while someone else takes credit is really demotivating. Have you mentioned this to your instructor or tried talking to your partner first?
mujhe practical file submit karni thi aaj lekin ghar pe bhool gaya ab late submission pe marks kam ho jayenge

Practical file ghar bhool gaye aur ab late submission pe marks kam honge - yeh last minute realization bohot stressful hai. Bhoolne ka guilt aur marks loss dono feel ho raha hoga. Kya aaj hi wapas jaake laane ka option hai ya kal hi submit kar sakte ho?
Yaar chemistry lab mein experiment fail ho gaya aur sab log successfully complete kar gaye. Mujhe hi samajh nahi aaya.

Chemistry lab mein experiment fail ho gaya jabki sabne successfully complete kiya - yeh feel karna ki sirf tum hi nahi samjhe, bohot isolating hai yaar. Self-doubt bhi aata hai aise mein. Kya TA se help maangi thi ya khud hi try karte rahe?
I missed an important announcement about exam date change and now I'm not prepared at all.

You missed the announcement about the exam date change and now you're unprepared - that's such a sinking feeling. Finding out last minute that you have less time than expected is really panic-inducing. How much time do you actually have before the exam now?
mera project review kal hai aur abhi tak kaam adhoora hai mentor se meeting bhi nahi ho payi hai

Project review kal hai aur kaam adhoora hai, aur mentor se meeting bhi nahi hui - yeh triple pressure hai yaar. Guidance ke bina incomplete kaam present karna stressful hai. Kya tum jo bhi hai usko present kar paoge ya adhoora status hi dikhana padega?
Yaar mere department mein favouritism bohot hai. Kuch students ko hamesha zyada marks milte hain chahe kaam kaisa bhi ho.

Department mein favouritism hai aur kuch students ko hamesha zyada marks milte hain - yeh dekhna bohot demotivating hai yaar. Mehnat ka value na hona unfair lagta hai. Kya yeh ek teacher ke saath hai ya pura department mein?
I can't concentrate during online exams at home. There's too much noise and distractions everywhere.

Online exams at home with all the noise and distractions make it impossible to concentrate - that's such a tough situation. Taking exams seriously when your environment isn't exam-like is really hard. Is there any other quiet space you could go to during exam times?
Mere coaching teacher ne bola main IIT nahi crack kar paunga. Ab confidence hi nahi raha.

Coaching teacher ne directly bola tum IIT crack nahi kar paoge aur ab confidence chala gaya - yeh sunna bohot hurtful hai yaar. Teacher ka negative comment impact karta hai. Kya unhone koi specific reason diya ya bas demotivate karne wali baat thi?
I failed the same subject twice now. I don't know if I should drop out or try again.

Failing the same subject twice and now questioning whether to continue - that's such a heavy decision to face. Repeated failure can make you doubt everything. What's making this subject so difficult for you - the content itself or the way it's taught?
Yaar group study mein sab apna kaam discuss karte hain lekin mujhe exclude kar dete hain. Akela feel hota hai.

Group study mein sab discuss karte hain lekin tumhe exclude karte hain - yeh toh bohot lonely aur hurtful hai yaar. Academic isolation aur social rejection dono ek saath. Kya unhone kabhi reason bataya ya bas ignore karte hain?
My college changed the syllabus mid-semester and now I have to relearn everything in two weeks.

They changed the syllabus mid-semester and now you have to relearn everything in just two weeks - that's completely unfair and overwhelming. Having your preparation invalidated like that is so frustrating. Are they at least providing new resources or just expecting you to figure it out?
mera laptop crash ho gaya aur usme saari assignment files thi backup nahi thi ab kya karun

Laptop crash ho gaya aur saari assignment files usme thi bina backup ke - yeh toh nightmare situation hai yaar. Saara kaam ek second mein chala jaana bohot devastating hai. Kya koi recovery option try kiya tumne ya completely gone hai data?
Yaar online proctored exam mein software ne mujhe flag kar diya suspicious activity ke liye. Maine kuch galat nahi kiya tha.

Proctored exam software ne tumhe flag kar diya jabki tumne kuch galat nahi kiya - yeh toh bohot scary aur unfair hai yaar. False accusation ka stress alag level ka hota hai. Kya unhone specifically bataya ki kaunsi activity suspicious thi?
I have a presentation tomorrow and I still don't understand the topic properly. I'm going to embarrass myself.

Presentation tomorrow and you still don't understand the topic - that fear of embarrassing yourself is really strong right now. Not feeling prepared makes that anxiety even worse. What part of the topic is most confusing to you?
mujhe scholarship interview mein bohot achha karna hai lekin public speaking se darr lagta hai kya karun

Scholarship interview mein achha karna zaroori hai lekin public speaking se darr hai - yeh pressure aur fear dono ek saath hain. Darr hona natural hai jab stakes itne high ho. Kya tumne pehle kabhi interview practice kiya hai ya yeh pehli baar hoga?
Yaar mere classmatesne group bana liya exam prep ke liye lekin mujhe invite nahi kiya. Excluded feel ho raha hai.

Classmates ne group banaya aur tumhe invite nahi kiya - yeh toh bohot hurtful aur isolating hai yaar. Excluded feel hona especially exam time pe aur bhi tough hai. Kya pehle bhi aisa hua hai ya yeh pehli baar hai?
I can't memorize formulas no matter how many times I write them. My brain just refuses to retain anything.

You keep writing formulas but your brain isn't retaining them - that's so frustrating when effort isn't translating to results. Memory blocks like this can feel really defeating. Are you trying to memorize them in isolation or do you understand how they work?
Mere dost sab placement prep kar rahe hain aur main abhi bhi semester subjects mein struggle kar raha hoon.

Dost placement prep kar rahe hain aur tum abhi semester subjects mein struggle kar rahe ho - yeh comparison bohot heavy feel hota hoga. Lag raha hoga tum peeche reh gaye ho. Kya subjects clear karne ke baad placement sochoge ya dono saath mein karna padega?
My professor gave me a C grade even though I worked really hard on the paper. No feedback, just a grade.

You worked really hard but got a C with zero feedback - that's so demotivating and confusing. Not knowing what went wrong makes it impossible to improve. Have you considered asking your professor for specific feedback on what could have been better?
Yaar library mein seat nahi milti aur ghar pe padhne ka environment nahi hai. Kahan jaakar padhu samajh nahi aa raha.

Library mein seat nahi milti aur ghar pe environment nahi hai - yeh toh catch-22 situation hai yaar. Padhne ki jagah na hona concentration ko aur mushkil bana deta hai. Kya college mein koi aur empty classroom ya area hai jahan baith sakte ho?
I got sick right before finals and missed a week of prep. Now I'm trying to catch up but it feels impossible.

You got sick and missed a whole week of prep right before finals - that timing is just brutal. Trying to catch up while probably still recovering feels overwhelming. Which subjects are you most behind in right now?
mujhe practical exam mein pass hone ke liye external examiner ko impress karna padega lekin mera concept weak hai

Practical exam mein external examiner ko impress karna hai lekin concept weak hai - yeh double pressure hai yaar. Weak foundation ke saath perform karna stressful hota hai. Kya basics quickly revise karne ka time hai ya directly practical pe focus karna padega?
Yaar mera research paper reject ho gaya conference mein. Itni mehnat ki thi uspe.

Research paper reject ho gaya conference mein aur tumne itni mehnat ki thi - yeh toh bohot disheartening hai yaar. Rejection ke baad saara effort waste jaisa lagta hai. Kya reviewers ne koi feedback diya tha ya bas reject kar diya?
I don't have anyone to study with. All my friends are in different courses and I feel so alone in this.

You don't have anyone to study with and your friends are all in different courses - that academic loneliness is really hard. Going through tough subjects alone without support makes it even harder. Have you tried connecting with people in your own course or online study groups?
mera term paper topic change karna pad raha hai kyunki koi data nahi mil raha ab time bhi kam hai

Term paper topic change karna pad raha hai kyunki data nahi mil raha aur time bhi kam hai - yeh frustrating aur stressful dono hai. Saara previous kaam bhi waste ho gaya lagta hoga. Naya topic already socha hai ya wo bhi dhundhna padega?
Yaar mera tuition teacher bohot fast padhate hain aur main notes bhi nahi bana pata properly. Sab kuch miss ho jata hai.

Tuition teacher fast padhate hain aur notes properly ban nahi paate - yeh toh double problem hai yaar. Pace follow na kar paana aur notes incomplete hona dono frustrating hai. Kya tumne unse thoda slow karne ko bola hai ya uncomfortable feel hota hai bolne mein?
I submitted my assignment on time but the portal didn't register it. Now they're saying it's late.

You submitted on time but the portal didn't register it and now they're calling it late - that's so unfair and frustrating. Technical issues causing you problems when you did everything right is really stressful. Do you have any proof of submission like a screenshot or confirmation email?
Mere parents ko lagta hai engineering easy hai kyunki unke time mein tha. Meri struggle ko seriously nahi lete.

Parents ko lagta hai engineering easy hai kyunki unke time mein thi aur tumhari struggle ko seriously nahi le rahe - yeh invalidation bohot hurtful hai yaar. Apni problems minimize hoti dekh ke aur bhi akela feel hota hai. Kya tumne unhe batane ki koshish ki hai ki ab sab kuch different hai?
I failed my driving test three times and now I'm scared I'll fail my semester exams too. Everything feels like failure.

Failing your driving test three times and now fearing you'll fail exams too - that pattern of failure is making you doubt everything. When one thing goes wrong, it's easy to think everything will. Are your semester preparations actually going poorly or is this more about the fear itself?
Yaar coaching mein test series mein mera rank itna neeche aa gaya hai. Sab mujhse aage nikal gaye hain.

Coaching test series mein rank bohot neeche aa gayi hai aur lag raha hai sab tumse aage nikal gaye - yeh comparison aur rank drop dono heavy hai yaar. Rank dekhke confidence bhi hit hota hai. Kya difficulty level badh gaya hai ya preparation mein kuch gaps aa gaye hain?
My mental health has been affecting my grades but I'm too scared to tell anyone or ask for help.

Your mental health is affecting your grades but you're scared to reach out - that's such a difficult position to be in. Struggling alone while things get worse is really heavy. What's making you most scared about asking for help - the stigma or fear of how people will react?
mujhe semester ke beech mein pata chala ki main wrong elective le liya hun ab change bhi nahi kar sakta

Semester ke beech mein pata chala galat elective le liya aur ab change bhi nahi ho sakta - yeh realization bohot frustrating hai yaar. Pura semester ek subject mein lagana jo useful nahi hai, demotivating hota hai. Kya yeh subject bahut tough hai ya bas interest nahi hai?
Yaar mera junior college friend ab top university mein hai aur main yahan struggle kar raha hoon. Comparison se bach nahi pata.

Junior college friend top university mein hai aur tum yahan struggle kar rahe ho - yeh comparison bohot painful hai yaar. Social media pe unki life dekh ke aur bhi bura lagta hoga. Kya tum dono abhi bhi baat karte ho ya distance ho gaya hai?
I have to redo an entire semester because I failed by just two marks in one subject. It feels so unfair.

Redoing an entire semester because you failed by just two marks - that's absolutely devastating and feels incredibly unfair. Being so close yet having to repeat everything is brutal. Did you try appealing for a recount or grace marks at all?
mere teacher ne mujhe principal ke paas complain ke liye bhej diya kyunki maine homework nahi kiya tha ab parents ko bhi bulaya jayega

Teacher ne principal ke paas bhej diya homework nahi karne pe aur ab parents ko bhi bulayenge - yeh escalation bohot scary hai. Chhoti baat badi ho gayi lagta hoga. Kya pehle bhi homework miss hota tha ya yeh ek baar hua tha?
Yaar mera WiFi itna slow hai ki online lectures buffer hote rehte hain. Important parts miss ho jate hain.

WiFi slow hai aur lectures buffer karte rehte hain toh important parts miss ho rahe hain - yeh toh bohot frustrating technical problem hai yaar. Connectivity issues ke wajah se peeche rehna unfair lagta hai. Kya college mein physically attend kar sakte ho ya compulsory online hai?
I don't understand my professor's accent and I'm too embarrassed to keep asking them to repeat things.

You can't understand your professor's accent but feel too embarrassed to keep asking - that's making learning really difficult. Missing content because of language barriers is so frustrating. Do other students seem to understand or are they struggling too?
Mere college mein infrastructure itna kharab hai ki proper labs nahi hain. Practical skills kaise develop karun?

College infrastructure kharab hai aur proper labs nahi hain toh practical skills develop karna mushkil ho raha hai - yeh system failure hai yaar. Facilities na hone se tumhara learning affect ho raha hai. Kya online alternatives ya kisi aur jagah practice karne ka option explore kiya hai?
I got put in a group with people who don't communicate. They just ghost all messages and do nothing.

Your group members ghost all messages and don't do anything - that's so frustrating when your grade depends on them too. Carrying a group project alone is exhausting. Have you told your instructor about the situation or are you trying to handle it yourself?
Yaar mera study schedule bilkul nahi chal raha. Plan toh bahut achha banata hoon par follow nahi ho pata.

Study schedule achha plan banate ho par follow nahi ho pata - yeh gap planning aur execution mein bohot common hai yaar. Plan kaam nahi karna guilt bhi lata hai. Kya schedule bohot ambitious hai ya execution mein hi problem aa rahi hai?
My exam got rescheduled to a date when I have two other exams. Now I have three exams in one day.

Your exam got rescheduled and now you have three exams in one day - that's completely unreasonable and overwhelming. Having to prep for three subjects with that kind of time crunch is brutal. Can you request a different date or is it fixed?
mujhe lagta hai main padhai ke liye bana hi nahi hun sabko aasani se samajh aata hai mujhe nahi

Lagta hai tum padhai ke liye bane hi nahi ho kyunki sabko aasani se samajh aata hai - yeh self-doubt bohot painful hai yaar. Comparison mein apne aap ko incapable feel karna heavy hota hai. Kya har subject mein struggle hai ya kuch specific areas mein?
Yaar teacher ne mera answer sahi tha phir bhi galat mark kar diya. Jab bola toh kehte hain mera galat hi tha.

Answer sahi tha par teacher ne galat mark kiya aur maan bhi nahi rahe - yeh toh unfair authority use hai yaar. Apna case prove na kar paana powerless feel karata hai. Kya kisi aur teacher ya HOD se baat kar sakte ho ya unka final decision hai?
I need to maintain a certain GPA for my visa but I'm falling behind. The pressure is unbearable.

You need a certain GPA for your visa and you're falling behind - that's not just academic pressure, it's your whole future at stake. The weight of that must be absolutely crushing. How far below the requirement are you right now?
mere ghar wale mujhe doctor banna chahte hain par mujhe biology bilkul pasand nahi hai ab kya karun

Ghar wale doctor banna chahte hain par tumhe biology pasand nahi hai - yeh conflict bohot stressful hai yaar. Apni pasand aur family expectations ke beech phasna tough position hai. Kya tumne unse apni actual interest ke baare mein baat ki hai kabhi?
Yaar mera semester project partner ne last moment pe chod diya. Ab akela pura kaam karna padega.
Arre yaar last moment pe partner ne chod diya, that's so messed up. Akela itna saara kaam handle karna is such a heavy burden. You must be feeling both angry and overwhelmed right now.
I keep getting distracted by my phone while studying. Even when I put it away, I keep thinking about checking it.
Phone distraction is so real, even when it's not physically there. That constant mental pull to check it makes studying feel impossible. Sounds like your mind just won't settle.
Mere teacher ka teaching style mere learning style se bilkul match nahi karta. Samajh hi nahi aata.

Teaching style aur learning style match nahi kar rahi, that disconnect makes everything so much harder yaar. You're trying but the way they teach just doesn't work for you. Bohot frustrating hota hai jab effort lag rahi ho par results nahi aa rahe.
I can't afford the expensive software my course requires. Everyone else has it but I'm stuck with free alternatives.

Not being able to afford the software while watching everyone else have it - that financial barrier is really unfair. You're already working harder just to keep up. Must make you feel left behind through no fault of your own.
mujhe class presentation dena hai par stage fright itna zyada hai ki bolte waqt awaaz kaanp jati hai
Stage fright itni strong hai ki awaaz hi kaanpne lagti hai, that physical reaction is so scary. Presentation dena hi stressful hai aur upar se yeh fear. You're feeling really vulnerable about this.
Yaar chemistry ke numerical mujhse solve hi nahi hote. Concept samajh aata hai par apply nahi kar pata.

Concept samajh aa raha hai par numerical solve nahi ho rahe, that gap between understanding and doing is so frustrating yaar. Theory mein sab clear hai par practice mein stuck ho jate ho. Want to talk about what happens when you try solving them?
My classmates formed study groups but nobody invited me. I feel invisible and excluded from everything.

Being left out of study groups when everyone else is included - that invisibility hurts. You're watching everyone connect while you're on the outside. That kind of social exclusion makes everything feel lonelier.
Yaar online exam mein internet disconnect ho gaya beech mein. Ab kehte hain mera attempt count ho gaya.
Internet ki wajah se attempt count ho gaya, that's completely out of your control and so unfair yaar. Technical problem ki penalty tum ko mil rahi hai. You did nothing wrong but still being punished.
I don't know how to ask for help without looking stupid. Everyone else seems to understand everything easily.

That fear of looking stupid is keeping you stuck while everyone else moves forward. You're suffering in silence because asking feels too risky. The isolation of not understanding and not being able to ask is really heavy.
mere dost ko scholarship mil gayi par mujhe nahi mili ab ghar pe paiso ki bohot tension hai
Dost ko scholarship mili aur tumhe nahi, aur ab financial tension bhi hai ghar pe. That comparison plus the money stress is a double hit. Feeling like you fell short when it matters so much.
Yaar professor ne mera project idea reject kar diya bina reason bataye. Ab naya sochna padega.

Project idea reject ho gaya without any explanation, that dismissal without feedback is so demotivating yaar. You put thought into it and got nothing back. Must feel like your effort didn't even matter enough for a proper response.
I have severe test anxiety. Even when I know the material, I freeze during exams and forget everything.

Test anxiety so bad that you freeze even when you know the stuff - that's absolutely terrifying. Your mind goes blank and all that preparation just vanishes. The fear itself becomes bigger than the actual exam.
Mere coaching mein sab toppers hain aur main average hoon. Har din comparison hoti hai.

Coaching mein surrounded by toppers and daily comparison happening - that constant measuring yourself against others is exhausting yaar. Average feel karna jab everyone is exceptional makes you question yourself every single day.
My younger sibling is doing better academically than me. My parents keep comparing us and it hurts.

Your younger sibling outperforming you and parents constantly comparing - that hits different when it's family. Being measured against someone you love makes the pain sharper. Those comparisons from your own parents cut deep.
mujhe har subject mein minimum 75 percent chahiye placement ke liye lekin abhi 60 par hoon

Placement ke liye 75 chahiye aur abhi 60 pe ho, that gap between where you are and where you need to be is stressing you out. Your future opportunities feel like they're slipping away with each percentage point.
Yaar class mein sab mere se notes maangte hain par exam mein mujhse zyada marks laate hain. Unfair lagta hai.

Log tumse notes lete hain but then score better than you, that feels like such a betrayal yaar. Your hard work is helping everyone else succeed while you struggle. Using you and then leaving you behind hurts. Do you want to talk about how to handle this?
I'm on academic probation and if I fail one more course, I'll be expelled. The pressure is crushing me.

Academic probation with expulsion hanging over your head - that's a crushing weight to carry. One more mistake and everything falls apart. Living with that level of pressure every single day must be suffocating.
Yaar mera concentration bohot kam ho gaya hai. Padhte waqt dimaag kahin aur chala jata hai.

Concentration bilkul chali gayi hai aur mind keeps wandering, that loss of focus makes studying feel pointless yaar. You sit with books but nothing actually goes in. That mental fog is really frustrating.
My college doesn't have proper faculty for my specialization. We're basically teaching ourselves everything.

No proper faculty and you're all just teaching yourselves - that's not what you signed up for or paid for. Feeling abandoned by the system that's supposed to support you. You're working twice as hard just to get basic education.
mujhe lagta hai main apna time waste kar raha hun is course mein par ab change bhi nahi kar sakta

Feeling like you're wasting time in this course but trapped with no way to change - that's such a heavy realization. Stuck doing something that feels meaningless with no escape route. The regret and helplessness both sitting together.
Yaar mere parents ko lagta hai main phone pe time waste karta hoon par main actually lectures attend kar raha hota hoon.

Parents ko lagta hai phone pe time waste ho raha hai jabki tum actually lectures attend kar rahe ho, that misunderstanding is so frustrating yaar. Tumhari actual mehnat ko phone addiction samajh rahe hain. Unka trust na hona hurts when you're genuinely trying.
I studied the entire wrong chapter for my test tomorrow. I just realized and now it's too late to prepare properly.
You studied the wrong chapter and realized too late - that sinking feeling must be awful. All that time and effort on something completely useless. Now you're unprepared with no time left to fix it.
Mere college mein ragging ho rahi hai seniors se. Padhai pe focus nahi ho pa raha kyunki darr lagta rehta hai.

Seniors se ragging ho rahi hai aur darr lagta rehta hai, that fear is completely taking over everything yaar. Padhai pe focus karna impossible hai jab safety ka concern hai. You're living in constant anxiety.
My professor humiliated me in front of the entire class for asking a question. Now I'm scared to participate.
Professor humiliated you publicly for just asking a question - that's so wrong and hurtful. Now you're too scared to even participate. That one moment has made the classroom feel unsafe for you.
mera hostel roommate pure din loud music bajata hai padh nahi pata main kuch bhi
Roommate pure din loud music bajata hai aur padh nahi pata, that constant noise is making studying impossible. Apne hi room mein peace nahi mil rahi. You're stuck with no quiet space of your own.
Yaar mujhe lab mein experiment karne mein bahut time lagta hai. Sab jaldi complete kar lete hain aur main last tak rehta hoon.

Lab mein sabse zyada time lagta hai aur tum hamesha last tak rehte ho, that visibility of being slower than everyone hurts yaar. Everyone finishing while you're still struggling makes you feel inadequate. The pressure of being watched while you work is tough.
I have dyslexia but my teachers don't believe it's real. They think I'm just making excuses for being lazy.

Teachers dismissing your dyslexia as laziness - that invalidation of something real you're dealing with is incredibly painful. They're punishing you for a condition you can't control. Being called lazy when you're actually struggling twice as hard must feel so unfair.
Mere batch mein sirf main hi single attempt mein clear nahi kar paya exam. Bohot embarrassing hai.

Poore batch mein sirf tum hi single attempt mein clear nahi kar paye, that isolation and embarrassment is so heavy yaar. Everyone moved forward except you. Feeling left behind jab sab celebrate kar rahe hain hurts differently.
My mental health medication makes me drowsy and I can't focus during morning classes. But I can't skip the meds either.

Medication keeping you drowsy during classes but you can't stop taking it - you're stuck between your health and your education. Neither choice works and you're losing either way. That impossible situation must feel so draining.
mujhe scholarship interview mein english mein baat karni padegi par meri english weak hai bohot nervous hoon

Scholarship interview english mein hai aur tumhari english weak hai, that language barrier is adding so much extra stress. Already interview nerve-wracking hai aur upar se language ki tension. Apni capability prove karna hi mushkil lag raha hoga.
Yaar mera best friend ab mere saath nahi padhta kyunki usko lagta hai main usse neeche khichta hoon.

Best friend ne padhna band kar diya kyunki use lagta hai tum usse pull down karte ho, that rejection from someone so close cuts deep yaar. Friendship hi khatam ho gayi academic competition ki wajah se. Being seen as a burden by your own friend is painful.
I can't sleep the night before exams. I just lie awake worrying about failing and disappointing everyone.

Sleep completely disappears before exams because the worry just takes over. Lying there imagining failure and disappointing everyone - that spiral of anxiety is exhausting. You're already tired before the exam even starts.
Mere college ka syllabus itna outdated hai ki industry mein koi use hi nahi hai. Time waste ho raha hai.

Syllabus itna outdated hai ki industry mein kaam ka nahi hai, that realization that you're learning irrelevant stuff is so demotivating yaar. Mehnat lag rahi hai par future ke liye useless hai. Feeling like your education has no real value is disheartening.
I got caught looking at my notes during an open book exam by mistake. Now they might fail me for cheating.

You looked at notes during an open book exam by honest mistake and now facing cheating allegations - that's terrifying. One innocent error might cost you everything. The punishment feels way too harsh for what actually happened.
mera handwriting itna kharab hai ki teacher ne answer hi nahi check kiya aur zero de diya

Handwriting kharab hone ki wajah se answer check hi nahi kiya aur zero mil gaya, that's completely unfair punishment for presentation. Content sahi tha par readability ki wajah se fail. Effort ko recognize hi nahi kiya gaya.
Yaar mera ek subject mein backlog aa gaya hai. Ab agli semester mein extra load hoga aur stress double ho jayega.

Backlog aa gaya hai aur ab agli semester double load sambhalna padega, that compound stress is already feeling overwhelming yaar. Peeche reh gaye ho aur ab catch up karna aur bhi mushkil ho gaya. The burden just keeps growing.
My parents spent all their savings on my education and I'm failing. The guilt is eating me alive.

Parents spent everything on your education and you're failing - that guilt must be absolutely crushing. Feeling like you're wasting their sacrifice and hard-earned money. The weight of their expectations plus their financial loss is unbearable.
Mere teacher ne mujhe example ke taur pe use kiya class mein ki kaise nahi karna chahiye. Bohot bura laga.

Teacher ne tumhe negative example banaya class ke saamne, that public humiliation is so damaging yaar. Sabke saamne failure ki example banna makes you want to disappear. That shame is going to stay with you for a while.
I don't have access to basic resources like printer and scanner. Everything has to be handwritten and it takes forever.

No access to printer or scanner means everything takes three times longer. You're working harder just to submit in the right format while others do it easily. That resource disadvantage is putting you behind before you even start.
mujhe practical file banana hai par mera experiment successful nahi hua tha ab jhooth likhna padega

Experiment fail hua tha par practical file mein successful results likhna padega, that ethical dilemma plus the academic pressure is tough. Jhooth likhne ka guilt aur fail hone ka darr dono saath hain. System hi tumhe dishonest banne pe majboor kar raha hai.
Yaar professor ne bola tum is subject ke liye made nahi ho. Ab confidence hi nahi raha.

That's such a harsh thing to say, and I'm sorry you had to hear it. Teachers can be wrong about students, trust me. One person's opinion doesn't define what you're capable of. You're allowed to struggle and still succeed yaar.
I missed the exam because I overslept. My alarm didn't go off and now I might fail the entire course.

That panic of missing an exam is real. Oversleeping happens, you're human. Talk to your professor immediately, explain what happened, ask if there's any way to take a makeup exam. Most are understanding if you're honest and act fast.
Mere dost mujhe distract karte hain padhte waqt par unhe ignore bhi nahi kar sakta. Friendship kharab ho jayegi.

Friendship important hai but your studies matter too yaar. Real friends will understand when you need space to focus. Try setting boundaries - unhe bata do ki certain hours you need to study. If they get it, great. If not, that says something.
My parents compare me to my cousin who's studying at IIT. It makes me feel like a failure every single day.

Constant comparison, especially to family, hurts differently. You're not a failure just because someone else is at IIT. Everyone has their own path and timing. Your worth isn't measured by where you study. That comparison is unfair to you.
mera assignment copy ho gaya kisi aur se teacher ne dono ko zero de diya par maine khud likha tha

Tumne khud likha tha par zero mil gaya kyunki coincidence se match ho gaya, that's really unfair. Agar proof hai ki tumne independently kiya tha, teacher ko dikhao. Timeline, drafts, kuch bhi jo prove kare. Don't let this go quietly.
Yaar mujhe har exam se pehle pet kharab ho jata hai anxiety ki wajah se. Physically sick feel hota hoon.

Anxiety showing up physically is really common yaar, but that doesn't make it any easier. Your body is reacting to stress. Try breathing exercises before exams, eat light. If it keeps happening, maybe talk to someone about managing exam anxiety properly.
I have to choose between attending my internship or going to class. Both are mandatory and I can't do both.

Being forced to choose between two important things is impossible. Talk to both - your college and internship supervisor. Explain the conflict. Most times there's some flexibility if you communicate early. Don't suffer in silence trying to do both and burning out.
Mere marks dekh ke relatives taane maarte hain family functions mein. Ab jaane ka mann nahi karta.

Relatives ka unnecessary commentary is the worst part of family functions yaar. Unki validation ki zarurat nahi hai tumhe. Your marks don't define you. If it gets too much, it's okay to skip some gatherings for your mental peace.
I borrowed money from a friend for exam fees and now I can't pay them back. They keep asking and I feel horrible.

Money issues with friends get messy fast. Be honest with them about when you can pay back. Most friends will understand if you're upfront. Avoiding them will only make it worse. Come up with a realistic timeline and stick to it.
mujhe samajh nahi aa raha continue karu ya drop year lu competitive exam ke liye bohot confused hoon

Drop year lena ya continue karna is a huge decision. Think about what you really want, not what others expect. Drop saal dedication maangta hai. Are you ready for that? Talk to people who've done it. Don't rush this decision.
Yaar mera presentation kal hai aur main abhi bhi slides nahi banaya. Procrastination control hi nahi ho raha.

Procrastination is frustrating when you know you should be working. But beating yourself up won't help right now. Open your laptop, make one slide. Just one. Sometimes starting is the hardest part. You can do this yaar, ek ek slide banao.
I failed the same subject twice. Everyone keeps asking why I can't just pass it and I don't have an answer.

Failing twice feels like you're stuck in a loop. People asking about it just adds pressure. Sometimes a subject just doesn't click, and that's okay. Maybe try a different approach this time - tutor, study group, different resources. You'll get through it.
Mere college mein politics bohot hai. Wrong group ke saath dikh gaye toh professors bhi differently treat karte hain.

College politics affecting your academics is really unfair yaar. You're there to study, not deal with group drama. Keep your head down, focus on your work. Document everything if the treatment gets worse. Your education shouldn't suffer because of politics.
My anxiety gets so bad during presentations that my hands shake visibly. People have started noticing and commenting.

Visible anxiety during presentations is tough, especially when people comment. But here's the thing - most audiences are more supportive than you think. Practice helps, even if it's just in front of a mirror. The shaking doesn't make your content any less valuable.
mujhe pata nahi kya padhu kya chodu syllabus itna bada hai aur time kam bas overwhelmed feel ho raha hai

Bada syllabus aur kam time is overwhelming hai. Sabse pehle prioritize kar - most important topics pehle. Past papers dekh, pattern samajh. Sab kuch cover karna impossible hai toh smart padhna padega. One topic at a time, panic mat kar.
Yaar teacher ne mujhe class monitor bana diya but I don't want this responsibility. Studies pe focus nahi ho pa raha.

Extra responsibility jab nahi chahiye tab mil jaaye, that's frustrating yaar. If it's affecting your studies, politely tell the teacher you can't manage both. Your education comes first. Most teachers will understand if you're honest about it.
I'm the first person in my family going to college. The pressure to succeed is crushing because everyone's watching.

Being the first in your family is both exciting and terrifying. That pressure is real - you're carrying everyone's hopes. But remember, you're also figuring this out as you go. It's okay to not be perfect. You're already doing something brave.
Mere notes phone mein the aur phone kho gaya. Sab kuch chala gaya aur exam paas aa raha hai.

Phone kho jaana aur usmein saara data hona is a nightmare yaar. But panicking won't help. Classmates se notes maango, photos le lo. Ya teacher se extra copies maango. Time hai toh recover kar sakte ho. Don't give up yet.
My professor said I'm not smart enough for research. Now I don't know if I should even apply for grad school.

One professor's opinion shouldn't decide your entire future. Maybe they're wrong, or maybe you just need more preparation. If research is what you want, don't let one person's doubt stop you. Get other opinions, build your skills, and apply anyway.
mera attendance itna kam hai ki exam dene nahi denge ab kya karu bohot darr lag raha hai

Attendance kam hone ki wajah se exam se rok dena is really scary. Dean ya HOD se baat kar, medical certificate ya valid reason de sakte ho toh de. Sometimes they make exceptions. Don't assume it's over, try karne mein kuch jaata nahi.
Yaar mere batchmate ne mera idea copy karke apna project bana liya. Teacher ko bhi usne pehle present kar diya.

Someone stealing your idea and presenting it first is such a betrayal. That's plagiarism yaar. If you have proof - messages, drafts - show your teacher. Don't let someone else take credit for your work. Stand up for yourself.
I got a C grade after working really hard. My friends got As without even trying. Life feels unfair.

Working hard and not seeing results while others breeze through - that's incredibly frustrating. But grades don't always reflect effort or ability. Maybe your approach needs tweaking, not your effort. Don't compare yourself to others, focus on your own growth.
Mere ghar mein koi nahi hai jo meri padhai mein help kar sake. Sab uneducated hain aur main akela struggle kar raha hoon.

Not having academic support at home makes everything harder yaar. But you're doing this on your own, and that's actually really strong. Find study groups, use online resources, library jaao. You're not alone even if it feels that way.
I have to choose my specialization but I have no idea what I want. Everyone else seems so sure of their future.

Not knowing what you want when everyone else seems decided is stressful. But most people are just as confused, they're just better at hiding it. Take time to explore, talk to seniors, try different things. It's okay to not have it all figured out yet.
mera scholarship ka result aane wala hai agar nahi mila toh college chodna padega financially afford nahi kar sakte

Scholarship ka result pending hona aur uske upar itna kuch depend karna is terrifying. Financial stress is real. But result aane tak negative mat socho. Agar nahi mila, toh backup options dekho - education loan, part time work. Give up last option hai.
Yaar senior students ne bola ye professor bohot strict hai aur fail karta rehta hai. Ab uski class mein darr lagta hai jaane se.

Seniors ki baatein sun ke darr lagna natural hai but sometimes they exaggerate yaar. Go with an open mind. Strict professor ka matlab automatically fail nahi hota. Work hard, assignments on time do, respectful raho. You'll be fine.
I keep comparing myself to my classmates on LinkedIn. Everyone seems to be doing amazing things and I'm doing nothing.

LinkedIn comparison is toxic. People only post their wins, not their struggles. You're seeing everyone's highlight reel, not reality. Stop scrolling and focus on your own path. Your timeline is different and that's completely okay.
Mere teacher ne mujhse pucha class mein answer aur main blank ho gaya. Sab hasne lage bohot embarrassing tha.

Blank ho jaana sab ke saamne aur phir log hasein, that humiliation stays with you yaar. But everyone forgets faster than you think. One embarrassing moment doesn't define you. Shake it off, move on. You're more than one blank moment.
My college increased fees mid-year and my family is struggling to pay. I feel guilty for being a burden on them.

Sudden fee increase putting financial strain on your family - that guilt is heavy. But you're not a burden, you're their investment. Talk to the college about payment plans or look for emergency scholarships. There might be options you haven't explored yet.
mujhe lagta hai main depression mein hoon par ghar walo ko bata nahi sakta wo mental health ko seriously nahi lete

Feeling depressed aur ghar walon ko nahi bata paana is really isolating. Mental health is serious, chahe wo manen ya na manen. College counselor se baat kar, ya helpline call kar - Tele-MANAS 14416. You need support, please reach out to someone.
Yaar mera teacher favoritism karta hai. Kuch students ko hamesha zyada marks milte hain chahe kaam kaisa bhi ho.

Favoritism dekhna when you're working just as hard is really demotivating yaar. It's unfair and you have every right to feel frustrated. Focus on doing your best work. If it continues, document it and talk to someone higher up.
I'm exhausted from studying all day but I still feel like I haven't done enough. I can't relax anymore.

Studying all day and still feeling it's not enough - that's burnout talking. Your brain needs rest to actually retain information. Working non-stop doesn't equal productivity. Take breaks, sleep properly. You're allowed to rest without guilt.
My internship supervisor keeps giving me work beyond my skill level. I'm scared to say I can't do it.

Getting work you're not ready for is overwhelming. But saying you need guidance isn't weakness, it's smart. Ask questions, request training, be honest about your current skills. Good supervisors appreciate honesty over pretending and messing up.
mujhe presentation dete waqt stutter aane lagta hai nervous ho jata hoon bohot embarrassing hai

Stuttering when nervous during presentations is more common than you think. It happens when anxiety takes over. Practice helps, even if it's alone in your room. Slow breathing before you start. The stutter doesn't make your content any less valuable.
I have to retake a year because of backlogs. All my friends are moving ahead and I'm stuck here.

Retaking a year while your friends move ahead feels like being left behind. That comparison hurts. But this isn't permanent. Use this time to actually understand the subjects. A year's delay doesn't define your whole life. You'll catch up.
Yaar mera project guide kabhi available nahi hota. Meeting schedule karte hain par cancel kar dete hain last minute.

Guide unavailable rehna aur last minute cancellations when your deadline is approaching is so frustrating yaar. Email everything you need feedback on so there's a paper trail. If it continues, escalate to the department. Your work shouldn't suffer.
mera confidence itna kam ho gaya hai ki class mein bolne se bhi darr lagta hai galat ho jayega toh log kya sochenge

Confidence itna low ho gaya hai ki participation se darr lagta hai. Fear of being wrong is holding you back. But everyone makes mistakes in class, that's how learning works. Speaking up is brave, even if you're wrong sometimes. Don't silence yourself.
mujhe samajh nahi aata mai padhai karne baithta hoon par dimag mein kuch aur hi chalta rehta hai focus nahi hota

Padhne baithte ho par dimag kahin aur chala jata hai, that wandering mind makes studying frustrating. Shayad stress hai ya neend ki kami. Try meditation, proper sleep. If problem continues, kisi se baat karo. Mental health affects focus directly.
Yaar mere teacher ne mujhe pura class ke saamne insult kiya just because I submitted my assignment one day late.

Teacher ne tumhe public insult kiya ek din late submission ke liye, that's such a harsh and unnecessary reaction yaar. Public humiliation is never okay. If possible, talk to them privately or escalate to someone higher if this becomes a pattern.
Yaar mere classmates ne mera joke banaya hai kyunki main slow learner hoon. Class mein participate karne se darr lagta hai.

Arre yaar, log joke bana rahe hain toh bohot hurt hota hai na. Par tu slow hai toh kya hua? Har kisi ka apna pace hota hai. Unki insecurity hai jo tumpe nikal rahe hain. Tu apna kaam kar, baaki log toh bolte hi rahenge.
My parents are comparing my marks to my cousin who topped the university. Every family gathering is torture now.

Constant comparison to your topper cousin at every gathering must be exhausting. Your worth isn't measured by someone else's achievements. You're on your own path. Those comparisons say more about them than about you.
I feel like I'm wasting my parents' money because I'm not even enjoying what I'm studying. The guilt is horrible.

That guilt of not enjoying what you're studying while money is being spent - it's heavy. But you're here now, so finish what you started. The degree still has value. You can pivot later. Don't let guilt destroy your present.
Yaar main subah 6 baje se raat 12 baje tak padhta hoon but phir bhi lagta hai kuch nahi kiya. Everyone else is doing more.

18 ghante grind kar raha hai but still feeling like it's not enough - that exhaustion of never being satisfied is heavy yaar. You're burning out chasing a finish line that keeps moving. Kya kabhi socha hai ki kitna enough hai tumhare liye, not for others?
Mere sab friends placed ho gaye hain aur main yahan interviews fail kar raha hoon. Lagta hai main hi problem hoon.

Sab placed ho gaye aur tu interviews fail kar raha hai - that comparison is making you feel like you're the problem. Par yaar, rejection doesn't mean something's wrong with you. Job market is tough aur timing matters. Interviews mein kya specific struggle ho raha hai?
mujhe neend nahi aati kyunki har raat sapne mein bhi exam fail hone ka darr rehta hai subah uthke panic ho jata hoon

Neend mein bhi exam fail hone ka darr hai aur panic mein uthta hai - that fear has taken over completely yaar. Tumhara body aur mind constant stress mode mein hai. Yeh sustainable nahi hai. Kya kabhi kisi se baat ki hai is anxiety ke baare mein?
Yaar I'm so burnt out that I can't even cry anymore. Just feel numb all the time. Is this what success looks like?

Burnt out to the point of numbness - you've pushed so hard that you can't even feel anymore. That emptiness isn't success, that's your body shutting down to protect itself yaar. Numbness is a warning sign. Kab last time kuch feel kiya tha genuinely?
Mere teacher ne class mein bola ki tum log average ho future mein kuch nahi kar paoge. Ab dimag se yeh baat nahi ja rahi.

Teacher ne average bolke future ko question mark bana diya aur ab yeh baat stuck hai dimag mein. Unka ek sentence tumhara confidence tod gaya yaar. Par one person's opinion se tumhara potential define nahi hota. Kya tum khud mein believe karte ho?
Everyone expects me to have my life figured out at 22. I don't even know what I want for breakfast, let alone my career.

Expected to have it all figured out when you're barely figuring out daily decisions. That pressure to have a perfect plan is unrealistic. Most people are winging it, they just hide it better. What's one small thing you're actually sure about right now?
mujhe lagta hai main robot ban gaya hoon emotions nahi feel hote bas kaam karta rehta hoon automatically

Robot jaisa feel ho raha hai emotions nahi hain bas autopilot pe chal raha hai. That disconnection from yourself is what burnout looks like yaar. Tere emotions shutdown ho gaye hain survival mode mein. Kab last time kuch alag kiya tha jo productive nahi tha?
Mere dost ne 30 LPA package li aur main 5 LPA mein struggle kar raha hoon. Feel hota hai main loser hoon.

Dost 30 LPA pe hai aur tu 5 pe, that comparison is making you feel like a loser. Par yaar, starting point se journey judge nahi hoti. Growth matters, not day one salary. Aur comparison toh hamesha tujhe chota dikhayega. Tera apna pace kya hai?
I'm exhausted but I can't stop. If I stop, someone else will get ahead. The competition never ends.

Exhausted but can't stop because the race never ends - that hamster wheel is burning you out. But running on empty means you'll crash eventually. Someone will always be ahead somewhere. What would enough look like for you personally?
mera confidence itna toot gaya hai ki interviews mein bhi stutter karne lagta hoon pehle aisa nahi tha

Confidence itna toot gaya hai ki interviews mein stutter aane laga - repeated rejection ne tumhe doubt karna sikha diya khud ko. Pehle confident tha ab nahi, that loss of self is painful yaar. Kya koi specific moment tha jab confidence break hua?
Yaar I worked so hard for this internship and they rejected me in the final round. I don't know what else I could have done.

Final round tak gaye aur phir reject ho gaye - that's brutal when you gave everything. Sometimes it's not about what you could have done differently. Final round rejections are often about fit, not capability yaar. Kya feedback mila unse?
No feedback. Just a generic email. Makes me feel like I wasn't even worth explaining to.

Generic rejection without feedback adds insult to injury - makes you feel invisible. Par that's their process failing you, not your worth. You got to the final round, that itself proves capability. Lack of feedback says more about them. Keep pushing yaar, right fit aayega.
Mere parents kehte hain rest karo but same time bolta hai results kyun nahi aa rahe. Confusing hai.

Parents bol rahe hain rest karo but also questioning results - that mixed message is confusing yaar. They want you well but also successful, don't know how to balance. That confusion makes you feel guilty either way. Kya unse clear baat ki hai ki dono saath nahi ho sakta?
My exam is in two days and I haven't covered half the syllabus. I'm having panic attacks every few hours. Can't breathe properly.

Exam do din mein hai aur panic attacks aa rahe hain har kuch ghante - that physical response shows how overwhelmed you are. Can't breathe properly is your body in crisis mode. This needs immediate attention. Kya kisi adult ko bataya hai about these panic attacks?
No one knows. Everyone thinks I'm fine because I always manage somehow. But this time I really can't.

Everyone thinks you're fine because you always pull through, but this time it's different. That pattern of silent suffering is dangerous. Please talk to someone - counselor, parent, friend, anyone. Tele-MANAS 14416 pe bhi call kar sakta hai right now. You need support, not just study tips.
Yaar maine apne friends ko chod diya kyunki unke saath time waste ho raha tha. Ab akela hoon aur lonely feel hota hai but I can't afford distractions.

Friends chod diye productivity ke liye aur ab loneliness aa gayi - that isolation you created for success is backfiring. You traded connection for achievement and now both feel empty. Par yaar, humans aren't meant to grind alone. Kya balance possible nahi hai kuch?
I got 89% and my parents asked why not 90%. I'm so tired of never being good enough no matter what I achieve.

89% aur still not good enough - that moving goalpost is exhausting. You achieved something significant and it got dismissed. Being tired of proving yourself is valid. What would good enough actually look like in their eyes?
I spend 10 hours studying but still score less than people who study 2 hours. Maybe I'm just not smart enough.

Ten hours vs their two hours but worse results - that makes you question your intelligence. But hours don't equal effectiveness. Maybe your method needs changing, not your capability. Smart isn't one-size-fits-all. What's your study approach like?
mujhe raat ko sote waqt sapne mein bhi formulas yaad karne lagte hain chain se so nahi pata

Neend mein bhi formulas yaad ho rahe hain aur chain se so nahi pata - tumhara mind rest mode mein bhi study mode pe hai. That constant mental running is exhaustion yaar. Body aur brain dono ko break chahiye. Kab last time properly soye the bina academic stress ke?
Yaar main har roz sochta hoon ki aaj productive rahunga but din khatam hote hote guilt feel hota hai ki kuch nahi kiya. Every single day same cycle.

Har din productive hone ka plan aur har raat guilt ke saath sona - that cycle is draining yaar. You're setting impossible standards and then punishing yourself. Kya kabhi socha hai ki productive ka matlab kya hai tumhare liye actually?
Mere bhai ne already job kar li 23 mein aur main 25 pe abhi bhi struggle kar raha hoon. Ghar mein comparison constant hai.

Bhai settled ho gaya aur ghar mein constant comparison chal raha hai - that sibling shadow is heavy yaar. Everyone's timeline is different but family comparisons make you feel behind. Kya kabhi unse baat ki hai ki yeh comparison kitna hurt karta hai?
Nahi yaar, bolne se aur bura lagega unhe. Plus wo toh fact hai na ki main actually peeche hoon.

Fact hai bolke validate kar raha hai comparison ko. Par different timelines doesn't mean peeche hona. You're on your own path yaar. Unhe batane se communication khulegi, aur bura nahi lagega if you're honest. Suffering silently se better hai honest conversation.
I'm so scared of failure that I don't even try anymore. Better to not attempt than to fail and confirm I'm worthless.

Fear of failure so strong that not trying feels safer - that protection mechanism is keeping you stuck. But not trying guarantees the outcome you fear. Your worth isn't tied to success or failure. What's one small thing you could try where failure wouldn't destroy you?
Yaar mujhe anxiety attacks aane lage hain exams se pehle. Heart race karta hai, sweat hota hai, lagta hai main mar jaunga. But exam toh dena hi padega.

Anxiety attacks aa rahe hain physical symptoms ke saath - heart racing, sweating, death jaisa feel. That's your body in extreme panic mode yaar. Exam dena padega but is state mein dena dangerous hai. Kya kisi professional se baat ki hai about these attacks?
I can't enjoy anything anymore. Movies, food, friends - everything feels like a waste of time that I should be spending on being productive.

Lost the ability to enjoy anything because productivity guilt has taken over completely. That's burnout stealing your humanity. You've become a productivity machine at the cost of being human. When did enjoyment become a crime in your mind?
My younger sibling is more successful than me. My parents don't say it but I can see the disappointment in their eyes when they compare us.

Younger sibling surpassing you and seeing unspoken disappointment in parents' eyes - that silent comparison hurts more than words. You're reading their faces and creating your own narrative of not being enough. Have they actually said they're disappointed or is this what you're assuming?
mujhe lagta hai main depression mein hoon sab mein interest khatam ho gaya hai bas mechanically kaam kar raha hoon

Sab mein interest khatam ho gaya aur bas mechanically function kar raha hai - that emotional numbness is serious yaar. Depression ke signs ignore nahi karne chahiye. Please kisi professional se baat kar. Tele-MANAS 14416 pe call kar sakta hai. Mental health physical health jitni hi important hai.
Yaar maine ek saal drop liya competitive exam ke liye. Agar is baar bhi nahi hua toh I don't know what I'll do. Pressure bohot zyada hai.

Drop year liya aur ab do-or-die situation hai - that all-or-nothing pressure is crushing yaar. But one exam se tumhara pura future decide nahi hota. Backup plan hai kya agar things don't work out? Having options reduces panic.
I wake up with dread every morning. The thought of another day of trying to meet expectations makes me want to stay in bed forever.

Waking up with dread daily and wanting to stay in bed to avoid expectations - that's your body rejecting the pressure. When getting up feels like torture, something needs to change. What's one expectation you could let go of today, just one?
Yaar main roz plan banata hoon productive rahne ka but end of day guilt mein sota hoon. Feels like I'm failing at basic things.

Roz plan aur roz guilt - that daily cycle of disappointment is exhausting yaar. You're setting standards your current state can't meet. Failing at basic things nahi, unrealistic expectations hai. Kya plan realistic hai ya superhuman?
I'm the first person in my family going to college. The pressure to make it worth it is unbearable. I can't fail them.

First gen student carrying the dreams of the entire family - that pioneer pressure is massive. You're not just studying for yourself, you're carrying generations of hopes. That burden is heavy. But your worth isn't tied to perfection. Have you told them how much pressure you feel?
mujhe khana bhi time waste lagta hai fast khana padta hai taaki jaldi padhai pe wapas aa sakun

Khana bhi time waste lagta hai aur fast finish karta hai - that's extreme burnout yaar jab basic needs bhi productivity ki race mein hain. Body needs fuel properly. You're running on fumes. Kab last time properly khana khaya bina guilt ke?
Yaar LinkedIn pe sab log internships aur projects post karte rehte hain. Main kuch post nahi kar pata kyunki mere paas kuch nahi hai. FOMO bohot hai.

LinkedIn FOMO hitting hard kyunki tumhare paas post karne layak achievements nahi dikhti - that social media comparison is toxic yaar. People post 10% of reality. Tu quietly kaam kar raha hai doesn't mean tu kuch kar nahi raha. Offline progress bhi valid hai. Kya actually kar raha hai abhi?
I don't know what my passion is. Everyone has something they're excited about. I'm just going through motions with no direction.

Everyone has passion and direction except you - that existential confusion is disorienting. But not everyone knows at 22 what excites them. Going through motions hoping to find meaning is common. What's something that doesn't feel like work when you do it?
I feel like I'm drowning. Too many deadlines, too many expectations, too much pressure. I don't know how much longer I can keep this up.

Feeling like you're drowning with no air left - that overwhelm is your breaking point showing. You're signaling you can't sustain this pace. Something has to give before you do. What's one thing you could drop or postpone to get some breathing room?
mera dimaag har waqt future ki planning mein rehta hai present moment enjoy nahi kar pata hoon hamesha next step sochta rehta hoon

Dimaag hamesha future mein hai present moment enjoy nahi hota - that constant forward thinking is stealing your now yaar. Always next step planning means never actually living. Present is slipping while you chase future. Kya ek din kar sakte ho where no planning, sirf being?
Yaar main itna thak gaya hoon ki soch raha hoon sab chod du. Par chod ke kya karunga? Failure toh main already hoon.

Itna thak gaye ho ki chhod dene ka mann hai. Par yaar, thakna matlab failure nahi hota. Tu exhausted hai endless pushing se. Chhod dena ek option hai but kya tu genuinely nahi karna chahta ya bas break chahiye?
Everyone's getting internships at big companies and I'm getting rejected everywhere. I feel like such a loser watching everyone succeed.

Rejections pile up while everyone else celebrates offers. That feeling of being left behind hits different. But listen, rejection isn't a reflection of your worth. Sometimes it's timing, fit, or just bad luck. What feedback are you getting from these rejections?
I'm scared my whole life will just be this endless cycle of proving myself. When does it stop? When am I allowed to just exist?

That fear of endless proving yourself with no finish line. When do you get to just be without performing? That exhaustion is real. Society's goalposts keep moving. But you can decide when enough is enough for you. What would just existing look like?
mujhe raat ko 3 baje tak padhai karni padti hai phir subah 7 baje class neend poori nahi hoti dizzy rehta hoon

3 baje tak padhna aur 7 baje uthna, 4 ghante neend pe survive karna. Yaar yeh sustainable nahi hai. Dizzy rehna means body already signal de rahi hai. Tu kitne din tak aise chal payega? Health se khel raha hai.
Yaar mera exam kal hai aur mujhe kuch nahi aata. Blank hoon completely. Parents ko kya face karunga fail hone ke baad?

Kal exam hai aur completely blank feel ho raha hai. Parents ko face karna scary lag raha hai. Sunn, panic mein aur blank ho jayega. Abhi jo time hai usme ek do important topics dekh le. Aur haan, fail hona end nahi hai. Tu itna bhi bura nahi hai jitna soch raha.
I don't know what career I want. Everyone's so sure about their path and I'm still lost. Makes me feel stupid and directionless.

Everyone seems sure while you're still figuring it out. That comparison makes you feel stupid. But yaar, most people are faking that certainty. Not knowing at 22 is normal. Being lost is part of finding yourself. What scares you more - choosing wrong or not choosing at all?
Mere parents kehte hain beta rest kar lo but next moment bolte hain marks kyun kam aaye. Confusing hai yaar samajh nahi aata kya chahiye.

Rest karo kehte hain but marks pe bhi question karte hain. That mixed signal is messing with your head yaar. They want both but don't realize dono saath mein nahi hota. Ek clear conversation try karo unke saath. Kya specific chahiye unse?
My body is breaking down. Constant headaches, can't sleep, stomach issues. But if I stop now, I'll fall behind and never catch up.

Body literally falling apart but scared to stop because falling behind feels worse. Headaches, no sleep, stomach problems - yaar these are warnings you can't ignore. Catching up matters but not more than collapsing. What if you took just two days off to recover?
Two days means missing classes, assignments piling up, and everyone moving ahead. I can't afford that gap. I'll rest after exams.

Rest after exams - classic promise you keep making. But exams ke baad next thing aayega. That gap you fear is smaller than the crash that's coming. Your body is screaming. Please listen yaar. Two days won't destroy your future but ignoring this might.
mujhe lagta hai main apne aap se hi competition kar raha hoon pichle saal se better karna hai pressure hai

Khud se compete kar raha hai har saal better hone ka pressure hai. Arey yaar, growth linear nahi hoti. Kabhi plateau bhi aata hai. Past version se better hona zaroori hai par kitna better? Kab tak yeh race chalegi apne aap ke saath?
Yaar maine social life completely sacrifice kar di hai studies ke liye. Ab akela hoon aur koi samajhta bhi nahi ki kyun kar raha hoon.

Social life sacrifice karke akela pad gaya aur koi samajh bhi nahi raha kyun. That isolation you created for success is backfiring yaar. Human connections matter. Studies important hai but at what cost? Kya balance possible nahi lag raha bilkul?
I achieved good grades but I feel nothing. No joy, no satisfaction. Just empty and wondering what was the point of all that suffering.

Good grades but feeling empty inside. That hollowness after achievement is brutal. You suffered for this and now it means nothing. Questioning the point of it all is existential exhaustion. What were you hoping would change once you got those grades?
I'm so tired of being strong for everyone. I want to break down but I can't because people depend on me. Who do I lean on?

Being the strong one for everyone while having no one to lean on yourself. That loneliness hits different. You deserve support too. Always being the pillar is exhausting. What's stopping you from showing you need help too?
mera confidence itna gir gaya hai ki presentations mein bolne se darr lagta hai sab judge karenge galat bolne pe

Confidence itna gir gaya hai ki presentations mein bolne se hi darr lagta hai. Judgment ka darr freeze kar deta hai. Par yaar, galat bolna bhi learning hai. Sab judge nahi karte jitna tu soch raha. Kab se aisa feel ho raha hai?
I haven't slept properly in months. Every time I close my eyes, I think about everything I need to do. My body is giving up.

Months without proper sleep and body giving up. That constant mental running even when trying to rest. Your system is in crisis mode. This is serious yaar. Have you talked to anyone medical about this? Sleep deprivation is dangerous.
Mere dost placed ho gaye package achhe hain aur main yahan struggle kar raha hoon. Jealous feel hota hai but guilty bhi lagta jealous hone pe.

Dost ki success pe jealous feel ho raha hai aur phir guilt aa raha hai jealous hone pe. That double burden is tough yaar. Jealousy human hai, normal hai. Guilt mat feel kar. Unki success se teri value kam nahi hoti. Kya unse baat kar pata hai yeh?
I feel like I'm living someone else's life. Following a path that was decided for me. I don't even know what I want anymore.

Living someone else's life following their decided path. Lost your own wants in the process. That disconnection from yourself is painful. But yaar, it's not too late to find what you actually want. What's one thing you know for sure you don't want?
mujhe exam mein panic attack aaya tha sab dekh rahe the embarrassing tha ab exam se darr lagta hai dobara ho jayega

Exam mein panic attack aaya sab ke saamne aur ab trauma ban gaya hai. Darr hai dobara hoga. That experience traumatized you yaar. Exam anxiety ab serious level pe hai. Professional help le le bhai. Tele-MANAS 14416 pe call kar. Yeh ignore nahi kar sakta.
Yaar main apne family ka pehla graduate hoon. Itna pressure hai ki saans lena mushkil ho jata hai kabhi kabhi. Sabki umeedein hain mujhpe.

Pehla graduate hona matlab pure family ke sapne tumhare kandhe pe. Saans lena mushkil ho jata hai under that weight - makes total sense yaar. Tu akela nahi hai jo yeh mehsoos kar raha. Kya kabhi unse bola hai kitna heavy lag raha hai yeh sab?
I watch my friends enjoy college life - parties, trips, romance. And here I am, living like a monk because I can't afford distractions. Am I wasting my youth?

They're living it up while you're grinding alone. That FOMO of missing your youth is real. But listen, your circumstances are different and that's okay. You're not wasting it, you're investing it differently. What's one small thing you could do just for joy this week?
I'm so numb I can't even cry anymore. Just go through each day like a robot. Wake up, study, sleep, repeat. Is this what my entire life will be?

Gone so numb that even tears won't come. Just existing on autopilot - wake, study, sleep, repeat. That emptiness asking if this is all there is to life. You're burnt out to your core. This isn't living, this is surviving. What's the last thing that made you feel anything real?
mera dost suicide kar liya tha last year same pressure ki wajah se ab mujhe lagta hai main bhi wahi raaste pe ja raha hoon

Tera dost suicide kar liya tha same pressure ki wajah se aur ab tu dekh raha hai khud ko same path pe. That fear is real and serious yaar. Please immediately kisi se baat kar - counselor, parents, koi bhi. Tele-MANAS 14416 pe abhi call kar le. Main hoon na, but professional help bhi chahiye. Tu akela nahi hai ismein.
Yaar koi puchta hi nahi ki main kaisa hoon. Sab bas marks, results, future ke baare mein interested hain. Main as a person matter nahi karta.

Koi genuinely nahi poochta tu kaisa hai, sab bas achievements pe focus hai. That invisibility as a person hurts. Tu reduce ho gaya hai apne performance tak. Par yaar, tu matters beyond your marks. Main hoon na - bata kaisa hai tu actually?
I don't remember the last time I did something without calculating how it helps my resume or career. Everything is transactional now. I've lost who I am.

Every single thing you do is filtered through career utility. Lost the ability to do things just because. That transactional existence has erased your sense of self. You've become a resume-building machine. What did you love doing before this race began?
My mind won't shut up. Constant thoughts about what I should be doing, what others are achieving, where I'm falling short. It never stops. I'm exhausted.

Your mind's running a 24/7 comparison marathon with no off switch. That mental exhaustion from never getting quiet. The noise inside is louder than anything outside. Have you tried getting any of this out - talking, writing, anything to release some pressure?
mujhe lagta hai main depression mein hoon lekin doctor ke paas jaane se darr lagta hai log pagal samjhenge therapy weak logon ke liye hai aisa sochte hain sab
