Depression feel ho raha hai par help lene se rok raha hai stigma. Pagal samjhenge, weak bolenge - yeh sab toxic thinking hai society ki. Mental health physical health jitni hi zaroori hai yaar. Therapy strength ki nishani hai, weakness ki nahi. Please help le. Tele-MANAS 14416 anonymous hai, koi judge nahi karega. Main hoon na support ke liye.
Yaar main hamesha second best hoon. Kabhi first nahi aa pata. Lagta hai mediocrity meri destiny hai.

Hamesha second, kabhi first nahi. That constant almost-but-not-quite is frustrating yaar. Par second best bhi achievement hai. Mediocrity nahi hai yeh. Tu apne aap ko unfairly judge kar raha hai. First ka obsession kyun hai itna?
I study while my friends sleep. I skip meals to save time. I cancelled plans for months. And still my results aren't good enough. What more can I sacrifice?

Sacrificing sleep, meals, social life - you've given everything and it still feels not enough. That question of what more to sacrifice is heartbreaking. But maybe it's not about sacrificing more, maybe your approach needs changing. Your body and mind are already paying the price. What if working smarter mattered more than working harder?
mujhe sapne mein bhi exam fail hone ka darr dikhta hai roz subah sweat mein uthta hoon heart beating fast

Sapno mein bhi exam fail hone ka darr aur subah panic mein uthna. Tumhara subconscious bhi darr mein jee raha hai. Yeh level ka anxiety serious hai yaar. Body constant alert mode pe hai. Please kisi counselor se baat kar. Yeh sustainable nahi hai.
Yaar LinkedIn pe dekh ke lagta hai sab kuch kar rahe hain - internships, projects, awards. Aur main kya kar raha hoon? Kuch bhi nahi.

LinkedIn scrolling se FOMO peak pe hai. Sab kuch kar rahe dikhte hain aur tu kuch nahi. Par yaar, wo highlight reel hai, behind the scenes nahi. Log struggles post nahi karte. Tu jo bhi kar raha slowly, wo bhi valid hai. Kya actually chal raha tera?
I chose this career path because it was safe, not because I wanted it. Now I'm stuck doing something I hate for the rest of my life. It's too late to change.

Chose safety over passion and now feeling trapped in something you hate. That regret of not following your heart is painful. But it's not too late to pivot. Difficult, yes. Impossible, no. What would you have chosen if fear wasn't a factor?
I look at my parents getting old and stressed because of me. My education debt, my uncertain future. I feel like such a burden. Maybe they'd be better off without me.

Feeling like a burden to your aging parents who've sacrificed so much. That guilt is crushing and those thoughts about them being better off without you - that's serious. Please listen, you're not a burden, you're their child. They chose this out of love. Talk to someone right now - Tele-MANAS 14416. Main hoon na but you need more support. Promise me you'll call?
mujhe kuch samajh nahi aa raha ki main kaun hoon apni achievements ke alawa identity hi nahi hai koi

Achievements se alag tumhara koi identity nahi hai. That's scary yaar - tu reduce ho gaya hai apne results tak. Par tu bohot kuch hai beyond that. Achievements temporary hain, tu as a person permanent hai. Kya ek cheez hai jo tu karta tha bachpan mein jo productive nahi thi par khushi deti thi?
Yaar main itna exhausted hoon ki morning mein uthne ka mann nahi karta. Bed se nikalte hi anxiety start ho jati hai. Kaise jeeun aise?

Morning mein uthte hi anxiety attack. Bed se bahar nikalna hi struggle ban gaya hai. That's your body saying it can't take this pace anymore yaar. Kaise jeeun - valid question hai. But first, kab se aisa feel ho raha hai? Koi specific trigger hai ya overall sab kuch?
Everyone celebrates my achievements but nobody sees how broken I am inside. They think I have it together but I'm barely surviving each day.

Celebrating your wins while you're drowning inside. That disconnect between what people see and what you feel is lonely. Barely surviving while looking successful is exhausting. You're carrying all this weight alone. Who's one person you trust enough to show the real you?
I'm scared I'll work hard my whole life and still end up average. What if all this suffering is for nothing? What if I'm just not meant to succeed?

That fear of giving everything and still being average. Questioning if all this suffering even matters. Those doubts creep in when you're exhausted. But yaar, success isn't just one definition. What does it even mean to you beyond what others think?
mera exam mein panic attack aa gaya tha sab dekh rahe the ab dobara exam dena hai but darr lag raha hai phir se hoga

Exam mein panic attack aaya sabke saamne aur ab next exam se darr hai ki phir hoga. That trauma is real yaar. One bad experience ne future exams ko bhi scary bana diya. Par yeh tackle karna zaroori hai. Kisi counselor se baat kari hai? Techniques hain manage karne ke liye.
Yaar mujhe guilt hoti hai jab main rest karta hoon. Lagta hai kisi aur ne tab kaam kiya hoga aur wo aage badh gaya. Competition kabhi khatam nahi hota.

Rest lete waqt guilt kyunki competition never stops. Someone somewhere is grinding - that thought chain is toxic yaar. But constant grinding without rest means eventual crash. Burnout mein toh bilkul aage nahi badh paayega. Ek din rest se race haar nahi jayegi. Tu khud pe thoda meherbaan ho sakta hai?
My parents took a huge loan for my education. Every time I fail, I think about that money being wasted. The guilt is killing me slowly.

Huge loan for your education and every failure feels like wasting their money. That guilt is suffocating you. But listen, their investment is in you, not just your success. One failure doesn't waste everything. Have you talked to them about this pressure you're feeling?
No. How can I? They've already sacrificed so much. Telling them I'm struggling feels selfish. They expect me to succeed, not complain.

Staying silent to protect them while you're drowning. That's not selfish, that's you suffering alone. But yaar, they'd want to know. Parents aren't as fragile as you think. Communication might actually ease this burden. Try talking to them gently about the pressure?
Mere batch mein sab settle ho gaye hain jobs, relationships, life sorted. Aur main yahan confused hoon har cheez mein. Lagta hai main galat hoon.

Sab settled aur tu confused. That comparison makes you feel defective. Par yaar, wo sab bhi confused hain andar se, bas dikhta nahi. Sorted life Instagram pe achhi lagti hai, reality alag hoti hai. Tu galat nahi hai, bas teri timeline alag hai. Kya ek cheez hai jo definitely nahi karna chahte?
I don't see the point anymore. Study hard, get job, work till 60, retire, die. Is this it? This can't be all there is to life.

Looking at the whole script laid out and it feels empty. Study, work, retire, die - questioning if this is all there is. That existential exhaustion is real. But yaar, the script can be rewritten. Life isn't just that linear path. What would make it feel meaningful to you?
mujhe lagta hai main khud ko harm kar dunga agar pressure aur badha mental state itna kharab ho gaya hai

Agar pressure aur badha toh khud ko harm kar dega - yeh thought aa raha hai means you need immediate help yaar. Please abhi kisi ko batao - parent, friend, koi bhi. Aur Tele-MANAS 14416 pe call kar right now. AASRA 9820466726 bhi hai. Main hoon na but professional help bhi chahiye urgently. Tu important hai, please safe reh.
Yaar main apne room mein akela rota hoon raat ko but subah sabko smile dikha ke nikalta hoon. Thak gaya hoon yeh natak karte karte.
Raat ko akele rona aur subah smile leke nikalna. That acting every single day is exhausting yaar. Kis ke liye yeh mask pehen raha hai? Kya kisi ko real tu dikha sakta hai ya darr hai judge hone ka?
I got the internship I wanted but I feel like a fraud. Like they made a mistake selecting me and soon everyone will realize I don't belong there.

Got what you wanted but impostor syndrome is louder than joy. Waiting for them to realize they made a mistake. That constant fear of being exposed. But yaar, they selected you for a reason. You earned it. What would it take for you to believe you deserve this?
I'm living a life everyone else wants for me. I don't even know what I want anymore. Just following a script written by others.

Living a scripted life written by others. Lost your own voice in all the noise. That disconnection from yourself is painful. But it's not too late to find what you actually want. What's one thing you know for sure you don't want? Sometimes elimination helps.
mera confidence itna khatam ho gaya hai ki interview mein baat karne se darr lagta hai stutter aane lagta hai

Interview mein baat karna hi scary ho gaya aur stutter aane lagta hai. Confidence khatam ho gaya repeated failures se. That physical manifestation of anxiety is tough yaar. Mock interviews practice ki hai kisi ke saath? Akele practice se thoda better feel ho sakta hai.
I wake up, study, sleep. Wake up, study, sleep. Every day same. I forgot what happiness feels like. Just emptiness.

Same loop every single day with zero joy. Forgot what happiness even feels like. That emptiness is burnout taking over completely. You've become a machine. When did life become just this cycle? What's the last moment you remember feeling genuinely light?
Yaar mera best friend successfully hai aur mujhse baat kam kar diya. Lagta hai main ab uske level ka nahi raha.

Best friend successful ho gaya aur ab distance bana raha hai. That feels like you're not good enough for them anymore. But yaar, real friendship success se nahi badalta. If they're distancing, that's on them. Kya tumne directly baat kari hai unse about this?
I have panic attacks before every exam now. Heart races, can't breathe, mind goes blank. But I have to write them anyway.

Panic attacks before every exam - heart racing, breathing problems, mind blanking. But you push through anyway. That's your body screaming for help yaar. This isn't normal exam stress. Please talk to someone professional. Tele-MANAS 14416. You can't keep functioning like this.
mera koi passion nahi hai koi dream nahi bas survive kar raha hoon din bhi kaatna bhi tough ho gaya hai

Koi passion nahi, koi dream nahi - bas surviving. Din kaatna bhi tough ho gaya hai. That emptiness is serious yaar. Jab basic existence hi burden lagne lage. Please help le le. Counselor ya Tele-MANAS 14416 pe baat kar. Yeh ignore nahi karna chahiye.
Yaar LinkedIn pe dekh ke depression hota hai. Sab log itna kuch achieve kar rahe aur main yahan zero progress pe hoon.

LinkedIn scrolling se depression trigger ho raha hai. Sab achieve karte dikh rahe aur tu zero pe feel kar raha. But yaar, social media reality nahi dikhata. 90% log struggle kar rahe silently. Delete kar do app for a while. Mental peace matters more than knowing others' wins.
mujhe khud pe bharosa nahi raha kisi bhi decision lene mein darr lagta hai sab galat ho jata hai

Khud pe bharosa khatam ho gaya aur har decision se darr lagta hai. Sab galat hone ka pattern dikh raha hai. That self-trust erosion is painful yaar. Par kya sach mein sab galat hai ya tu sirf galat decisions yaad rakh raha hai? Ek achha decision yaad kar jo liya tha.
Yaar main subah uthke rota hoon kyunki ek aur din survive karna padega. Jee nahi raha hoon bas exist kar raha hoon.

Subah uthke rona because another day has to be survived. Existing, not living. That heaviness from the moment you wake up. Yaar this sounds really tough. Kab se aisa lag raha hai? Koi bhi cheez hai jo thoda relief deti hai ya sab kuch grey hai?
I'm scared to try new things because what if I fail? Better to not try than to confirm I'm a failure.

Not trying feels safer than trying and failing. That fear is keeping you stuck. But yaar, not trying guarantees the outcome you're afraid of. You're protecting yourself but also limiting yourself. What's the worst that happens if you try and it doesn't work out?
Mere parents kehte hain humne tumhare liye sab kuch sacrifice kiya ab tumhari baari hai. Feels like a transaction, not love.

Parents ka sacrifice guilt trip ban gaya hai - feels transactional. That conditional love through achievements hurts. Par yaar, maybe they don't realize how their words sound. Kya kabhi calmly bola hai unhe ki yeh pressure guilt create kar raha hai instead of motivation?
Yaar main sabka problem solver hoon but jab meri problem hai toh koi nahi hai. Everyone takes but nobody gives back.

Sabka problem solve karta hai par teri problems ke liye koi nahi. That one-way street is lonely yaar. Being the giver with no one to lean on is exhausting. Kya kabhi help maangi hai directly ya assume kar leta hai ki nahi milegi?
Yaar main roz plan banata hoon productive rahne ka but execution nahi ho pata. Lagta hai main lazy hoon incompetent hoon.

Roz plan aur roz execution fail. Lazy aur incompetent feel ho raha hai. Par yaar, execution fail hona doesn't mean lazy. Burnout, overwhelm, unrealistic plans - bohot reasons hote hain. Tu khud pe itna bura kyun bol raha? Kya plans realistic hain ya superhuman expectations hain?
I don't know who I am without my achievements. If I'm not succeeding, then what am I? Just nobody?

Identity completely tied to achievements. Take those away and you don't know who you are. That's scary - feeling like nobody without success. But yaar, you're a whole person beyond accomplishments. What's something about you that has nothing to do with success or failure?
mujhe lagta hai main apne aap se hi disappointed hoon sab se zyada expectations thi apne se wo poori nahi hui

Khud se sabse zyada disappointed hai kyunki apni hi expectations nahi meet kar paya. That self-disappointment is heavy yaar. Par kya wo expectations realistic thi? Ya tu itna zyada expect kar raha tha ki impossible tha achieve karna? Thoda gentle ho apne saath.
Yaar main itna thak gaya hoon ki subah uthne ka mann nahi karta. Har din same pressure same anxiety same emptiness.

Subah uthne ka mann hi nahi karta kyunki har din wahi pressure wahi anxiety. That exhaustion of repetitive suffering is real yaar. Kab se aisa lag raha hai? Koi bhi din yaad hai recently jab thoda different feel hua tha?
Everyone celebrates when I win but nobody asks how I'm doing when I'm struggling. I'm tired of performing for validation.

They celebrate your wins but disappear during struggles. That conditional presence is lonely. Performing for validation is exhausting when nobody sees the person behind the achievements. What would it feel like to be seen for who you are, not what you accomplish?
mujhe lagta hai main apne parents ko face nahi kar paunga agar fail ho gaya unhone itna kuch kiya hai mere liye

Parents ko face karna impossible lag raha hai agar fail ho gaye kyunki unhone bohot kuch kiya hai. Unka sacrifice guilt ban gaya hai tumhare liye. Par yaar unka pyaar conditional nahi hoga results pe. Ek baar baat karke dekho unse honestly. Shayad wo zyada samajhdar hain tumhare expectations se.
Yaar mera younger sibling mujhse zyada successful hai aur ghar pe comparison constant chal rahi hai. Feel hota hai main family ka disappointment hoon.

Arre yaar, comparison toh sabse painful hoti hai especially ghar mein. Par sun, different timelines hai na. Tu disappointment nahi hai, bas tera pace alag hai. Kya kabhi parents se seedhe bola hai ki yeh hurt karta hai?
I cannot sleep anymore. Every time I close my eyes I see everything I need to do. My mind refuses to shut up.

That racing mind at night is exhausting. Try this - before bed, write down everything bouncing around in your head. Get it out. Your brain needs to know you'll handle it tomorrow. Deep breaths. You need rest to actually function.
I am terrified of being ordinary. The thought of living a normal life with no big achievements keeps me awake at night.

But what if ordinary is actually okay? Most people are ordinary and living full lives. The pressure to be extraordinary is exhausting you. What does success actually mean to you, not to everyone else?
mera exam hai do din mein aur panic attacks aa rahe hain chest pain ho raha hai saans nahi aa rahi theek se

Yaar yeh serious hai. Panic attacks with chest pain - please kisi ko batao abhi. Medical help lo. Tele-MANAS 14416 pe call kar. Exam se zyada important hai tera health. Main hoon na but professional help bhi chahiye.
Yaar main har field mein mediocre hoon. Kisi bhi cheez mein exceptional nahi hoon. Lagta hai main kabhi kuch special achieve nahi kar paunga.
Par being good at many things is also valuable na yaar. Jack of all trades is a strength. Kya tu sach mein mediocre hai ya comparison mein khud ko chota kar raha hai?
My parents invested their retirement savings in my education. If I fail them they have nothing left. That pressure is suffocating me.

That is heavy to carry. But their love is not a transaction. Have they actually said their future depends on you or are you assuming that weight? Sometimes we create pressure that is bigger than reality. Talk to them maybe?
Mere dost sab successful ho gaye hain placements mein aur main yahan interviews fail kar raha hoon. Sharam aati hai unse milne mein.
Comparison se avoid kar raha hai apne dost ko. Par yaar, real friends tumhari job pe nahi tumpe focus karte hain. Kya unhone judge kiya ya tu assume kar raha hai?
Assume kar raha hoon shayad. Par awkward lag raha hai unse baat karna ab.
I get it. Par unhe chance de yaar. Agar sach mein dost hain toh samjhenge. Aur agar judge kare toh tere dost nahi the. Try karke dekh ek baar.
I do not know what career path to take. Everyone has opinions but nobody knows what I actually want. Neither do I honestly.
Not knowing is okay. Start with what you definitely do not want. Elimination helps. You do not need to have it all figured out right now. Give yourself permission to explore.
mujhe lagta hai main depression mein hoon but therapy ke liye paisa nahi hai aur parents ko batane se darr lagta hai judge karenge
Sunn, free resources hain. Tele-MANAS 14416 free hai. College counselor bhi mil sakta hai. Parents ko gently batao agar ho sake. Mental health serious hai yaar, ignore mat karo please. Main hoon na.
Yaar main subah se raat tak padhta hoon sixteen hours daily but results bilkul nahi aa rahe. Lagta hai main dumb hoon.
Sixteen hours? Yaar that's burnout territory. Dumb nahi hai tu, shayad approach galat hai. Hard work matters but smart work bhi. Kaise padhte ho - concepts samajhte ya sirf ratta?
I feel like I am watching my life from outside my body. Like I am not really living just going through motions. Everything feels unreal and distant.

That sounds like dissociation. When you are that disconnected, it is serious. Please talk to someone professional about this. You deserve to feel present in your own life. This is not something to ignore.
I got good grades but I cheated to get them. Now the guilt is eating me alive every day. I feel like a complete fraud.
That guilt shows you have a conscience. You know it was wrong. Learn from this mistake. Moving forward, choose honesty even if results are not perfect. What pushed you there?
The pressure was unbearable. Everyone expected me to excel and I was terrified of letting them down. I made a horrible decision I regret deeply.

I get it. That fear of disappointing people can push us to do things we regret. You recognize it was wrong. Talk to someone you trust about this guilt. Carrying it alone will destroy you. Can you make amends somehow?
mujhe sapne mein bhi exam fail hone ka darr dikhta hai raat ko panic mein uthta hoon sweat aur heart racing ke saath
Yaar even your dreams are not safe. That is how deep the anxiety is. Body constant alert mode pe hai. Counselor se baat kar. Techniques hain manage karne ke liye.
Yaar maine passion wala field try kiya but practical nahi nikla financially. Ab compromise karke stable boring career choose karna pad raha hai.
Par ek se start karke dusri bhi explore kar sakte ho part-time na. Stable career doesn't mean passion ko completely bye-bye. Balance possible hai. Kya try kiya dono ka?
Everyone thinks I have it all together because I always smile and help everyone with their problems. Nobody sees how completely broken I am inside.
That mask is exhausting. Being the strong one means you suffer alone. Who do you lean on? What if you let one person see the real struggle?
I look at all this suffering in my life and genuinely wonder what the point is. Why am I doing this? For what exactly?
When the why disappears, the how becomes unbearable. What did you originally want before everyone else's expectations got loud? Go back to that.
mera confidence zero ho gaya hai class mein haath uthane se darr lagta hai galat answer de dunga toh log hasenge mujhpe
Par yaar galat hona is part of learning na. Jo hasenge wo apni insecurity dikha rahe hain. Tera participation matters. Ek baar himmat karke try karo.
Yaar main subah uthke rota hoon kyunki ek aur din survive karna padega. Jee nahi raha bas exist kar raha hoon.
Yaar that sounds really tough. Kab se aisa chal raha hai? Koi bhi cheez hai jo thoda relief deti hai ya sab grey hai?
Everyone thinks I am the smart responsible one who has everything figured out. Truth is I am drowning and nobody even notices.
That mask is suffocating. You hide it so well that nobody sees. But you need support too. What would happen if you let just one person see the real struggle?
Mere coaching mein sab AIR holders ke bachche hain aur main government school se aaya hoon. Feel hota hai main deserve nahi karta yahan hona.
Par tu wahan hai means you earned it yaar. Background se capability decide nahi hoti. Performance mein actual struggle hai ya impostor feeling?
Dono yaar. Unke paas resources the bachpan se, main sab naya seekh raha hoon. Gap bohot bada hai.
Toh tu double mehnat kar raha hai jo unhone pehle seekha. That is strength, not weakness. Gap close ho sakti hai ek step at a time. Main hoon na.
I am scared to try new things because what if I fail? Better to not try than confirm I am a failure right?
But not trying guarantees what you fear. You protect yourself but also limit yourself. What is the actual worst thing that happens if you try?
mujhe sapne mein bhi marks aur rank dikhte hain neend mein bhi rest nahi milta bas numbers chase kar rahe hain mujhe
Even your dreams are not safe. That is how deep this pressure is. Rest nahi toh body kaise recover karega? Kuch karte ho jo numbers se door ho?
Yaar maine do saal invest kar diye competitive exam mein aur ab realize hua ki yeh path galat tha. Too late hai ab change karne ke liye.
Sunn, too late kabhi nahi hota. Sunk cost se bahar aa. Agar time ki tension na hoti toh kya karna chahte actually?
My body is literally giving up. Constant headaches, stomach issues, hair falling out. But I cannot stop because everyone depends on me.
Your body is screaming for help. You cannot support anyone if you collapse. Please see a doctor. These are serious warnings you cannot ignore.
Mere parents kehte hain humne tumhare liye sab sacrifice kiya ab tumhari baari hai. Feels like a business deal not love.
That transactional feeling hurts yaar. Maybe they do not realize how it sounds. Kya kabhi gently bola hai ki yeh guilt create kar raha hai?
Nahi yaar. Darr lagta hai. Wo already stressed hain.
Par silently suffering helps nobody. Honest conversation might surprise you. They might not know kitna heavy hai. Try karna padega communication.
I look successful on paper but inside I am completely hollow. Got everything I was supposed to want but feel absolutely nothing.
You chased what you were supposed to want, not what you actually wanted. That hollowness is brutal. What is something you wanted before everyone told you what you should want?
mujhe samajh nahi aa raha kya karna hai life mein sab pressure de rahe decisions lene ka par main completely paralyzed hoon
Decision abhi lena zaroori nahi hai. Thoda time de khud ko. Ek chhoti si cheez bata jo definitely nahi karna chahte. Elimination se bhi clarity aati hai.
Yaar main sabka problem solver hoon but jab meri problem hai toh koi nahi hai sunne wala. Everyone takes but nobody gives back.
That one-way street is lonely yaar. Kya kabhi directly help maangi hai ya assume kar leta hai ki nahi milegi?
Mere batch mein sab foreign universities mein apply kar rahe hain scholarships le rahe. Main afford nahi kar sakta even dream bhi nahi dekh sakta financially.
That financial wall hurts yaar. Dreams bhi class ke hisaab se limited. Par success ek hi path nahi hai. Kya realistically explore kiya hai?
Haan explore kiya but feels like settling. Forced choice hai, not what I want.
Settling feel ho raha but circumstances ne choices limit ki. Settling se start karke bhi aage badh sakte ho. Future mein opportunities aa sakti hain. Abhi jo hai usme best do without bitterness.
I am tired of being told to be grateful. Yes I have opportunities but I am still allowed to struggle and feel overwhelmed right?
Yes. Having privileges does not cancel your right to struggle. Both things can be true. That dismissal is not fair. Are people supporting you or just shutting you down?
mera exam hai kal aur mujhe kuch nahi aata complete blank hoon parents ko kya face karunga fail hone ke baad
Sunn yaar, panic mein aur blank ho jayega. Abhi jo time hai ek do important topics quickly dekh le. Aur haan, fail hona end nahi hai. Jo soch raha utna bhi bura nahi.
Yaar main roz plan banata hoon productive rahne ka but execution ho hi nahi pata. Lagta hai main lazy hoon ya incompetent hoon.
Execution fail hona doesn't mean lazy. Burnout, overwhelm, unrealistic plans - bohot reasons. Kyun itna bura bol raha khud ko? Plans realistic hain ya superhuman?
I got rejected from my dream company after months of preparation. Feels like everything was for nothing. What is even the point anymore?
That disappointment hits hard. But one rejection does not erase your preparation. It helps for next. What feedback did you get? Can you try again later?
Mere friends bolte hain main overthink karta hoon but yaar main toh realistic hoon. Life tough hai, overthinking nahi reality hai.
Reality tough hai but 24/7 worst-case mein rehna exhausting bhi hai na. Kya kabhi best-case socha?
Nahi yaar. Best case sochne se hope aati hai phir agar nahi hua toh zyada hurt. Better low expectations.
Low expectations to protect yourself. But that is also blocking joy before it arrives. Living in permanent bracing mode is exhausting. Thoda space de hope ko bhi.
I do not know who I am without my achievements anymore. If I am not succeeding then what even am I? Just nobody?
You are a whole person beyond what you accomplish. What is something about you that has nothing to do with winning or losing?
mujhe lagta hai main apne aap se hi sabse zyada disappointed hoon expectations thi apne se wo poori nahi hui kabhi
Kya wo expectations realistic thi ya tu itna zyada maang raha tha ki impossible tha? Thoda gentle ho apne saath. Tu bhi human hai.
Yaar main apne room mein akela rota hoon raat ko but subah sabko smile dikha ke nikalta hoon. Thak gaya hoon yeh natak karte karte.
Raat ko akele rona aur subah smile leke nikalna. That acting every day is exhausting yaar. Kis ke liye yeh mask? Darr hai judge hone ka?
I got the internship I wanted but I feel like a fraud. Like they made a mistake selecting me and soon everyone will realize I do not belong there.
Impostor syndrome is loud right now. But they selected you for a reason. You earned it. What would it take for you to believe you deserve this?
Mere dost ne ek hi baar mein exam clear kar liya aur main teen baar fail ho chuka hoon. Kya main itna stupid hoon sach mein?
Attempts se capability decide nahi hoti yaar. Everyone's journey is different. Kya analysis kiya ki kahan struggle ho raha?
Analysis toh kiya but lagta hai dimag hi slow hai. Concepts samajh nahi aate.
Method galat ho sakta hai, brain slow nahi. Different learning styles hote hain. Visual, practical, auditory - kya try kiya alag? Ek mentor ya teacher se baat kar jo differently samjha sake.
mera confidence itna khatam ho gaya hai ki interview mein baat karne se darr lagta hai stutter aane lagta hai
Stutter aana when nervous is your body showing that anxiety. Mock interviews practice ki kisi ke saath? Akele practice se thoda better feel ho sakta hai.
I wake up, study, sleep. Wake up, study, sleep. Every day same. I forgot what happiness feels like. Just emptiness.
Same loop with zero joy. Forgot what happiness feels like. That emptiness is burnout taking over. When did life become just this? What is the last moment you remember feeling light?
mujhe career decision lena hai par kisi direction mein jaane se darr lagta hai galat choice ho gayi toh life barbaad
Paralyzed by fear ki galat choice life barbaad kar dega. Par koi bhi choice permanent nahi completely. Pivot le sakte hain. Do options hain consider karne ke? Pros cons dekhe?
Yaar maine social life completely sacrifice kar di hai studies ke liye. Ab akela hoon aur koi samajhta bhi nahi ki kyun kar raha hoon.
Social life sacrifice karke akela pad gaya. That isolation you created for success is backfiring yaar. Human connections matter. Kya balance possible nahi lag raha bilkul?
I achieved good grades but I feel nothing. No joy, no satisfaction. Just empty and wondering what was the point of all that suffering.
Good grades but feeling empty inside. That hollowness after achievement is brutal. You suffered for this and now it means nothing. What were you hoping would change once you got those grades?
Mere coaching mein teacher ne bola average students kabhi kuch nahi kar paate. Main average hoon toh kya matlab main worthless hoon?
Arre, that teacher is toxic. Average marks doesn't mean average person yaar. Bohot log prove kar chuke hain yeh galat hai. Tu khud pe believe karta hai?
Pata nahi. Results bhi toh support nahi kar rahe.
One phase of struggle future decide nahi karta. Tu usse bohot zyada hai. Koi cheez hai jo tu genuinely achha karta hai?
I am so tired of being strong for everyone. I want to break down but I cannot because people depend on me. Who do I lean on?
Being the strong one for everyone while having no one yourself. That loneliness hits different. You deserve support too. What stops you from showing you need help?
Yaar main chaar saal se engineering kar raha hoon but ab realize hua ki yeh nahi karna tha. Too late hai ab change karne ke liye.
Chaar saal invest karke realize hua wrong direction. That regret is heavy yaar. But too late nahi hai. Pivot lena mushkil hai but possible. Kya actually karna chahte ho tu?
I have not slept properly in months. Every time I close my eyes I think about everything I need to do. My body is giving up.
Months without proper sleep and body giving up. That constant mental running even when trying to rest. This is serious. Have you talked to anyone medical about this? Sleep deprivation is dangerous.
Mere dost placed ho gaye package achhe hain aur main yahan struggle kar raha hoon. Jealous feel hota hai but guilty bhi lagta jealous hone pe.
Jealous feel ho raha aur phir guilt. That double burden is tough yaar. Jealousy human hai, normal hai. Guilt mat feel kar. Unki success se teri value kam nahi. Kya unse baat kar pata hai?
I feel like I am living someone else's life. Following a path that was decided for me. I do not even know what I want anymore.

Living someone else's life following their decided path. Lost your own wants in the process. But it is not too late to find what you actually want. What is one thing you know for sure you do not want?
mera exam mein panic attack aaya tha sab dekh rahe the embarrassing tha ab exam se darr lagta hai dobara ho jayega

Exam mein panic attack sab ke saamne. That experience traumatized you. Darr hai dobara hoga. Exam anxiety serious level pe hai. Professional help le le. Tele-MANAS 14416 pe call kar. Yeh ignore nahi kar sakta.
Yaar main har din sochta hoon aaj productive rahunga but din khatam hote hote guilt mein sota hoon. Lagta hai main failure hoon basic cheezein bhi nahi kar pata.

Har din wahi guilt, har raat wahi disappointment. Yaar that's exhausting. Par sunn, tu failure nahi hai. Shayad expectations hi unrealistic hain jo tu set kar raha. Kya sach mein productive nahi tha ya bas jitna socha tha utna nahi hua?
I am the first person in my family going to college. The pressure to make it worth it is unbearable. I cannot fail them.

Being the first carries the dreams of everyone. That weight on your shoulders - I feel you. But listen, their investment is in you, not just your grades. One stumble does not waste everything. Have you told them how heavy this feels?
I study while my friends sleep. I skip meals to save time. I cancelled all plans for months. And still my results are not good enough. What more can I sacrifice?

You have given sleep, food, friendships - everything. And it still feels not enough. That breaks my heart. Maybe it is not about sacrificing more. Maybe your approach needs changing, not your effort. Your body is already paying the price. What if working smarter mattered more than working harder?
mujhe sapne mein bhi formulas aur equations dikhte hain neend bhi chain ki nahi milti ab

Neend mein bhi formulas chase kar rahe hain. Even your dreams are not safe. Yaar that's how deep this pressure has gone. Body aur mind dono ko rest chahiye. Kuch karte ho jo study se bilkul alag ho? Koi outlet hai ya sab kuch academics ban gaya hai?
Yaar maine ek saal drop liya competitive exam ke liye. Agar is baar bhi nahi hua toh kya face karunga sabko. Pressure bohot hai.

Drop year liya aur ab do-or-die feel ho raha. That all-or-nothing pressure is crushing yaar. Par sunn, ek exam se pura future decide nahi hota. Backup plan hai kya agar things don't work? Options rakhne se panic kam hoti.
I look at my resume and it is so average. No amazing internships, no fancy projects, no awards. How am I supposed to compete with everyone else?

Staring at your resume and feeling invisible next to others. That comparison is making you doubt everything you have done. But average on paper does not mean average as a person. Skills matter more than brand names. What are you actually good at that resumes do not show?
My parents compare me to my cousin who is studying at a top university abroad. Every family call is torture. I feel like such a disappointment.

Every call is a reminder that you are being measured against someone else. That constant comparison from your own family - I can only imagine how much that hurts. But you are not a disappointment. Different paths do not mean lesser paths. Their comparison is unfair to you.
mujhe lagta hai main depression mein slip kar raha hoon sab mein interest khatam ho rahi hai bas mechanically function kar raha hoon

Interest sab cheezein mein khatam ho rahi aur bas robot ki tarah chal raha hai. Yaar that's serious. Depression ke signs ignore nahi karne chahiye. Please kisi professional se baat kar. Tele-MANAS 14416 pe call kar sakta hai. Mental health is just as important. Main hoon na but professional help bhi chahiye.
Yaar mera viva exam kal hai aur panic attacks aa rahe hain. Chest pain ho raha hai properly breathe nahi kar pa raha.

Panic attacks with chest pain and breathing issues - yaar that's your body in crisis. This is serious. Please kisi ko batao abhi. Medical help lo. Tele-MANAS 14416 pe call kar. Exam se zyada important hai tera health. Main hoon na.
I feel guilty every time I take a break. Like I should always be working on something. I have forgotten how to just relax.

Guilt for resting, forgotten how to relax. That hustle mentality has completely taken over. You are not a machine. Your brain needs downtime to actually function properly. Rest is not laziness, it is necessary. When did being kind to yourself become so hard?
Mere teacher ne class ke saamne bola tumse kuch nahi hoga life mein better hai time mat waste karo. Ab confidence zero hai.

Teacher ne sab ke saamne future hi question kar di. That public humiliation - I feel you yaar. Par ek bitter teacher ki opinion se tera potential decide nahi hota. Bohot log succeed kiye after being told they cannot. Kya tu believe karta hai unki baat?
Pata nahi yaar. Kabhi lagta hai galat hain wo, kabhi lagta hai sahi hi keh rahe the.

That doubt is eating you. Par sunn, struggle ka ek phase permanent truth nahi ban jaata. Tu abhi low phase mein hai. That does not define your capability. Ek cheez bata jo tu genuinely achha karta hai, kuch bhi.
I wake up with dread every morning. Another day of trying to meet impossible expectations. I want to stay in bed forever.

Waking up with dread daily, wanting to hide in bed forever. That heaviness the moment your day starts - I hear you. When getting up feels like torture, something needs to change. What is one expectation you could let go of today, just one small thing?
mera younger sibling mujhse successful hai aur parents hamesha compare karte rehte hain ab ghar pe rehna uncomfortable ho gaya hai

Younger sibling successful aur constant comparison. Apne hi ghar mein uncomfortable feel karna - yaar that's painful. Unhone tumhe invisible bana diya comparison mein. Kya kabhi seedhe bola hai unhe ki yeh kitna hurt karta hai? Sometimes parents genuinely nahi samajhte until you tell them.
Yaar main LinkedIn pe sab log dekh ke depressed feel hota hoon. Sab log itna achieve kar rahe aur main yahan zero progress pe.

LinkedIn scrolling se depression trigger ho raha. Social media ka yahi problem hai yaar - 90% struggle silently hote hain, sirf wins post hoti hain. Tu apna behind-the-scenes unke highlight reel se compare kar raha. Delete kar do app for a while. Mental peace matters more.
I do not know if I am burnt out or just lazy. I cannot get myself to do anything productive anymore. Maybe I am making excuses.

Confused between burnout and laziness, blaming yourself for making excuses. But burnout is not laziness. It is complete exhaustion. Laziness does not come with the guilt and desperation you are feeling right now. How long has this been going on?
Mere parents ka entire retirement plan meri success pe dependent hai. Agar main fail ho gaya toh unka future bhi kharab ho jayega.

Unka retirement tumhari success pe dependent. That is crushing weight to carry yaar. Par sunn, unka love transaction nahi hai. Have they actually said this or tu assume kar raha hai yeh burden? Sometimes we create pressure heavier than what exists.
I do not even know what success means anymore. Money? Happiness? Recognition? Everything feels meaningless and I am so confused.

Lost the definition of success itself, everything feels meaningless. That existential confusion is disorienting. Maybe this confusion is your mind telling you to define it for yourself, not follow others' scripts. What feels right in your gut, even if you cannot name it yet?
mujhe khud pe bharosa nahi raha kisi bhi decision lene mein darr lagta hai kyunki lagta hai sab galat ho jayega

Khud pe se bharosa chala gaya aur har decision se darr. That self-trust erosion is painful yaar. Par kya sach mein sab decisions galat hain ya tu sirf galat wale yaad rakh raha? Ek achha decision yaad kar jo liya tha life mein.
Yaar main apne family ka pehla graduate hoon. Sab ki nazar mujh pe hai aur pressure itna hai ki breathe karna mushkil ho jata hai.

Pehla graduate hona means pure family ke dreams tumhare shoulders pe. That weight makes breathing difficult - yaar I feel you. Par sunn, unka pyaar conditional nahi hoga results pe. Kabhi baat ki hai unse honestly ki kitna heavy lag raha hai yeh sab?
I watch my friends enjoy college life with parties and trips. I am here grinding like a monk. Am I wasting my youth chasing grades?

They are living it up while you are grinding alone. That FOMO of missing your youth is real and it hurts. But your circumstances are different and that is okay. You are not wasting it, just investing it differently. What is one small thing you could do just for joy this week?
Mere teacher ne bola tumse nahi hoga yeh exam crack karna. Ab dimaag mein bas yahi ghoomta rehta hai ki shayad sahi hi keh rahe the.

Teacher ka ek sentence stuck ho gaya dimaag mein aur ab self-doubt permanent guest ban gaya. Yaar that is painful. Par sunn, one person ka doubt tumhari capability decide nahi karta. Bohot log succeed kiye after being told they cannot. Kya tu apne pe believe kar sakta hai?
Honestly yaar kabhi kabhi believe kar pata hoon kabhi nahi. Results bhi toh support nahi kar rahe.

Results se confidence link ho gaya hai completely. Par one phase of struggle permanent reality nahi hai. Bad results means method change karna padega, capability nahi. Teacher wrong tha. Main hoon na, we will figure this out.
I cannot sleep the night before exams. Just lie awake worrying about failing and disappointing everyone. Then I go to the exam exhausted.

Sleep disappears before exams because worry takes over completely. Lying there imagining failure and disappointment all night. That spiral is exhausting you before you even start. Have you tried writing those worries down before bed? Getting them out of your head sometimes helps.
mera college ka syllabus itna outdated hai ki industry mein koi use nahi hai sab time waste ho raha hai

Syllabus outdated hai aur feel ho raha time waste ho raha. That realization ki jo seekh rahe wo future mein useless hai - bohot demotivating hai yaar. Par degree toh lena hai na. Side se relevant skills seekh sakte ho online. College formality, real learning apne haath mein hai.
Yaar maine galti se wrong exam hall mein entry kar li aur 30 minutes waste ho gaye. Ab panic ho raha hai ki time kam hai.

30 minutes waste hona jab har minute counts. That panic is real yaar. Par abhi jo time bacha hai usme panic se aur waste hoga. Deep breath le. Jo important questions hain pehle wo attempt kar. Fast likh. Tu still salvage kar sakta hai yeh. Main hoon na.
I spent my entire semester on a research paper and my professor just rejected it without proper explanation. All that work gone.

Entire semester gone in one rejection without even knowing why. That dismissal of your effort is brutal. You deserve detailed feedback. Push for it. If they refuse, go higher. Your work deserves proper evaluation, not just rejection.
Mere college mein attendance policy itni strict hai ki bimar hone pe bhi medical certificate accept nahi karte. Ab detention lag raha hai.

Medical certificate ke baad bhi nahi maan rahe aur detention. That is unreasonable yaar. Tu genuinely bimar tha. Parents ko involve kar ya higher authority se baat kar. Unreasonable rules ko challenge karna padta hai sometimes. Evidence hai toh fight kar.
My mental health medication makes me drowsy all day. I cannot focus during classes but I cannot skip the meds either. I am stuck.

Medication keeps you drowsy but you need it for your health. That impossible choice between functioning and surviving. Talk to your doctor about timing or dosage. Also tell your professors what is going on. Medical needs should be accommodated. Your health comes first.
mera result aane mein delay ho raha hai aur placement season chal raha bina result ke apply nahi kar sakta opportunities ja rahi hain

Result delay aur placement season chal raha. Unki delay se tera future affect ho raha. Yaar that is frustrating. College administration ko urgently push kar. Provisional certificate maang le. Their inefficiency se tumhare opportunities nahi jaane chahiye. Aggressive ho iss matter mein.
Yaar main roz decide karta hoon kal se seriously padhunga but next day phir procrastinate kar deta hoon. Control hi nahi ho raha.

Roz promise, next day procrastinate. That cycle is frustrating yaar. Par sunn, motivation se nahi hoga, discipline chahiye. Bohot chhota start kar - just 15 minutes. Big promises overwhelm karte hain. Small actions se habits banti hain. Try karke dekh.
I have to choose my major next week but I am completely lost. My parents want one thing and I want something else. I am paralyzed.

Major choosing with parent pressure one way and your heart another. That conflict is tearing you apart. This decision affects your life, not theirs. Research both thoroughly, talk to people. But ultimately, you have to live with this choice. What does your gut say?
Mere coaching teacher ne class ke saamne bola tum IIT crack nahi kar paoge time waste mat karo. Ab confidence zero hai.

Teacher ne publicly bola IIT crack nahi kar paoge. That dismissal in front of everyone - yaar bohot hurtful hai. Par teachers bhi galat ho sakte hain. History is full of people who succeeded after being told they cannot. Prove them wrong, give up mat kar. Kya tu believe karta hai unki baat?
Half mind mein believe ho jata hai kyunki results bhi toh ache nahi aa rahe.

Results se validate ho raha hai unka toxic comment. Par struggle ka phase permanent truth nahi banta. IIT tough hai sabke liye. Approach change karna padega shayad. Main hoon na, we will work on this together.
I cannot afford coaching classes that everyone else is taking. I am trying to self-study but it feels impossible. I am at such a disadvantage.

Cannot afford coaching while everyone else has it. That financial disadvantage is real and it hurts. Self-study is harder but not impossible. Free YouTube lectures, online study groups, free resources exist. Your financial situation does not determine your capability. You can do this differently.
mera exam center bohot door hai traveling mein hi itna time jayega ki revision nahi kar paunga properly

Exam center door hone se travel time revision time kha jayega. Ek din pehle nearby kisi ke ghar rukh ja if possible. Ya travel mein quick notes dekh le. Plan smart kar taki distance performance affect na kare. Tu manage kar lega yaar.
Yaar mera project guide kabhi available nahi hota. Meeting cancel karte rehte hain last minute aur deadline aa rahi hai.

Guide unavailable rehte hain aur last minute cancellations jab deadline approach kar rahi. That is so frustrating yaar. Email everything you need feedback on so there is paper trail. If it continues, escalate to department. Tera work suffer nahi hona chahiye unki unavailability se.
I do not understand my own notes anymore. I wrote them during class but now they make absolutely no sense to me.

Notes not making sense later happens when you write too fast without processing. Try rewriting them properly soon after class while it is fresh. Or ask someone to share theirs this time. You will figure out a better system moving forward.
My group members are not responding to any messages. Deadline is tomorrow and I am doing everything alone. This is so unfair.

Group ghosting you before deadline. That is completely irresponsible. Do what you can manage alone but tell your professor what happened. Screenshot those unanswered messages as proof. Their lack of effort should not tank your grade. You did your part.
mera term paper topic change karna pad raha kyunki data nahi mil raha research ke liye ab time bhi kam hai stress bohot hai

Topic change karna padega kyunki data nahi mil raha aur time bhi tight. That is stressful yaar - pehle ka kaam bhi waste laga aur naya bhi karna hai. Naya topic already socha hai accessible data ke saath? Professor se extension maang sakta hai explaining situation?
My parents say they sold their land for my education. Every argument ends with 'we sacrificed everything for you'. I feel suffocated.

That line - 'we sacrificed everything' - being used as emotional leverage is suffocating. Their sacrifice was their choice but now it feels like a debt you can never repay. Does every conversation come back to what they gave up?
mera younger brother doctor ban gaya aur ab maa baap kehte hain kam se kam uske jitna toh kar lo beta humne dono pe barabar kharch kiya hai

Bhai doctor ban gaya aur ab tumse bhi wahi expect kar rahe. That comparison stings different when it's your own sibling yaar. Barabar kharch kiya matlab barabar results chahiye - yeh equation unfair hai. Tu kya karna chahta hai apne liye, unki expectation se alag?
Yaar mere maa baap ne apni retirement savings mere MBA ke liye laga di hai. Ab lagta hai main unka future barbaad kar dunga agar kuch nahi kar paya.

Retirement savings tumhari MBA mein laga di - that's their entire future security riding on your success. Bohot heavy hai yeh pressure yaar. Par sunn, unka pyaar transaction nahi hai. Kya unhone kabhi directly bola hai yeh ya tu assume kar raha hai yeh weight?
mere pitaji kehte hain beta hum gaon se aaye hain tumhe padhane shahar mein ab tum humara sapna poora karo IAS bano

Gaon se shahar aaye tumhe padhane aur ab IAS banna chahiye - unka sapna tumhare kandhe pe. That generational dream is heavy to carry yaar. Par yeh unka sapna hai ya tumhara bhi? Kya tumne kabhi apni actual wish batayi hai unhe?
Yaar meri maa roz subah pooja mein meri success ke liye pray karti hai. Ab feel hota hai agar fail ho gaya toh unki prarthna bhi fail ho jayegi.

Maa roz pray karti hai aur tu feel kar raha hai unki prayers fail ho jayengi agar tu fail hua. That's such twisted guilt yaar. Unki love conditional nahi hai tumhare results pe. Kya kabhi direct baat hui hai unse ki yeh pressure feel ho raha hai?
Nahi yaar. Wo itni mehnat karti hain mere liye. Main aur burden nahi dena chahta unhe apni problems se.

Silently suffer kar raha hai taaki unpe burden na pade. Par yaar, wo prefer karengi ki tu communicate kare rather than quietly break. Gentle conversation try kar. They might surprise you with understanding.
My dad keeps saying 'I was working at your age, you're just studying'. Like my stress doesn't matter because I'm not earning yet.

Your stress being dismissed because you're not earning - that comparison across generations is unfair. Working and studying are different kinds of hard. Does he see academic pressure as real stress or just 'easy life' compared to his past?
Yaar mere parents ka social status meri degree pe depend karta hai. Function mein relatives se baat karne se pehle wo meri achievements check karte hain.

Unka social standing tumhari achievements pe depend karta hai - tu unki trophy ban gaya hai. Function mein bhi performance anxiety because tumhe shine karna padta hai. That's exhausting yaar. Kya tumhare liye value hai ya sirf unke relatives ko dikhane ke liye?
I told my parents I want to take a gap year and they said 'gap year is for rich kids, not for us'. Now I feel guilty for even asking.

Gap year dismissed as a rich kid luxury - your need for a break got shut down with class guilt. Now you feel bad for even wanting time to figure things out. But burnout doesn't care about economic class. What made you want the gap year in the first place?
meri maa kehti hain beta maine tumhare liye apne sapne chod diye the ab tum mere sapne poore karo teacher ban jao

Maa ne apne sapne chod diye the aur ab tumse unke sapne poore karne ki expectation. Par yaar, wo unki choice thi apne sapne chodna. Tu unke unfinished dreams complete karne ka tool nahi hai. Kya teacher banna tumhara interest hai ya sirf unki wish?
Yaar mere papa ne apni kidney bech di boli thi mazak mein par ab wo guilt trip ke liye use karte hain. Kehte hain itna kiya hai tumhare liye.

Papa ki sacrifice ab emotional weapon ban gayi hai har baat mein. That guilt trip is toxic yaar - pyaar dikhana aur guilt dena dono different hain. Kya har argument mein yeh same card aata hai ki humne itna kiya?
Haan yaar har baar. Kuch bhi bolo toh yahi line aa jati hai. Ab toh baat karne se bhi darr lagta hai.
Baat karna hi scary ho gaya kyunki response pata hai - sacrifice guilt trip. That's not healthy communication yaar. Tu constantly walking on eggshells. Koi aur family member hai jo mediate kar sake?
mere pitaji kehte hain ladke ko engineering ya doctor banna chahiye baaki sab ladkiyon ka kaam hai main arts mein interested hoon par bol nahi sakta

Pitaji ke liye arts means ladkiyon ka kaam - that gendered expectation on top of career pressure. Tumhari actual interest voice hi nahi kar sakta ghar mein. That suppression is painful yaar. Kya koi hai ghar mein jo support karega agar baat rakho?
Yaar meri family mujhe 'last hope' bulati hai kyunki baki sab cousins ne disappoint kar diya hai. Ab sab ki nazar mujhpe hai.

Last hope ka tag laga diya hai family ne - that's massive pressure yaar. Puri family ki redemption tumhare shoulders pe. Sabne fail kiya toh tumhe prove karna hai family worthy hai. Kya tumne kabhi bola hai ki yeh expectation kitna heavy hai?
My parents planned my entire life before I was even born. They had my career decided when I was five. I feel like I have no choice in my own life.

Your life was scripted before you could even speak. That loss of agency in your own story is suffocating. You're just following their screenplay. Have you ever tried deviating from the plan or is it too scary to even attempt?
mere maa baap joint family mein rehte hain aur relatives ke saamne unhe proud feel hona chahiye isliye mujhpe pressure hai achha karna ka

Joint family mein unhe relatives ke saamne proud feel hona chahiye aur wo pressure tumpe. Tu unki social reputation ka carrier ban gaya hai. Functions mein tumhari achievements unki identity hai. Kabhi socha hai ki tu khud ke liye kya chahta hai unke pride se alag?
Yaar mere papa retire ho gaye hain aur unhone apni pension mere coaching fees mein laga di. Kehte hain beta yeh hamara last investment hai.

Papa ki pension tumhari coaching mein - unka last investment tu hai. That financial and emotional weight combined. If coaching doesn't work, unki retirement security affect hogi. Bohot scary hai yaar. Kya backup plan hai kuch ya all eggs in one basket?
Nahi yaar koi backup nahi. Wo kehte hain IIT crack kar loge toh sab set ho jayega. Par main confident nahi hoon.

All in on IIT aur tu confident bhi nahi hai. That mismatch between their certainty and your doubt is creating massive anxiety. Kya unhone kabhi pucha ki tu kya chahta hai ya seedha path decide kar diya?
My dad says 'I gave up my business dreams to feed you, now you give up your silly hobbies and focus on CA'. I feel like I owe him my entire life.

His unfulfilled dreams becoming your debt - that transaction mindset is toxic. He frames his parenting as sacrifice you must repay by giving up yourself. But raising you was his choice. Does every conversation feel like a guilt invoice?
meri maa ne mujhe bachpan se doctor banne ke liye taiyaar kiya tha ab main biology mein weak hoon par wo sunna hi nahi chahti

Bachpan se doctor banne ki training di aur ab biology weak hai but maa sunne ko ready nahi. Unhone itna invest kiya is dream mein ki tumhara struggle accept karna unke liye tough hai. Kya kabhi directly bola hai ki doctor nahi banana?
Yaar family function mein sab relatives mujhse milte hain toh pehle maa baap se poochte hain beta kaise kar raha hai studies mein. Meri value bas marks hai.

Functions mein bhi pehla sawaal marks ka - teri value report card se measure hoti hai. Tu as a person invisible hai, sirf percentage visible hai. That reduction to grades is dehumanizing yaar. Kya kabhi kisi ne pucha ki tu actually kaisa hai as a person?
mere papa ke dost ka beta IIT mein hai aur ab wo mujhe usse compare karte rehte hain kehte hain dekho wo kaise kar raha hai tum kya kar rahe ho

Papa ke dost ke bete se constant comparison. Wo IIT mein hai aur tumse har baat mein compare hota hai. That other kid has become the standard you can never meet. Kabhi papa se bola hai ki yeh comparison kitna hurt karta hai?
Yaar meri maa ne apna mangalsutra bech diya tha meri school fees bhar ke liye. Ab wo har baat mein yeh yaad dilati hain.

Maa ne mangalsutra becha tha fees ke liye aur ab yeh weapon ban gaya hai har argument mein. Unka sacrifice genuine tha but ab emotional manipulation ka tool hai. Kya kabhi normally baat ho paati hai bina is guilt trip ke?
Nahi yaar. Choti choti baat pe bhi yeh same story aa jati hai. Ab main kuch bhi maangne se pehle das baar sochta hoon.

Choti baat pe bhi wahi story repeat hoti hai aur tu ab maangne se darr gaya hai. That's not healthy parent-child relationship yaar. Tu constantly guilt mein jee raha hai. This needs to be addressed gently but firmly.
My mother emotionally blackmails me saying 'if you don't become a doctor, I'll die of heartbreak'. How do I deal with this level of manipulation?

That's straight up emotional blackmail - threatening her life over your career choice. That manipulation is toxic and unfair. You're being held hostage by guilt. Has she always used this tactic or is this new?
Yaar mere maa baap ne meri shaadi tak postpone kar rakhi hai jab tak main settle nahi ho jata. Ab unka bhi life on hold hai mere career ki wajah se.

Unki life decisions bhi tumhari career pe hold hain - shaadi postpone, relatives ko muh dikhana postpone. Tumhari success se unka pura life resume hoga. That pressure is immense yaar. Kya tumne kabhi bola hai unhe ki yeh burden bohot heavy hai?
My father tracks my study hours daily. If I study less than 10 hours, he gives me the silent treatment. I'm exhausted but scared to take breaks.

Ten hours daily or silent treatment - that's controlling and exhausting. You're scared to even take breaks. That fear of disappointing him is running your life. Has it always been this strict or did it escalate over time?
meri maa roz mandir jaake meri success ki prarthna karti hain aur prasad bhi laati hain kehti hain bhagwan se maanga hai tumhare liye ab tumhe karna padega

Maa roz mandir jaake tumhare liye prarthna karti hain aur ab wo bhi responsibility ban gayi hai. Bhagwan se maanga hai matlab tumhe deliver karna padega. Even spirituality guilt trip ban gaya hai. Kya kabhi bola hai unhe ki yeh pressure create kar raha hai?
My mom tells all relatives that I'll definitely get into IIT. Now I'm terrified of the shame if I don't. She's already celebrating something I haven't achieved.

She's already announced your IIT admission to everyone before you've even taken the exam. Now the pressure isn't just from her but from the entire extended family expecting it. That premature celebration has trapped you. What happens in her mind if you don't get in?
mere pitaji ne apni naukri chod di thi taaki wo mujhe coaching ke liye door shahar le ja saken ab agar main clear nahi kar paya toh unki job bhi gayi mera career bhi

Pitaji ne naukri chod di tumhare coaching ke liye - unka career sacrifice kar diya tumhare career ke liye. Agar clear nahi hua toh dono ki life affect hogi. Yaar yeh toh bohot zyada pressure hai. All in bet kar diya hai unhone. Kya plan B hai kuch ya completely committed hain is path pe?
Yaar mere parents ne mere naam se loan liya hai padhai ke liye. Kehte hain beta yeh tumhara loan hai tumhe hi chukana padega successful hoke.

Loan tumhare naam se liya aur kehte hain tumhe chukana padega. That financial burden clearly stated - tu legally aur emotionally dono tarah se responsible hai. Kitna amount hai aur kab tak chukana hai? Yeh clarity hai ya open-ended pressure?
My parents fight with each other and blame me. Dad says 'you wanted expensive coaching for him' and mom says 'you wanted him in this field'. I feel like I'm destroying their marriage.

Their marriage problems being blamed on you - that's not fair at all. Their fights about your education making you feel responsible for their relationship. But their issues are between them, not caused by you. Do they fight often about you or is this recent?
Yaar mere ghar mein ab normal conversations nahi hoti. Har baat mein studies, career, future hi aa jata hai. Family time bhi pressure time ban gaya hai.

Normal family conversations khatam ho gayi hain sab studies-career mein convert ho jata hai. Even relaxing time pressure time hai. That constant single-track focus is suffocating yaar. Kya kabhi try kiya hai topic change karne ka ya wo wapas same baat pe aa jate hain?
My parents monitor my phone to check if I'm wasting time. They've installed tracking apps. I'm 22 but have no privacy. I feel suffocated.

At 22, being tracked like a child - that lack of privacy is suffocating. They don't trust you to manage your own time. That control is about their anxiety, not your capability. Have you tried talking about boundaries or is that conversation impossible?
mere pitaji kehte hain beta tumhare paida hone ki khushi tab hogi jab tum kuch ban jaoge abhi tak toh sirf kharch ho rahe ho

Pitaji ne bola tumhare hone ki khushi tab hogi jab tum kuch ban jaoge. That conditional love - tu abhi sirf expense hai, value tab hogi jab achieve karoge. Yaar that's deeply hurtful. Kya hamesha aise baatein karte hain ya kabhi kabhi supportive bhi hote?
Yaar mere maa baap kehte hain humne tumhare liye apna ghar bech diya ab tumhari zimmedari hai humara khayal rakhna pressure bohot hai

Arre yaar, ghar bech diya tumhari padhai ke liye aur ab wo responsibility tumpe daal rahe hain. That's crushing weight to carry. Unka sacrifice guilt ban gaya hai instead of support. Kya kabhi bola hai unhe honestly ki yeh sunke kitna burden feel hota hai?
My parents say they sacrificed their dreams for me. Every argument ends with 'we gave up everything for you'. I feel like I can never repay this debt.

That line - 'we gave up everything' - being used as leverage is exhausting. Their sacrifice was their choice but now it feels like a debt you can never clear. Does every disagreement circle back to what they sacrificed?
mera chhota bhai doctor ban gaya aur ab maa baap kehte hain kam se kam uske jitna toh karo beta humne dono pe barabar kharch kiya hai

Bhai doctor ban gaya aur ab tumse bhi wahi expect kar rahe. That sibling comparison stings different yaar. Barabar kharch matlab barabar results - yeh equation unfair hai. Tu kya karna chahta hai apne liye, unki expectation se alag?
Yaar mere parents ne retirement savings mere coaching mein laga di hai. Lagta hai agar main fail hua toh unka future bhi barbaad ho jayega.

Retirement savings tumhari coaching mein - unka pura future security tumhari success pe depend karta hai. Bohot heavy pressure hai yaar. Par sunn, unka pyaar transaction nahi hai. Kya unhone directly bola hai yeh ya tu assume kar raha hai itna weight?
mere pitaji kehte hain beta hum gaon se aaye tumhe padhane shahar mein ab tum humara sapna poora karo IAS bano

Gaon se shahar aaye tumhe padhane aur ab IAS officer banna chahiye - unka generational dream tumhare kandhe pe. That's heavy to carry yaar. Par yeh unka sapna hai ya tumhara bhi? Kabhi apni actual wish batayi hai unhe?
Yaar meri maa roz subah temple jaake meri success ke liye pray karti hai. Ab lagta hai agar fail hua toh unki prayers bhi fail ho jayengi.

Maa roz pray karti hai aur tu feel kar raha hai unki prayers fail ho jayengi agar tu fail hua. That's twisted guilt yaar. Unka love conditional nahi hai tumhare results pe. Kya kabhi direct baat hui hai unse ki yeh pressure feel ho raha hai?
Nahi yaar. Wo itni mehnat karti hain mere liye. Main aur tension nahi dena chahta unhe apni problems ke saath.

Silently suffer kar raha taaki unpe burden na pade. Par yaar, wo prefer karengi ki tu baat kare rather than quietly tootna. Gentle conversation try kar ek baar. They might surprise you with understanding.
My father keeps saying 'I was working at your age, you're just studying'. Like my stress doesn't count because I'm not earning.

Your stress being dismissed because you're not earning yet - that comparison across generations is unfair. Working and studying are different kinds of hard. Does he see academic pressure as real stress or just easy life compared to his past?
Yaar mere parents ka social status meri achievements pe depend karta hai. Functions mein jaane se pehle wo check karte hain ki main kya bolne layak kiya hai.

Unka social standing tumhari achievements pe depend hai - tu unki trophy ban gaya hai basically. Functions mein bhi performance anxiety kyunki shine karna padta hai. That's exhausting yaar. Kya tumhare liye hai yeh success ya sirf relatives ko dikhane ke liye?
I told my parents I want a gap year and they said 'gap year is for rich kids, not for people like us'. Now I feel guilty for even wanting a break.

Gap year dismissed as rich kid luxury - your need for a break got shut down with class guilt. Now you feel bad for even wanting time to breathe. But burnout doesn't care about economic class. What made you want the gap year originally?
meri maa kehti hain beta maine tumhare liye apne sapne chod diye the ab tum mere sapne poore karo teacher ban jao

Maa ne apne sapne chod diye aur ab tumse unke sapne poorne ki expectation. Par yaar, wo unki choice thi apne sapne chodna. Tu unke unfinished dreams ka vessel nahi hai. Kya teacher banna tumhara interest hai ya sirf unki wish?
Yaar mere papa apni kidney bechne ki baat karte hain mazak mein but ab wo guilt trip ke liye use karte hain. Kehte hain dekho itna sacrifice kiya tumhare liye.

Papa ki sacrifice ab emotional weapon ban gayi hai. That guilt trip har baat mein ghusedna is toxic yaar. Pyaar dikhana aur guilt dena dono alag cheez hain. Kya har disagreement mein yeh same card khelta hai ki humne itna kiya?
Haan yaar almost har baar. Kuch bhi bolo toh yahi line ready rehti hai. Ab toh bolne se pehle das baar sochta hoon.
Baat karna hi scary ho gaya kyunki response pata hai - sacrifice guilt trip. That's not healthy yaar. Tu constantly walking on eggshells. Koi aur family member hai jo understand karta hai situation?
My mother compares me to her friend's daughter constantly. Every call is 'Sharma aunty's daughter did this, what are you doing with your life'.

Every call is comparison to Sharma aunty's daughter - that constant measuring against someone else is draining. You're never enough because someone somewhere is always doing 'better'. Have you told her how these comparisons make you feel or do you just take it silently?
mere pitaji kehte hain ladke ko engineering ya medical karna chahiye baaki sab ladkiyon ka kaam hai main arts interested hoon par bol nahi sakta

Pitaji ke liye arts matlab ladkiyon ka kaam - that gendered expectation on top of career pressure. Tumhari actual interest voice hi nahi kar sakta. That suppression hurts yaar. Koi hai ghar mein jo tumhari side lega agar baat rakho?
Yaar family mujhe 'last hope' bulati hai kyunki baaki cousins ne disappoint kar diya. Ab puri family ki nazar mujhpe hai redemption ke liye.

Last hope ka tag - that's massive pressure yaar. Puri family ki redemption tumhare shoulders pe. Sabne fail kiya toh tumhe prove karna hai family worthy hai. Kabhi bola hai unhe ki yeh label kitna heavy hai?
My parents planned my entire life before I could even speak. Career decided when I was five. I feel like I have no say in my own life.

Your life was scripted before you could voice an opinion. That loss of agency in your own story is suffocating. You're just following their screenplay. Have you ever tried deviating from the plan or is it too scary to attempt?
mere maa baap joint family mein rehte hain aur relatives ke saamne unhe proud feel hona chahiye isliye mujhpe bohot pressure hai

Joint family mein unhe relatives ke saamne proud feel hona chahiye - wo pressure tumpe convert ho gaya. Tu unki social reputation ka carrier ban gaya hai. Functions mein tumhari achievements unki identity. Kabhi socha hai tu khud ke liye kya chahta hai unke pride se alag?

Papa ki pension tumhari coaching mein - unka last investment tu hai. That financial and emotional weight combined is crushing. If coaching doesn't work, unki retirement security affect hogi. Bohot scary hai yaar. Backup plan hai kuch ya all eggs in one basket?
Nahi koi backup nahi. Kehte hain IIT crack kar loge toh sab theek ho jayega. Par main confident nahi hoon bilkul.
All in on IIT aur tu confident bhi nahi. That gap between their certainty and your doubt is creating massive anxiety. Kabhi pucha unhone ki tu kya chahta hai ya directly path decide kar diya?

His unfulfilled dreams becoming your debt - that transactional mindset is toxic. He frames parenting as sacrifice you must repay by erasing yourself. But raising you was his choice. Does every conversation feel like an invoice of what you owe?
meri maa ne naukri chod di thi meri behen ko sambhalne aur kehti hain beta tumhe successful hona padega warna mera sacrifice bekaar jayega

Maa ne naukri chod di behen ke liye aur ab wo sacrifice tumhare success pe depend hai. Unka tyaag bekaar na jaaye isliye tumhe prove karna padega. Par wo unka choice tha yaar. Tu responsible nahi unke career decisions ke liye. Samajhti hain wo yeh?
Yaar ghar mein ab normal baat nahi hoti. Har conversation studies career future mein convert ho jata hai. Family time bhi exam prep discussion hai.

Normal family conversations extinct ho gayi hain - sab studies-career mode. Even chill time pressure time hai. That single-track focus is suffocating yaar. Kabhi topic change karne ki koshish ki ya wo wapas same point pe aa jate hain?
My parents track my phone to check if I'm wasting time. Installed monitoring apps. I'm twenty two but have zero privacy. I feel suffocated.

At twenty two being tracked like a child - that invasion of privacy is suffocating. They don't trust you to manage your own time. That control is their anxiety, not about your capability. Have you tried having a boundaries conversation or is that impossible?
mere pitaji kehte hain beta tumhare paida hone ki khushi tab hogi jab kuch ban jaoge abhi tak toh sirf expense ho rahe ho

Pitaji kehte hain tumhare hone ki khushi tab hogi jab achieve karoge. That conditional love - tu abhi sirf expense hai, value tab hogi jab successful hoge. Yaar that's deeply painful. Hamesha aise harsh baatein karte hain ya kabhi supportive bhi hote?
Yaar mere parents ne loan liya hai mere naam se education ke liye. Kehte hain beta yeh tumhara loan hai tumhe hi chukana padega.

Loan tumhare naam se aur kehte hain tumhe chukana padega - that financial burden explicitly stated. Tu legally aur emotionally dono tarah responsible hai. Kitna amount hai aur timeline kya hai? Clear hai ya open-ended pressure?
My parents fight and blame me. Dad says 'you wanted expensive college for him' and mom says 'you chose this path'. I feel like I'm destroying their marriage.

Their marriage problems being blamed on you - that's completely unfair. Their fights about your education making you feel responsible for their relationship. But their issues are between them, not caused by you. Do they fight often like this or is it recent?
meri maa roz kaam par jaane se pehle meri photo ko namaste karti hain aur kehti hain bhagwan kare beta safal ho jaye ab fail nahi ho sakta main

Maa roz tumhari photo ko namaste karti hain aur pray karti hain. Even that ritual ab pressure ban gaya hai - fail hone ka option hi nahi hai kyunki unki daily prayers ka hisaab hai. Yeh devotion love hai ya burden? Kabhi talk kiya hai unse about this?
Yaar papa kehte hain main tumhare umar mein factory mein kaam karta tha tumhe kya pata struggle. Mere mental stress ko seriously nahi lete.

Papa ka physical labor dismiss kar raha hai tumhara mental stress. Unka struggle vs tumhara struggle - dono valid hain par wo sirf apna dekhte hain. Academic pressure ko struggle nahi maante. Explain karne ki koshish ki ya wo sunne ko ready nahi?
Tried tha par kehte hain yeh sab modern bahaane hain. Unke time pe mental health ka concept tha hi nahi.

Unke generation mein mental health taboo thi toh ab bhi dismiss kar dete. Par that doesn't make your pain less real yaar. Generational gap hai. Koi aur family member hai jo actually understand karta hai?
My mom told everyone I'll get into a top university. Now I'm terrified of the shame if I don't. She celebrated before I even applied.

She announced your admission before you even applied - now the pressure isn't just from her but from everyone expecting it. That premature celebration trapped you. What happens in her mind if you don't get in? Has that conversation ever happened?
mere pitaji ne naukri chod di thi taaki mujhe coaching ke liye door le ja saken ab agar clear nahi hua toh unka career bhi gaya mera bhi

Pitaji ne job chod di tumhare coaching ke liye - unka career sacrifice kar diya. Agar crack nahi hua toh dono ki life derail ho jayegi. Yaar bohot zyada hai yeh. All in kar diya hai. Plan B hai kuch ya completely committed on this one path?
My parents wake me up at five AM every day for study. If I'm tired they say 'success doesn't sleep'. I'm exhausted but scared to say no.

Five AM wake up daily with no room for rest - that grind culture is burning you out. Success doesn't sleep but humans do. You're scared to even voice exhaustion. Has it always been this intense or did it escalate over time?
mere maa baap ne apni shaadi postpone kar rakhi hai jab tak main settle nahi ho jata unka life bhi hold pe hai

Unki life decisions tumhari career pe hold hain - unki khushi postponed jab tak tu settle nahi hota. Tumhari success se unka pura life resume hoga. That's immense pressure yaar. Kabhi bola hai unhe ki yeh burden bohot heavy lag raha hai?
Yaar mere parents hamesha kehte hain log kya kahenge if I don't succeed. Unka darr society ka hai mere future ka nahi.

Log kya kahenge - unka main concern society ka judgment hai, not your actual wellbeing. Tu unki social reputation protect karne ka tool ban gaya hai. That realization stings yaar. Kabhi confront kiya hai unhe is pe ya too risky lagta?
My mom cries emotional blackmail. Says 'if you don't become engineer my life is wasted'. How do I deal with this manipulation?

That's straight up emotional blackmail - her life being wasted if you don't comply. That manipulation tactic is toxic. You're being held hostage by guilt. Has she always done this or is it getting worse as decisions approach?
mere ghar mein paisa tight hai aur pitaji kehte hain beta pura parivaar tumpe depend hai agar safal nahi hue sab ka bhavishya andhere mein

Pura parivaar depend hai tumpe - sabka bhavishya tumhari success pe. That's the entire family's future on your shoulders yaar. Koi backup earning source nahi hai ghar mein ya sab expectation tumse? Yeh toh bohot zyada hai.
Yaar mere papa daily study hours count karte hain. Agar das ghante se kam hua toh silent treatment milta hai darr lagta hai breaks lene se.

Daily ten hours monitoring aur kam hua toh silent treatment - that's controlling behavior yaar. Tu breaks lene se darr gaya hai. Fear-based motivation destroys more than it builds. Always this strict tha ya gradually badh gaya?
Exam paas aane ke baad aur strict ho jate hain. Normal time mein thoda better hota hai.

Exam season mein intensity badh jati hai. Par yaar constant monitoring isn't healthy. Communication try kar ki yeh approach tumhe demotivate kar raha, motivate nahi. Wo sunenge ya defensive ho jayenge?
My parents don't allow me to go out with friends. They say 'focus now, enjoy later'. But later never comes. I feel like I'm missing my youth.

Focus now enjoy later - but later keeps getting postponed. You're watching your youth pass by from inside restrictions. That fear of missing out is real. Have you tried negotiating small freedoms or is it completely non-negotiable?
meri maa mandir mein roz meri success ki kasam khaati hain ab lagta unki kasam tootegi agar main fail hua

Maa mandir mein kasam khaati hain tumhari success ki - even religious vows ab pressure ban gaye. Unki kasam tootne ka guilt tumpe. That's heavy emotional manipulation yaar, chahe unintentional ho. Kabhi bola hai unhe ki yeh sunke kya feel hota?
Yaar mere relatives function mein pehle parents se poochte hain beta studies mein kaise kar raha. Meri value bas percentage hai.

Functions mein bhi pehla question marks ka - teri value report card se measure hoti hai. Tu as a person invisible, sirf grades visible. That reduction to numbers is dehumanizing yaar. Kabhi kisi ne pucha ki tu actually kaisa hai beyond academics?
Yaar mere papa ne apni scooty bech di mere laptop ke liye ab wo barish mein bheeg ke office jate hain main laptop khol ke guilt mein rota hoon

Papa barish mein bheeg rahe hain office jaane ke liye aur tu laptop dekh ke ro raha. Wo sacrifice ab har baar screen on karte waqt dikhta hai. Kabhi bola hai unhe ki yeh guilt handle nahi ho raha ya chup chaap jhel raha hai?

My mom cancelled her cataract surgery to save money for my entrance exam coaching. Now she struggles to read and I see her squinting in pain but she smiles and says I'm fine beta you focus on studies.

She's squinting in pain daily because surgery money went to your coaching. Watching her struggle while she tells you to focus - that smile hiding pain must tear you apart. Has she scheduled it for later or is she just indefinitely postponing her own health?
mere pitaji ne apne dost se teen lakh udhar liye the mere college ke liye ab wo dost har mahine byaaj maangne aata hai aur papa sar jhuka lete hain main dekh nahi sakta
Papa apne dost ke saamne sar jhukate hain har mahine byaaj dete waqt - wo izzat tumhare college fees mein gayi. Tumhare saamne hota hai yeh ya baad mein pata chalta hai? Kitna time ho gaya aise?
Yaar meri maa ne apni kidney stone ki surgery delay kar di kyunki us time meri semester fees bharni thi ab doctor kehte hain serious ho gaya hai operation zaroori hai

Maa ne surgery delay ki tumhare fees ke liye ab condition serious ho gayi. Wo delay ab emergency ban gaya aur tumhe lagta hoga ki tumhari wajah se. Medical urgency ko ignore karna kisi ke liye bhi hona nahi chahiye tha. Operation ka kya plan hai ab?
Ab loan lena pad raha hai operation ke liye aur wo bhi tumhare hi fees se zyada. Mujhe lagta main kuch nahi kar paya sahi.

Ab loan operation ke liye aur tumhe lag raha sab tumhari galti. Par yaar wo choice unki thi delay karne ki. Medical emergency ko prioritize karna tumhari zimmedari nahi thi. Guilt le raha par decision tera nahi tha.

My father walks ten kilometers daily to save bus fare that money goes into my tuition savings jar. I found the jar hidden in the cupboard with a note saying for my sons future. I broke down reading it.

Ten kilometers daily walk to save bus fare for your tuition - finding that jar with the note must have shattered you. His feet hurting for your future sitting in that jar. When did you find this and have you been able to talk to him since?
mere papa apne danton ka ilaaj nahi karwa rahe kehte hain abhi manage kar lunga pehle tera NEET ka form bharna hai ab unhe khane mein bhi dard hota hai

Papa dard mein khana kha rahe hain kyunki dental treatment postpone kar diya tumhare NEET form ke liye. Har bite mein unhe takleef aur tu dekh raha. Kya kabhi force kiya hai unhe ki pehle apna dikhao ya wo sun hi nahi?
Yaar meri maa ne ghar ka AC bech diya garmi mein taaki mera hostel ka advance deposit bhar sake ab sab pareshaan hain lekin kehte hain koi baat nahi beta

AC bech diya garmi mein aur sab suffer kar rahe but tumse kehte koi baat nahi. Wo discomfort daily reminder hai ki tumhare liye kya choda. Ghar jaate waqt kaisa feel hota sabko garmi mein tadapta dekh ke?

My parents stopped eating non veg completely to save money for my exam fees. Dad loved his Sunday chicken but now he just stares at the menu in restaurants and orders dal. The sacrifice in his eyes kills me.

Sunday chicken gone so your exam fees can be paid - watching him stare at the menu then order dal instead. That small joy erased from his life for your education. Does he ever talk about missing it or just silently adjusted?
mere papa ne naye chashme nahi banwaye do saal se purane se kaam chala rahe hain kehte hain dekh toh leta hoon bas thoda dhundla hai mere college ki fees zyada thi

Do saal se purane chashme se kaam chala rahe dhundla dikhne ke baawajood - tumhari fees zyada important thi unki aankhon se. Accident ka darr nahi lagta tumhe ki wo theek se dekh nahi pa rahe? Kitna dhundla hai actually?
Yaar meri maa ne apne insulin injections ka brand change kar diya sasta wala lene laga hai diabetes hai unhe par kehti hain kaam chal jata hai bacha hua paisa tere books mein lag jata
