College final year hai. Sab decide kar rahe field. Main abhi bhi confused. Time khatam ho raha decision ka.

Damn, final year aur time running out jab sab decide kar chuke - that clock ticking louder than clarity. Yaar koi bhi field leke start kar sakta, change bhi ho sakta baad mein. Paralysis se better hai imperfect action.
Mechanical engineer hoon but environment activist banna chahta. Completely opposite fields. Degree waste hogi switch karne pe. Par current field mein soul nahi hai.

Yaar mechanical engineer but environment activist banna - opposite fields aur degree waste feel hoga. Current mein soul nahi but switching means starting over. Can you bridge both somehow - like environmental engineering or is activism specifically what calls you?
Environmental engineering bhi engineering hi hai. Main activism karna chahta ground level, policy change.

Are toh engineering nahi chahiye at all - activism, policy work when hands-on change chahiye. That's completely different path. Yaar degree waste nahi hogi, background toh rahega. Kya activism mein koi entry points dekhe realistic?
Competitive exam prepare kar raha 3 saal se. Clear nahi ho raha. Ab doubt hai ki yahi karna chahiye ya nahi. But 3 years chhod ke kya karunga? Sunk cost.

Mere dost, 3 saal invest kiye exam mein but clear nahi - doubt hai continue karna ya quit but 3 years chhod dena hard. Sunk cost fallacy real hai. Apart from time invested, do you still want this or just continuing because you started?
Honestly pata nahi ab kya chahta hoon. Bohot thak gaya hoon trying se. But chhod diya toh 3 saal bekaar.
Uff, thak gaya aur pata nahi kya chahiye - exhaustion ne clarity bhi le li. 3 saal bekaar nahi yaar, seekha toh hoga kuch. Continuing out of tiredness bhi toh waste hai na agar dil nahi?
HR field mein hoon but technical side jaana chahta coding seekh ke. Age 26 hai. Too late to switch fields? Everyone says after 25 switches are difficult.

Man, HR mein ho but coding seekh ke technical jaana - 26 at age and people say too late for switches. That age anxiety when everyone's timeline says you're stuck. But 26 isn't too late honestly, people switch later too. Why coding specifically pulling you?
HR repetitive lagta. Coding mein problem-solving interesting lagti. But starting from scratch at 26 feels late.

HR boring ho gaya aur coding interesting - but 26 pe scratch se starting scary. Yaar tech mein 30+ pe bhi log start karte. Late sirf dimaag mein hai. Kya coding try ki hai thodi to see if actually enjoy karta?
Pehle banking jaana tha, phir IT, ab consulting interesting lagta. Har saal interest change ho raha. Commitment issues hain kya mere career mein? Confused kyun hoon itna?

Yaar banking, phir IT, ab consulting - har saal change when interest evolves. Commitment issues feel hota career mein. But exploring isn't commitment issues yaar, finding what fits. What's common in all three that attracts you?
Honestly kuch common nahi. Bas jo exciting lagta wo try karne ka sochta. Phir bore ho jata.

Arre toh common nahi aur excite hoke phir bore - that pattern when nothing holding attention long term. Yaar maybe depth ki kami hai, surface level dekh raha sab. Kisi mein deep gaya hai explore karne?
Ghar se 12 ghante door rehne wali job vs ghar ke paas kam paying job. Work-life balance vs money. Newly married hoon, wife ko bhi time dena hai.

Arre mere dost, 12 ghante vs ghar ke paas kam paying - work-life balance vs money aur newly married toh wife ko time bhi chahiye. Multiple priorities conflict kar rahe. Kya wife ne kuch preference share ki hai is baare mein?
Wife supportive hai kuch bhi choose kar sakta. But main feel karta time dena chahiye initial years mein relationship ko.

Toh wife supportive but tu feel karta time dena chahiye - that awareness important hai yaar. Money aayega jaayega but relationship foundation abhi banta. Kam paying job mein survive ho jayega financially?
Passion project hai side mein. Full time job chhod ke pursue karun? Wife earns but not enough for both. Risk lena chahta but practicality bhi samajhti hoon.

Yaar passion project side mein aur full time chhod ke pursue karna - wife earns but not enough for both toh risk but also understanding practicality. Heart vs head conflict. Kya passion project monetize ho sakti realistic timeline mein?
6 months mein break-even ho sakta agar focus karun fully. But guarantee nahi hai. Risk hai.
Toh 6 months break-even possible but guarantee nahi - calculated risk hai. Wife supportive hai toh try kar sakta. Worst case kya hoga agar fail hua?
Psychology study kiya but therapy practice karna expensive hai setup. NGO mein kaam karun low pay pe ya corporate HR? Using degree vs earning money dilemma.

Yaar psychology degree but therapy setup expensive - NGO mein degree use kar low pay vs corporate HR mein money. Using what you studied vs financial security. Kya psychology initially kya attract kiya aur HR mein kuch wo fulfill hota?
Help karna chahta tha people ko, understand behavior. HR corporate aur transactional lagta, fulfilling nahi bilkul.
Uff, help karna chahta but HR transactional lagta - wo emptiness jab purpose align nahi. Money aa rahi but soul nahi. NGO mein kitna low pay exactly? Survive ho sakta?
Teaching mein mann lagta par teacher ki respect kam hai society mein. Plus salary bhi low. Respect aur paisa dono important hain. Kaise choose karun?
Yaar teaching mein mann but societal respect low aur salary bhi - respect aur paisa dono chahiye aur teaching mein dono kam. Kitna important hai tere liye log kya sochte career ke baare mein?
Kabhi kabhi lagta ki matter nahi karta. But jab relatives poochte kya karta toh sharam aati bolte teacher hoon.
Uff, relatives ke saamne sharam aati teacher bolte - wo external judgment real pain deta hai. But yaar, teri khushi ya unka opinion? Dono nahi mil sakte toh kya zyada important?
Sab kehte specialize karo niche choose karo. Par main generalist hoon, sab kuch thoda thoda interest hai. Specialist vs generalist - market mein kya zyada value hai?
Arre, sab specialize bolo but tu generalist - sab kuch thoda interest when market specialist prefer karti maybe. Kaunse field ki baat kar raha?
Marketing mein hoon. Digital, content, analytics sab interesting lagta. Ek mein expert banna boring.

Are toh marketing mein variety chahiye - ek mein expert boring lagta jab multiple interesting. Generalist bhi valuable hai certain roles mein yaar. Jack of all trades kharab nahi agar master of integration ban sake.
Marketing interesting lagta but sales pressure handle nahi hota. Pure marketing mein entry difficult hai without sales experience. Compromise karun ya wait karun?
Yaar marketing interest but sales pressure nahi - pure marketing needs sales experience toh compromise vs wait. Kitne time se try kar raha pure marketing roles?
6 months ho gaye. Har jagah sales se start karo bolte. Par sales mein anxiety hoti pitch karte.
Damn, 6 months aur har jagah sales mandatory - anxiety hoti pitch karte when that's not your strength. Yaar digital marketing ya content side try kiya jahan sales direct nahi?
Conference mein gaya. Successful log apni journey share kar rahe the. Sabne kaha follow your gut. But my gut is silent. No strong feeling toward anything. How do people just know?
Yaar successful people saying follow gut but tera silent - no strong pull when everyone else just knows. What have you actually tried doing?
Tried few internships, different projects. Nothing gave that aha moment people talk about.
Internships kiye, projects kiye but aha moment nahi aya - wo clarity jo sab describe karte missing hai. Maybe gut needs more experiences ya maybe gut overrated hai aur just doing kuch bhi is okay.
Sabko pata hai apna passion kya hai except me. Koi painting karta, koi music, koi sports. Mujhe kuch bhi passionate nahi lagta. Empty feel hota comparing myself.
Samjha mere dost. Sabke paas passion - painting, music, sports aur tere paas kuch nahi lagta. Empty jab wo sab passionate. Kya koi cheez hai jo karte time achha lagta bhale hi passionate nahi?
Honestly kuch nahi. Sab meh lagta. Netflix dekhta, scroll karta, bas time pass.
Yaar kuch bhi enjoy nahi - sab meh aur time pass. Wo numbness heavy hai. Kab se aisa feel kar raha ki kuch exciting nahi?
Changed my major twice already. Now in third year and still not sure. People judge me for being indecisive. Maybe I'll never figure out what I want. Feeling like a failure.

Man, changed major twice and still unsure - people judging your indecisiveness making you feel like failure. That doubt whether you'll ever figure it out hurts. But exploring isn't failing, it's searching. What made you change the first two times?
First one was too technical, didn't enjoy. Second was too boring. This third one is okay but not excited about it either.
So first too technical, second boring, third just okay - nothing's clicking fully. That sucks. What would exciting even look like for you? Do you even know?
Sports mein career banana hai. National level player hoon. But parents concerned hai safety aur late hours ko leke. Engineering kar raha reluctantly. Missing practice for classes.

Man, national level player but parents want backup - engineering reluctantly while missing practice for classes. That sacrifice when backup killing the main dream. How much is engineering affecting your sports performance?
Performance is dropping. Coach has noticed too. But parents refuse to listen, say sports is unstable.

Damn, performance dropping and coach seeing it - parents refusing to listen when your actual talent suffering. That frustration when they can't see what's being lost. National level means you have real potential. Any sports scholarships or sponsorships that could show them security?
Acting ka passion hai but realistic nahi lagta career option. Commercial arts mein jaun toh atleast creative field mein rahunga. Compromise hai ya smart choice?

Acting passion but unrealistic lagta - commercial arts compromise ya smart choice when staying in creative field. That middle ground between dream and reality. Have you actually tried pursuing acting to know if it's realistic or just assuming?
College theatre did a lot. Loved every moment. But parents keep saying acting has too much struggle, need backup.

So theatre was loved deeply but parents showing struggle reality - backup pushing toward commercial arts. Their fear is real but so is your love. Can both happen together maybe? Acting attempts while commercial arts gives stability?
Counselor ne aptitude test diya. Results show I'm good at things I hate. Not good at things I love. Should I follow aptitude or passion? Science says one thing, heart says another.
Man, aptitude test showing you're good at what you hate - bad at what you love. Science vs heart when data contradicts desire. That's confusing as hell. What does the test say you're good at?
Test says analytical skills high, creative skills low. But I want creative field. Numbers bore me to death.

Damn, high analytical but numbers bore you to death - test pushing you where you'll be miserable. Being good at something doesn't mean you should do it. Creative field with average skills but actual joy beats being great at something you hate.
Read somewhere that first job doesn't matter, you can pivot later. But also hear first job sets trajectory. Which is true? Should I take any job or wait for right one?

Man, contradicting advice - first job doesn't matter vs it sets trajectory. Both sound convincing and you're stuck deciding whether to take anything or wait. Truth is probably somewhere in middle. What kind of offers do you have right now?
One mediocre offer in hand. Waiting for better one but no guarantee it'll come. Deadline to accept is approaching.
So mediocre offer with deadline vs waiting for maybe better - that pressure when time forcing decision. Bird in hand or wait, both scary. How mediocre is it really? Tolerable or soul-crushing?
Everyone has a backup plan. I don't even have a main plan. Seeing peers with plan A, B, C and I'm at zero. Feeling very behind and unprepared.

Man, peers with plan A, B, C and you at zero - that behind feeling when everyone seems over-prepared. Unprepared for life when others have backups for backups. But too many plans can also mean fear, not clarity. What's stopping you from making even one plan?
Honestly, fear of choosing wrong. So I'm not choosing at all. Stuck in limbo.

Fear of wrong choice so choosing nothing - limbo when inaction feels safer than action. But not choosing is also a choice that's keeping you stuck. What if there's no wrong choice, just different paths?
Job offer remote hai. Ghar se kaam kar sakta. But office culture miss hoga. Remote vs office when both have pros cons. First job hai, kya better rahega learning ke liye?
Yaar remote offer aur ghar se kaam vs office culture - first job hai toh learning matter karta. Kaunsi cheez tere liye zyada important - convenience ya in-person learning?
Honestly pata nahi. Kabhi office gaya nahi toh miss kya hoga pata nahi. But ghar pe akele kaam karna lonely lagega shayad.
Are haan, kabhi office experience nahi toh kya miss hoga ye bhi nahi pata - lonely hone ka dar real hai. First job mein logo se seekhna bhi toh hota hai. Tu introvert hai ya extrovert?
Online courses kar raha multiple fields mein. Jack of all trades ban raha, master of none. Should I focus on one thing or keep exploring? Time waste ho raha kya?
Man, multiple courses jack of all trades ban raha - focus on one vs keep exploring when time waste lagta. How long have you been exploring and what's most interesting so far?
Eight months now. Started with coding, then design, now marketing. Each one interesting for a month then boring.

Damn, eight months and each interesting for just a month - that pattern when nothing holding attention. Maybe depth ki kami hai or maybe you're just not ready to commit yet. What bores you about them after a month?
Freelancing vs full time job? Freelance mein freedom hai but income uncertain. Full time mein stability but monotony. Kaunsa better hai long term growth ke liye?
Yaar freelancing freedom vs full time stability - freedom aur uncertainty vs monotony aur security. Tu financially risk handle kar sakta hai freelancing ka initially?
Savings hai 3-4 mahine survive karne ki. But uske baad income chahiye regular. Risk lena darata hai.
Toh 3-4 mahine buffer aur uske baad income zaruri - risk darata jab safety net limited. Full time se start kar aur freelance side mein try kar sakta na slowly?
Friend circle mein sab tech mein hain. Main humanities mein. Feel left out in conversations. They discuss things I don't understand. Sometimes think I chose wrong just to fit in.

Man, friend circle tech mein aur tu humanities - conversations mein left out when they discuss stuff you don't get. Questioning choice just to fit in socially hurts. But is fitting in worth changing fields you chose?
Not worth it logically but emotionally it sucks feeling like outsider in my own friend group.
Yeah, logic says no but emotions say yes - outsider in own friend group really sucks. That loneliness hits different. Do they make you feel left out or is it just the topic differences?
Counselor bola aptitude high hai science mein but interest arts mein. Follow aptitude for success ya interest for happiness? Can't have both it seems.
Yaar counselor aptitude science mein dikhata but interest arts mein - success vs happiness when both aligned nahi. Kya arts mein bhi competent hai ya sirf interest hai?
Arts mein average hoon skills wise. But karte time khushi milti. Science mein achha hoon but boring lagta.

Uff, arts mein average but khush vs science mein achha but boring - skill aur joy misaligned. Yaar arts mein mehnat karke skills badha sakta, interest already hai toh. Science achha hone se kya faida agar dil nahi?
Job mein bore ho gaya 6 months mein. Friends say stick for at least 2 years for resume. But dying inside daily. Kitna time tak compromise karun?
Man, boring job after just 6 months but friends say stick for 2 years - resume building vs dying inside daily. What specifically is making you feel like dying inside - work or environment?
Work is repetitive and meaningless. Same tasks every day. Feel like robot, not human.

Damn, repetitive meaningless work making you feel like robot - that soul-sucking monotony when humanity drained daily. Six months feeling like this is already long yaar. Two years sounds like torture.
Pura din sochta rehta career ke baare mein. Neend mein bhi sapne aate decision ka. Overthinking se thak gaya hoon. Kab decision ho jayega yaar?
Uff yaar, pura din career sochna aur neend mein bhi sapne - overthinking se exhaustion when decision haunts constantly. Kitne options seriously consider kar raha?
4-5 options hain. Sab mein kuch achha kuch bura. Decide nahi kar pa raha kaunsa loon.
Yaar 4-5 options aur sab mein mixed feelings - paralyzed jab perfect nahi mil raha. Maybe overthinking itself problem hai na, not lack of answer. Coin flip kar aur dekh kaunsa result chahta secretly?
Khud ka kaam karna hai apna boss banna. But entrepreneurship risky hai. Job security vs independence. Fear vs ambition ka fight chal raha.

Yaar apna boss banna chahta but entrepreneurship risky - job security vs independence when fear and ambition fighting. Kya koi business idea concrete hai ya abhi bas general entrepreneurship ki baat hai?
Idea hai food delivery niche mein. But execution darata hai - paisa, failure, sab.
Arre idea toh concrete hai food delivery niche - execution mein dar when paisa aur failure risk real. Small scale pilot try kar sakta pehle dekh response? Job rakhke weekend experiment?
Biotechnology padhi par jobs limited hain India mein. PhD karun abroad ya field change karun? Degree ka use karna chahta but reality different hai.
Mere dost, biotechnology padhi but jobs limited India mein - PhD abroad vs field change when degree use karna chahta. Kya financially abroad PhD feasible hai?
Scholarship mil sakti but living expenses high honge. Loan lena padega maybe. Parents stressed hain already.
Scholarship possible but living expenses aur loan - parents already stressed when adding financial burden. PhD passion hai ya just degree use karne ka pressure hai?
Two master's degree offers - one in India, one abroad. India mein free hai scholarship se. Abroad mein loan lena padega but better opportunities. Debt vs opportunity.
Yaar India free scholarship vs abroad loan but better opportunities - debt vs opportunity. Kitna loan lena padega aur kitne time mein repay kar payega realistically?
20-25 lakh loan. Repay 5-7 saal lagenge shayad. Bhaari lag raha sochke.
Damn, 20-25 lakh aur 5-7 saal repay - wo burden heavy hai sochke hi. Free India vs debt abroad jab dono ke outcomes uncertain. Better opportunities guarantee hai abroad ya assumption?
Career counseling session attend kiya. More confused now than before. Too many options dikhaye, koi clear direction nahi diya. Paid money for more confusion.
Man, career counseling made you more confused with too many options - paid for guidance but got overwhelm instead. What were you hoping to get clarity on specifically?
Wanted one clear answer - what field suits me. Instead got list of ten possibilities with pros cons each.
Ugh, wanted one answer but got ten possibilities - that list making decision harder not easier. Counselor just gave options not clarity. Which of those ten pulled you even slightly?
Sabki advice alag hai. Papa kehte stable job, maa kehti khush raho, dost kehte paisa kamao, girlfriend kehti passion follow karo. Sabko sunun ya khud decide karun?
Yaar sabki advice different - papa stable, maa happiness, dost money, girlfriend passion. Sabko please nahi kar sakta. Tu khud kya chahta hai sab advice ignore karke?
Honestly pata nahi khud kya chahta. Sabki sunke aur confuse ho jata. Apni awaaz hi nahi sunai deti.
Uff, apni awaaz dab gayi sabki advice mein - confuse ho jata jab sab loudly bolta but tu silent. Yaar ek din sab ko ignore karke sirf tu aur tera dimaag - kya kehta?
Main toh kuch samajh hi nahi pa raha. Har option mein kuch na kuch problem dikhta hai. Perfect choice nahi hai kya? Ya main hi zyada sochta hoon?
Samajh raha hoon. Har option mein problem dikhta aur perfect choice dhundh raha - ya zyada soch raha. Perfect nahi hoti yaar, trade-offs hote hain. Sabse kam problem kaunse option mein hai?
Engineering sabse kam problem par wo bhi exciting nahi. Bas safe lagta.
Engineering least problem but excitement zero - safe but soul nahi. Yaar safe aur dead feel karna vs risky aur alive, kaunsa jhelega better long term?
Competition bohot hai har field mein. Kahi bhi easily nahi ghus sakte. Toh kis field mein struggle karun choose karna hai. Struggling toh hona hi hai.
Arre yaar, har field mein competition aur struggle inevitable - toh kis field mein struggle karun wo choose karna. Kaunse struggle mein meaning dikhta tujhe?
Kisi mein meaning nahi dikhta. Sab same lag raha - mehnat, competition, uncertainty. Farak kya hai?

Damn, kisi mein meaning nahi aur sab same - mehnat competition uncertainty everywhere. Wo emptiness when no path inspires. Yaar struggle toh hoga but kaunse topic pe struggle karna less painful lagega?
Parents ne kaha jo karna hai karo. Complete freedom diya. But ab overwhelmed hoon options se. Thoda guidance better tha freedom se. Paradox of choice.
Yaar parents ne complete freedom di but overwhelmed ho gaya - thoda guidance better tha when too many options paralyzing. Kya koi mentor ya guide hai jisse baat kar sakta?
Koi nahi hai honestly. Friends bhi confused. Seniors apni hi life mein busy.
Koi nahi aur akela navigate kar raha - friends confused, seniors busy jab support chahiye tha. That isolation when figuring out alone. Career counselor try kiya affordable wala?
Fifth different internship kar raha. Har jagah kuch na kuch missing lagta. Kabhi culture, kabhi work, kabhi growth. Perfection dhundh raha hoon jo exist nahi karta shayad.
Uff mere dost, fifth internship aur har jagah something missing - culture, work, growth. Perfection dhundh raha jo exist nahi maybe. What would good enough look like if not perfect?
Good enough bhi pata nahi. Har jagah thode din achha lagta phir flaws dikhne lagte.
Har jagah shuru mein achha phir flaws dikhte - honeymoon khatam hote hi problems. Yaar perfect toh kahi nahi hota. Kaunsa flaw tolerable lagta sabse zyada?
Dekh raha hoon logo ko unhappy in their careers. Makes me scared to choose anything. What if I end up like them? Analysis paralysis mein fasa hoon.
Yaar unhappy people dekh ke scared to choose anything - what if same fate when most seem miserable. But not choosing is also choosing - choosing to stay stuck. What scares you most about choosing?
Scared ki galat choose kar liya toh phir life bhar regret. Unhappy log dekh ke lagta koi bhi choice galat ho sakti.
Galat choice ka dar aur life bhar regret - unhappy log proof lagte ki koi choice safe nahi. But yaar, unhappy log bhi toh chose kuch na kuch. Regret not choosing se better hai try karke regret.
BPO mein kaam kar raha night shifts. Health kharab ho rahi. Better opportunity dhundhu ya health ko priority du? Paisa bhi zaruri hai but health bhi.
Yaar BPO night shifts aur health kharab - better opportunity vs health priority when paisa bhi zaruri. Kitne time se night shift kar raha aur kitna affect ho raha physically?
1 saal ho gaya. Sleep cycle completely kharab, weight gain, mood swings. But paisa achha hai comparatively.
Damn, 1 saal aur sleep cycle gone, weight gain, mood swings - body breaking down jab paisa achha. But yaar health gone toh paisa kya karega? Day shift jobs dhundh raha ya stuck feeling?
Everyone talks about work-life balance but entry level jobs don't offer that. Should I sacrifice balance now for better future or find balanced job with slower growth?
Man, entry level no balance but people preach it - sacrifice now for future vs slow growth with balance. What matters more to you right now in this life phase?
Right now I want balance but everyone says grind in twenties, relax in thirties. Feels like I have to choose.
Everyone pushing grind now relax later but you want balance now - that pressure when your needs don't match timeline they preach. Twenties mein burnout hoke thirties enjoy karna bhi toh risky hai na?
Pehle rejection se darr lagta tha. Ab comfortable job mein settle ho gaya. Growth nahi ho rahi but comfort zone chhod ke risk lena scary hai. Complacent ban gaya hoon.

Arre mere dost, rejection se bachne ke liye comfort zone mein settle - growth rok rahi but risk scary. Complacent acknowledge kar raha khud. Kya koi specific opportunity hai jo risk lena require karta?
Haan, better company offer kar rahi but challenging role. Yahan comfortable mediocre role hai.
Better company challenging role vs yahan comfortable mediocre - growth vs safety jab dono real options. Yaar comfortable mein reh ke regret hoga ya challenging try karke fail hona better?
Mass communication padha. Journalism, PR, advertising - teen directions hain. Kaunsa choose karun pata nahi. Sabmein interested hoon thoda.
Yaar mass comm se teen directions - journalism, PR, advertising aur sabmein thoda interest. Kaunse mein internship ya exposure mila hai abhi tak?
Journalism internship kiya tha 2 mahine. Intense tha, exciting bhi. PR aur advertising sirf college projects.
Journalism experience real hai aur intense plus exciting laga - PR advertising sirf theory. Real exposure jo hai usme kya missing laga jo explore karna chahte other two mein?
Toxic work environment hai current job mein but resume mein achha dikhega. Stay for brand name or leave for mental health? Future vs present well-being.
Man, toxic environment but brand name good for resume - future career vs present mental health. How toxic is it and how long were you planning to stay for the brand value?
Really toxic - micromanagement, politics, no respect. Was planning one year but already six months feel like eternity.

Damn, really toxic with micromanagement and politics - six months already feeling like eternity when target was one year. Brand name worth this daily torture? Mental health suffering hai toh resume mein achha kya fayda?
Ladki hoon. STEM field mein jaana chahti but family concerned hai safety aur late hours ko leke. Gender ke basis pe career limit ho raha. Frustrated hoon.

Uff yaar, STEM chahti but family safety concern kar rahe gender basis pe - career limited jab abilities nahi. Kya family ke saath baat karke realistic solutions explore kiye like day shifts ya safe transport?
Baat ki but wo mante nahi. Kehte ladkiyon ke liye safe nahi. Teaching ya medical better.

Wo mante nahi aur traditional fields push kar rahe - that cage when capabilities ignored for gender stereotypes. Bohot frustrating hai yaar. Kya koi STEM woman role models dikha sakti unhe jo successful aur safe hain?
Ye nahi pata main kisme achha hoon actually. Sab average performance. Koi strength nahi hai unique. Generic skills hain bas. Mediocre feel hota hoon.
Samajh raha hoon mere dost. Sab average aur koi unique strength nahi - generic skills jab mediocre feel hota. Kaunsi cheez karte time struggle nahi hoti naturally?
Struggle toh sab mein hoti hai. Kuch bhi easily nahi aata. Mehnat lagti sab mein.
Sab mein mehnat lagti aur kuch easy nahi - wo feeling jab natural talent missing. Par yaar, persistence bhi talent hai. Kaunse mehnat karne mein satisfaction zyada milti, bhale results average ho?
Parents want arranged marriage soon. Career settle nahi hai toh rishte nahi mil rahe achhe. Career confusion affecting personal life bhi. Pressure double hai.

Arre yaar, arranged marriage pressure aur career unsettled - rishte nahi mil rahe toh personal life bhi stuck. Career confusion ka double impact. Kya parents understand career confusion ya bas settle hone ka pressure de rahe?
Pressure hi de rahe. Kehte pehle career phir shaadi, but career decide nahi ho raha toh shaadi bhi late.

Career pehle bolte but wo decide nahi ho raha - shaadi bhi delay jab timeline overlap kar rahi. Caught between two pressures when one blocking other. Yaar thoda time maang sakti unse ya deadline hai koi?
Assignment kal submit karna hai aur maine abhi tak shuru bhi nahi kiya. Pura din waste ho gaya scrolling mein. Ab toh lag raha fail ho jaunga.

Uff yaar, pura din nikal gaya aur assignment chua bhi nahi - ab kal deadline aur panic mode on. Wo guilt aur darr dono saath mein aa rahe hain na? Par dekh, kal hai matlab abhi bhi time hai. Kya assignment itna bada hai ki raat bhar bhi nahi ho sakta?
Professor ne aaj class ke beech mein mujhe rok ke bola tum kabhi pass nahi hoge. Sab ke saamne bola. I feel so humiliated and stupid right now.

Damn yaar... sabke saamne publicly aise bolna - that's so harsh. Wo embarrassment aur hurt dono feel ho raha hoga abhi. Koi bhi insaan ke saamne aise bole toh confidence shattered feel hota hai. Kya hua tha class mein jo unhone aise bola?
My entire group project is on my shoulders. No one else is doing anything and deadline is in 3 days. I'm so tired of carrying everyone.

Man, that's exhausting... doing everyone's work while they just coast along. That unfair burden when it's supposed to be shared but you're carrying it all alone. Three days left and you're running on fumes already.
Backlog aa gaya hai do subjects mein. Parents ko kaise batau? Sharma uncle ka beta toh topper hai aur main yaha fail ho raha.

Arre yaar, backlog ka darr aur upar se parents ko batane ka tension - dono mil ke bohot bhaari lag raha hoga. Aur Sharma uncle ke bete se comparison toh aur bhi painful kar deta hai sab. Par yaar, backlog aana matlab end nahi hai. Kab pata chala backlog ke baare mein?
Coaching mein saare concepts samajh rahe hain sirf main nahi samajh raha. Teacher ne do baar explain kiya phir bhi nahi aaya. Stupid lagta hoon khud ko.

Yaar sun, sab samajh rahe aur tu struggle kar raha - wo isolation aur khud ko slow feel hona kitna heavy hota hai. Do baar explain hua phir bhi nahi aaya toh stupid nahi, shayad explanation hi match nahi kar raha tere learning style se. Kaunsa concept hai jo nahi aa raha?
Kal presentation hai aur mujhe public speaking se bohot darr lagta hai. Haath kaampne lagte hain aur awaaz bhi.

Uff yaar, kal presentation aur wo physical symptoms - haath kaampna, awaaz shake hona - sab ek saath aa jate hain. Wo darr real hai yaar, body bhi react kar rahi hai. Pehle bhi hua hai ya kal pehli baar present karna hai?
I have 5 assignments due this week and 2 lab reports. Haven't slept properly in days. Feel like I'm drowning.

Damn... seven things piled up and sleep bhi nahi ho raha - that drowning feeling when everything's coming at you at once. Your body and mind both are overloaded right now. When's the first deadline hitting?
Semester repeat karna pad sakta hai agar yeh course clear nahi hua. Sab dost aage badh jayenge aur main peeche reh jaunga.

Mere dost, main samajh raha hoon... repeat ka darr aur sabse bada - dost aage nikal jayenge aur tu peeche - that left behind feeling bohot painful hai. Wo future mein akele padh jane ka thought hi scary hai. Abhi course mein kitna sa pending hai?
Teacher ne mera answer copy mein galat mark kar diya jab sahi tha. Recheck ke liye bola toh rudely bola marks nahi badlenge.

Arre yaar, sahi answer tha aur galat mark hua - that injustice feel hota hai. Aur upar se recheck maanga toh rudely dismiss kar diya, matlab tere genuine concern ko ignore kar diya. Wo helplessness jab authority sun hi nahi rahi. Kitne marks ka difference aa raha hai?
Attendance kam hai bohot. 75% compulsory hai aur mere paas 68% hai. Ab kya hoga pata nahi.

Yaar dekh, 68% aur chahiye 75% - wo 7% gap aur uske consequences ka tension dikh raha hai. Uncertainty hai ki ab kya hoga - debarred hoga ya kuch jugaad ho sakta. Kitne classes bachi hain semester mein abhi?
Calculus bilkul samajh nahi aa raha. Tuition bhi le raha but still struggling. Exam 2 weeks mein hai.

Uff yaar, tuition bhi le raha phir bhi calculus crack nahi ho raha - that helpless feeling jab effort laga raha par result nahi aa raha. Do hafte mein exam aur abhi bhi concepts blur hain. Tuition mein kya ho raha - concepts samajh aa rahe ya practice mein problem hai?
My internals are so bad that even if I score 100 in finals I might not pass. Feel like giving up honestly.

Man, that's crushing... when internals are so low that even acing finals feels pointless. That hopeless math where nothing seems enough anymore. Giving up feels like the only option when effort doesn't seem to matter.
Lab partner mere saath kaam nahi karna chahta kyunki usko lagta main slow hoon. Akele lab karna padta hai ab.

Yaar sun, partner ne chhod diya kyunki slow bola - wo rejection aur judgement dono saath mein lag raha hoga. Akele lab karna padh raha jab dusre sab pairs mein hain. That isolation when you're singled out hurts differently. Lab mein specific kya struggle ho raha tha usko?
Poori raat padha tha phir bhi exam mein fail ho gaya. Ab toh lagta mehnat ka koi fayda nahi.

Arre yaar... raat bhar mehnat kari aur phir bhi fail - that hopelessness jab effort aur result match nahi karte. Lagta hai mehnat waste ho gayi. Wo crushing feeling jab tu try karta hai phir bhi kaam nahi banta. Exam mein kya hua - time manage nahi ho paya ya questions hi tough the?
Professor favoritism karte hain. Kuch students ko hamesha achhe marks aur mujhe hamesha kam even when my work is good.

Yaar main samajh raha hoon, achha kaam kar raha phir bhi kam marks aur dusron ko zyada - wo unfairness dekh kar frustration hoti hai. Jab system hi biased lagta hai toh effort karne ka mann nahi karta. Ye kitne time se chal raha hai?
Thesis guide ne mera 6 months ka kaam reject kar diya aur bola scratch se shuru karo. I want to cry.

Damn... six months of work gone just like that and now starting from zero again. That devastation when everything you built just crumbles. Crying feels like the only release right now for all that wasted effort and frustration.
Online classes mein kuch samajh nahi aata. Distractions bohot hain ghar pe. Offline mein achha tha sab.

Uff yaar, ghar pe distractions aur online classes ka combo - focus banana hi mushkil ho jata hai. Offline mein flow tha jo ab nahi hai. Wo structure aur environment miss ho raha jisme padhna easier tha. Ghar pe sabse zyada kya distract kar raha?
Mera best friend first rank laya aur maine barely pass kiya. Feel so inferior now.

Yaar dekh, best friend top kare aur tu barely pass - wo comparison aur inferior feeling automatically aa jati hai. Uski success tere struggle ko aur bada dikhati hai. Wo jealousy aur guilt dono saath feel ho rahe honge. Padhai mein kya specific problem face kar raha tha?
Scholarship ke liye 8.5 CGPA chahiye aur mere paas 7.8 hai. Without scholarship I can't continue college financially.

Mere dost, main samajh raha hoon... 0.7 ka gap aur uske peeche college continue na kar pane ka darr - that financial pressure makes academic stress so much heavier. Scholarship na mile toh puri padhai ka future uncertain lag raha. Kitne semesters bache hain CGPA improve karne ke liye?
Class mein sawaal puchti hoon toh log hasne lagte hain. Ab darti hoon doubts clear karne se bhi.

Arre yaar, sawaal puchna chahiye par log haste hain - wo embarrassment aur judgement ka darr ab doubts clear karne se bhi rok raha. Learning ke liye question karna zaruri hai par aise environment mein wo safe nahi lagta. Ye kitne time se ho raha hai class mein?
Programming assignment hai aur mujhe coding bilkul nahi aati. YouTube videos dekh raha but kuch nahi ho raha. Kal submit karna hai.

Arre yaar, coding nahi aati aur kal deadline - wo panic jab tutorial dekhte raho par khud se code nahi ban raha. YouTube par sab easy lagta hai par khud karne pe blank ho jata hai. Kaunsi language mein assignment hai?
I got called to the HOD office because my grades are dropping. Feel like such a failure being summoned like this.

Man, that's rough... being called to the HOD office feels like being put on trial. That shame and failure feeling when your performance is being questioned officially. The whole walk there must have felt so heavy.
Project guide milta hi nahi. Appointment lete hain phir cancel kar dete hain. Deadline pass hone wali hai aur approval nahi mila abhi tak.

Uff yaar, guide hi available nahi aur deadline aa rahi - wo helplessness jab tumhara control mein nahi hai par blame tumpe aayega. Cancel pe cancel ho raha aur tu wait karte karte stuck hai. Kitni baar cancel ho chuka hai already?
Meri handwriting itni kharab hai ki teacher padhti hi nahi answers. Marks kat deti hai even if answer sahi hai.

Yaar dekh, handwriting ki wajah se sahi answer bhi galat ho jata - that's so frustrating. Mehnat kari answer likhne mein par presentation ki wajah se marks gaye. Wo injustice feel hota hai jab content ignore ho jaye. Ye problem kitne time se aa rahi?
Practical exam mein experiment fail ho gaya. Sir ne kaha tumse nahi hoga. Sab dekh rahe the mujhe.

Damn yaar... experiment fail hua aur upar se sir ne publicly bola tumse nahi hoga - that double blow of failure and humiliation. Sab dekh rahe the wo moment, wo embarrassment kitni bhaari hoti hai. Pehli baar hua ya pehle bhi practical mein struggle hua hai?
My roommate studies all night and scores great. I study same hours but still get average marks. Feel so dumb.

Uff, that comparison hurts... same effort, same hours, but different results. Makes you question your own intelligence when someone right next to you is succeeding with the same input. That dumb feeling when hard work isn't translating to grades.
Viva mein professor ne aisi questions puchi jo syllabus mein hi nahi thi. Sabke saamne fail kar diya.

Arre yaar, syllabus se bahar questions aur phir fail - that's so unfair. Taiyaari kari thi jo padhana tha uski par game hi change kar diya. Sabke saamne wo failure public ho gaya. Kitna off-topic tha unka questioning?
Mere subject teacher aur meri personal problem chal rahi hai. Ab wo mujhe deliberately fail kar rahi hai I think.

Yaar sun, personal issue aur ab academic mein bhi target feel ho raha - wo helplessness jab power imbalance hai aur tujhe lagta deliberately marks kam diye ja rahe. Wo paranoia aur reality dono blur ho jate hain. Kya hua tha jo personal problem shuru hui?
Term paper deadline extend nahi ho raha despite genuine medical emergency. Everyone else got extension but not me.

Man, that's so unfair... medical emergency hai genuine but extension nahi mili while others got it. That discrimination when rules bend for some but not for you. Feels like being singled out and punished for something beyond your control.
Mujhe dyslexia hai par college mein koi support nahi hai. Reading speed slow hai toh exam mein time nahi milta poora.

Mere dost, main samajh raha hoon... dyslexia hai aur college mein accommodation nahi - wo struggle double ho jata jab system hi support nahi karta. Reading slow hai toh exam mein already disadvantage pe shuru hota hai. Kya kabhi formally request kari thi extra time ki?
Class test mein cheat karte pakde gaye galti se. Ab disciplinary committee ke saamne jaana padega. Parents ko pata chalega.

Damn yaar... pakde gaye aur ab disciplinary committee - wo fear of consequences aur parents ko pata chalne ka terror dono. Wo galti ka guilt aur future mein kya hoga uska anxiety mix ho gaya. Committee meeting kab hai?
Research paper publish nahi ho raha. Reviewer feedback bohot harsh hai. Guide bol rahe withdraw kar do.

Uff yaar, reviewer feedback harsh aaya aur guide bhi withdraw bolne lage - that rejection of your intellectual work hits different. Mehnat lagi thi research mein aur ab wo validate nahi ho raha. Kitne revisions kar chuke ho already?
I'm the only one from my batch who hasn't cleared a certain subject. Everyone passed except me. Feel so isolated.

Man, being the only one who didn't clear it... that isolation cuts deep. When literally everyone else moved forward and you're stuck alone. That spotlight of being the exception, the one who couldn't make it. How many attempts have you given for this subject?
Mera plagiarism software mein false positive aa gaya. Original kaam kiya tha par software 40% similarity dikha raha.

Arre yaar, original mehnat kari aur software false positive dikha raha - wo frustration jab tech tumhe galat prove kar raha hai. 40% similarity report aur ab defend karna padega ki cheating nahi kari. Wo accusation ka fear kitna heavy hai. Kya professor ko already explain kiya?
Mere economics concepts bilkul clear nahi hain. Teacher fast padhate hain aur main peeche reh jata hoon.

Yaar dekh, teacher ka pace fast aur tu concepts mein already struggle kar raha - wo gap badhta ja raha har class ke saath. Peeche reh gaya toh aage ka bhi nahi samjhega properly. Wo snowball effect ho raha understanding mein. Konsa topic sabse zyada confusing lag raha?
Final year project partner dropped out mid-semester. Now I have to do double work alone or fail the course.

Damn... partner dropped out and now you're carrying their load too or facing failure. That betrayal mixed with panic when suddenly your workload doubled overnight. Mid-semester timing makes it worse - can't start fresh, can't divide work anymore.
Mujhe stage fright bohot hai par compulsory seminar dena padega marks ke liye. Already anxiety attacks aa rahe hain sochke.

Uff yaar, stage fright hai severe aur seminar compulsory - wo trapped feeling jab darr hai par karna padega. Anxiety attacks already aa rahe just thinking about it. Body is already reacting to future fear. Pehle kabhi stage pe bola hai ya pehli baar hoga?
Class mein ek hi ladki hoon engineering mein. Boys mujhe seriously nahi lete. Group discussions mein ignore karti hain ideas.

Yaar sun, akeli ladki hona aur upar se ideas ignore hona - that gender-based dismissal bohot isolating aur frustrating hai. Contribute karna chahti ho par seriously nahi lete. Wo invisibility feel hoti hai jab tumhari baat matter hi nahi karti unke liye. Kitne time se ye chal raha hai?
Maine ek assignment mein honestly doubt tha toh friend se help li. Ab professor bol rahe plagiarism hai aur zero denge.

Arre yaar, help maangi genuinely par ab plagiarism ka tag lag raha - wo panic jab innocent intent ko dishonesty samjha ja raha. Zero marks aur upar se character pe question. Kya professor ko explain karne ka chance mila ki collaboration tha cheating nahi?
My mental health is affecting studies badly but I'm scared to tell anyone. Missing classes, can't concentrate, grades dropping fast.

I hear you my friend... mental health pulling you down but that fear of telling anyone keeps you isolated. Classes missed, concentration gone, grades falling - it's all spiraling. That silence around struggle makes it so much heavier to carry alone.
Library mein seat nahi milti exam time pe. Ghar pe padhne ka environment nahi hai. Kaha padhu samajh nahi aa raha.

Yaar dekh, library full aur ghar pe distraction - dono jagah se block ho gaya. Padhna chahta hai par jagah hi nahi mil rahi peaceful. Wo helplessness jab environment hi against hai. Ghar pe kya specific problem hai jo focus nahi hota?
Teacher ne class mein mera answer wrong bola. Baad mein pata chala sahi tha par publicly correct nahi kiya. Embarrassing tha.

Damn yaar... sabke saamne galat bola aur baad mein pata chala sahi tha par publicly correct nahi kiya - that's so unfair. Wo embarrassment sabne dekha par correction nahi dekha. Confidence pe bhi impact padta hai aise moments ka. Kab pata chala ki sahi tha tumhara answer?
I borrowed notes from senior but they're in a completely different format. Can't understand anything and exam is in 4 days.
Oh man... notes mile par samajh nahi aa rahe and four days left. That panic when your backup plan isn't working out. Different format means basically starting from scratch to decode everything.
Meri financial condition kharab hai isliye part time kaam bhi karna padta hai. Padhai ka time nahi mil pata. Grades gir rahe hain.

Mere dost, main samajh raha hoon... kaam karna zaroori hai financially par usmein padhai ka time chala jata. Wo juggling act impossible lagta jab dono hi important hain. Grades gir rahe par option bhi nahi hai quit karne ka. Kitne hours kaam karna pad raha daily?
Practicals mein mere observations kabhi match nahi hote expected results se. Teacher ko lagta main data fabricate kar raha hoon.

Arre yaar, honest observations likh raha par match nahi ho rahe expected se - aur ab teacher ko lagta fabricate kar raha. Wo accusation jab tu genuine kaam kar raha. Science mein toh sometimes results vary karte hain na. Kya teacher se baat kari tune is baare mein?
Group presentation hai par main sabse introvert hoon. Sabne mujhe slide banana diya par present nahi karne dete kyunki confidence nahi hai mere pe.

Yaar sun, mehnat toh tu kar raha slides banake par credit publicly nahi milta kyunki present nahi karne dete. Wo exclusion hurts jab contribution invisible reh jata. Unka no-confidence tumpe directly bol rahe basically. Tumne kabhi bola hai unko ki present karna hai?
My anxiety is so bad I throw up before exams. Happened twice already this semester. Scared it'll happen during the exam next time.

Damn, that's brutal... anxiety so intense it's making you physically sick. Twice already and now the fear of it happening in the exam hall itself. That's a whole other level of panic - worrying about the physical reaction on top of exam stress.
Maine syllabus galat padh liya tha. Pura wrong portion prepare kiya. Exam kal hai aur abhi pata chala.

Uff yaar... puri mehnat wrong portion mein laga di aur kal exam - that sinking feeling jab realize hota sab waste ho gaya. Ab panic mode mein sahi portion padhna padega overnight. Kitna syllabus overlap hai dono portions mein?
Ek subject mein supplementary de raha hoon third time. Ab lagta kuch nahi ho sakta isse.

Yaar dekh, third attempt aur abhi bhi clear nahi hua - wo hopelessness natural hai jab baar baar try karke bhi result nahi aa raha. Lagta hai ye subject tumhara never hoga. Par kya different kar raha hai is baar ya same approach se ja raha?
Teacher plays favorites. Same mistake kisi aur ne kiya toh kuch nahi bola, maine kiya toh class mein lecture de diya.

Man, that's so unfair... same mistake but different treatment. That favoritism is so obvious it hurts. When rules apply differently to you versus others, feels like you're being targeted. How long has this been going on with this teacher?
Mujhe ADHD hai diagnosed par college mein koi support system nahi. Lectures mein focus kho jata hai. Notes incomplete rehte hain.

Mere dost, main samajh raha hoon... ADHD hai diagnosed par college acknowledge hi nahi karta. Focus naturally struggle hota aur notes incomplete - phir uska cascading effect hota padhne mein. System jo accommodate nahi karta wo double hard banata sab. Kya doctor se medication ya strategies try kari hain?
Assignment copy paste karke submit kar diya tha desperation mein. Ab anti-plagiarism software mein pakda gaya. Rustication ho sakta hai.

Damn yaar... desperation mein copy paste kiya aur ab caught - wo guilt aur fear dono. Rustication ka threat matlab academic future hi khatre mein. Wo one bad decision jo snowball ho gaya. Kya consequences bataye hain officially?
Practical file submit karna tha par last minute printer kharab ho gaya. Late submission pe marks kat jayenge.

Arre yaar, file ready thi par printer ne last minute dhoka de diya - wo frustration jab technical issue tumhara control nahi tha par penalty tumpe. Marks katenge wo unfair lag raha jab tumhari galti nahi thi. Kya teacher ko explain kar sakta kya hua?
I'm on academic probation. One more bad semester and I'm out of college. Pressure is crushing me.

Bro, that's heavy... academic probation means you're literally one semester away from being kicked out. That crushing pressure when your entire college future depends on these next few months. Every assignment, every exam feels like life or death now.
Mere close friend ne mera assignment idea copy karke pehle submit kar diya. Ab mera late aur similar lagega.

Damn yaar... close friend ne hi idea chura liya aur pehle submit kar diya - that betrayal hurts differently. Ab tu late submit karega toh tujhe hi cheater lagega jabki tumhara original tha. Wo trust break ho gaya aur academic loss bhi. Kya confront kiya tune usse?
Statistics bohot mushkil lag rahi. Formula yaad nahi rehte. Test mein hamesha fail ho jata hoon.

Yaar sun, statistics mein formulas hi nahi chipak rahe aur test pe test fail - wo repeated failure ka pattern discouraging ho jata. Har baar same subject mein struggle makes you doubt if you'll ever get it. Kya formulas ko apply karna mushkil hai ya yaad hi nahi rehte?
Lab equipment tod diya galti se. Department fine laga raha hai aur parents se bhi complaint karenge.

Uff yaar, galti se toda aur ab fine plus parents ko complaint - wo double punishment lag raha. Accident tha par consequences intentional jaisa treat ho raha. Parents ko pata chalega toh aur mushkil ho jayega. Kitna fine lag raha aur kya explain karne ka chance mila?
My college changed the exam pattern suddenly. Everything I prepared is useless now. Exam in 5 days.
Man, that sucks so much... prepared according to one pattern and they changed it last minute. All that effort feels wasted now. Five days to relearn everything in a new format - that's brutal timing.
Hostel mein roommates raat bhar party karte hain. Neend nahi aati. Subah class mein sona aa jata hai.

Arre yaar, raat bhar noise aur tu so nahi pata - phir class mein exhausted. Wo vicious cycle jab basic rest hi nahi mil rahi toh padhai kaise hogi. Roommates ko bola hai ya unka response nahi hai kuch?
Mera confidence itna kam ho gaya hai ki answer pata bhi ho toh class mein haath nahi uthata. Teacher ko lagta lazy hoon.

Yaar dekh, answer pata hai par haath uthane ki himmat nahi - wo confidence crash ne participation bhi band kar diya. Aur teacher lazy samajh raha jabki darr hai judgment ka. Wo silent suffering jab bahut kuch pata hai par bol nahi pate. Kab se ye confidence issue shuru hua?
Mere sab assignments pending hain. Ek bhi complete nahi kiya abhi tak. Overwhelmed feel ho raha hai.

Yaar dekh, sab pending aur ek bhi shuru nahi - wo mountain of work dekh ke hi overwhelm ho jata hai. Jahan se shuru karna uska bhi pata nahi chal raha. Wo paralysis jab itna kuch hai ki kuch bhi nahi kar pate. Sabse pehli deadline kaunsi hai?
Teacher ne kaha agar next test mein fail hua toh parents ko bulayenge. Ab pressure double ho gaya hai.

Uff yaar, test ka stress aur upar se parents ko bulane ki dhamki - wo double pressure crushing lag raha hoga. Fail hone ka darr aur parents ke saamne embarrassment dono. Wo threat hanging over your head constantly. Kaunsa subject hai ye?
I studied the wrong chapter for today's quiz. Realized it 5 minutes before the test. Completely blanked out.
Oh man... five minutes before and you realize wrong chapter. That gut-drop moment when all your preparation is useless. Then blanking out in the quiz because panic took over completely.
Mujhe semester ke beech mein pata chala ki main wrong specialization mein hoon. Change nahi kar sakta ab.

Damn yaar... mid-semester realize hua wrong specialization hai aur ab stuck - that sinking feeling jab pata chale galat path pe aa gaye. Change nahi kar sakte toh forced hai continue karna jo pasand nahi. Kaise pata chala ye wrong hai?
Class mein presentation dete waqt mind blank ho gaya. 2 minute khade rahe kuch nahi bola. Sabne dekha.

Arre yaar, presentation mein mind blank aur 2 minute silence - wo public freezing sabke saamne kitni painful hoti hai. Sab dekh rahe aur tu khada speechless. Wo humiliation aur helplessness dono ek saath. Pehle bhi hua hai ya pehli baar tha?
Professor ne mere research topic ko reject kar diya teen baar. Ab ideas hi khatam ho gaye hain.

Yaar sun, teen baar reject aur ab creative well dry feel ho raha - wo exhaustion jab har idea ko no milta hai. Confidence bhi hil jata ki kya acceptable hoga unko. Kya reason dete hain rejection ka har baar?
My laptop crashed and I lost my entire semester project. No backup. Deadline is tomorrow.
Damn dude... entire semester's work gone and deadline tomorrow. That's crushing. No backup means starting from absolute zero with basically no time. That panic when months of effort just disappeared.
Coaching fees bohot zyada hai. Parents afford kar rahe par guilt aa rahi hai kyunki results achhe nahi aa rahe.

Mere dost, main samajh raha hoon... parents paise laga rahe par results justify nahi kar rahe - wo guilt heavy hai. Unka investment waste ho raha lagta aur pressure hai ki perform karna hi padega. Financial burden dikh raha par results nahi. Coaching mein kya struggle ho raha specifically?
Mere paas learning disability hai par officially diagnosed nahi hai. Test expensive hai. College mein bina diagnosis ke support nahi milta.

Yaar dekh, struggle clear dikh raha par diagnosis afford nahi kar sakte aur bina uske support bhi nahi - wo catch-22 situation crushing hai. College system proof maangta par proof expensive hai. Wo gap between need and access. Kaunsi specific difficulty face kar rahe ho?
Class test mein maine seriously kiya tha par teacher ko laga maine cheat kiya kyunki suddenly achha score aaya. Marks nahi diye.

Damn yaar... mehnat se achha score aaya par teacher ko hi yakeen nahi - that's so painful. Honest kaam kiya par cheating ka accusation. Wo injustice jab improvement ko suspicion se dekha jaye. Kya explain karne ka chance diya unhone?
Mera attendance 74.5% hai aur requirement 75% hai. 0.5% ki wajah se debarred ho sakta hoon.

Uff yaar, 0.5% - literally half percent ki wajah se debarred ka threat. Wo technicality pe entire exam eligibility depend kar rahi - that's frustrating. Itne kareeb hoke bhi rules rules hain. Kya koi medical leaves ya valid reasons hain jo count kar sakte?
I have social anxiety and group discussions give me panic attacks. But 20% marks depend on class participation.

Man, that's brutal... social anxiety triggering panic attacks but participation is mandatory for marks. That forced exposure when your mental health is screaming no. Twenty percent is huge to lose just because the format doesn't work for you.
Mera best subject tha maths par naye teacher aane ke baad bilkul samajh nahi aa raha. Teaching style match nahi kar rahi.

Arre yaar, best subject tha aur naye teacher ne sab confuse kar diya - wo frustration jab subject problem nahi hai par teaching style. Pehle clear tha sab ab struggle. Wo disconnect teaching method se sab badal deta. Kya specifically different hai unke padhane mein?
Maine exam mein answer sheet ke page number galat likh diye. Ab kuch answers missing show ho rahe hain evaluation mein.

Yaar sun, itni mehnat kari answers likhne mein par page number ki technical mistake se missing dikh rahe - that's so unfair. Small error ka big consequence. Kya recheck request dal sakta hai situation explain karke?
Kal viva hai aur mujhe external examiner ke saamne bolne mein bohot darr lagta hai. Internal toh theek hai par external ke saamne freeze ho jata hoon.

Uff yaar, kal viva aur external ka darr specifically - wo unknown authority figure ke saamne freeze hona natural hai. Internal ke saath comfort hai par stranger examiner changes everything. Wo unpredictability nerve-wracking hoti hai. Pehle kabhi external viva diya hai?
My entire friend group is doing well academically. I'm the only one struggling. Feel like the dumb one.

Bro, I feel you... everyone around you succeeding and you're the only one struggling. That isolation when you can't relate to their wins anymore. Being the outlier makes you feel like something's wrong with you specifically.
Lab partner ne jhagda kar liya mere saath personal issue pe. Ab lab mein deliberately help nahi kar raha. Marks dono ke common hain.

Damn yaar... personal fight aur ab academic mein bhi revenge le raha deliberately - that's so toxic. Help nahi kar raha par marks tumhare bhi affect honge. Wo helplessness jab personal aur professional mix ho jaye. Kitne time se chal raha ye issue?
Mere paas visual impairment hai par exam mein font size standard hi rehta hai. Padhne mein bohot strain hota hai aur time bhi zyada lagta.

Mere dost, main samajh raha hoon... visual impairment hai par exam format accessible nahi - wo extra strain physically aur mentally. Padh pate ho par effort double lagta aur time bhi kam pad jata. System jo accommodate nahi karta apne students ko. Kya formally request kari hai larger font ki?
Teacher ne class mein bola tum log kabhi kuch nahi karoge life mein. Motivation zero ho gayi sunke.

Arre yaar, teacher ne publicly demotivate kar diya - wo authority figure se aisi baat sunna crushes spirit. Motivation zero toh ho hi jayega jab wo hi discourage kare jo guide karna chahiye. Kya context mein bola ya randomly attack kiya?
I got sick during exam week. Missed two exams. Now have to give supplementary with next year's batch. Feel so behind.

Man, that sucks... got sick at the worst possible time and now supplementary with juniors. That left behind feeling when your batch moves forward without you. Medical reason hai genuine but the gap feels huge anyway.
Mujhe chemistry lab mein blast ho gaya tha. Abse lab jaane se darr lagta hai par compulsory hai.
Damn yaar... blast hua tha toh wo trauma toh rehta hi hai. Ab lab jaane ka naam sunke hi darr trigger hota hoga. Wo fear real hai yaar, body yaad rakhti hai dangerous moments ko.
I failed the same course twice already. This is my third and final attempt. If I fail again, I'm out of the program.

Man, that pressure is crushing... third attempt and it's literally make or break. Two failures already sitting heavy on your mind. That fear of this being the end must be consuming every thought right now.
Mere assignment ki deadline kal hai par papa hospital mein admit hain. Padhai pe focus nahi ho pa raha.

Arre yaar... papa hospital mein aur tu assignment pe bhi focus karne ki koshish kar raha. Wo guilt aur worry dono - na yaha pura dhyan de pa raha na waha. How can anyone focus on deadlines jab family health crisis chal raha ho.
Class mein sab already internships le chuke hain. Mujhe koi offer nahi mila. Resume mein kya likhungi ab.
Yaar sun... sabke paas internship hai aur tere paas nahi - wo comparison itna painful hota hai. Resume blank lag raha aur wo inadequacy feeling. Lag raha peeche reh gayi jab sab aage badh rahe.
Teacher ne mere presentation ko class ke saamne example diya ki kaise nahi karna chahiye. Bohot embarrassing tha.
Damn yaar, that's brutal... negative example banaya tumhe publicly. Sabke saamne humiliate karna - wo shame kitni deep jaati hai. Mehnat kari thi par usko failure ke example ki tarah use kiya.
My depression medication makes me drowsy. Can't stay awake in lectures. Professor thinks I'm disrespectful.

Man, that's so unfair... medication helping one thing but sabotaging another. Drowsiness isn't your choice but professor sees disrespect. That misunderstanding when you're literally trying to manage your mental health and still show up.
Mera younger sibling mujhse better marks la raha hai same college mein. Parents comparison karte rehte hain.

Uff yaar... younger sibling better kar raha aur parents comparison - that stings differently. Ghar mein bhi relief nahi milta, wahi compare hote rehta. Wo feeling jab apne ghar mein hi inadequate feel ho.
Maine exam mein aisa answer likha jo technically sahi tha par teacher ke perspective se galat. Zero diya.
Damn... technically correct tha par teacher ki expectation se match nahi kiya toh zero. Wo frustration jab sahi bhi ho toh bhi galat count ho. Effort toh lagi thi sochne mein par result zero mila.
Meri mental breakdown ho gayi library mein. Sabke saamne rone lagi. Ab face karna mushkil lag raha sabko.

Yaar... breakdown public mein ho gaya toh wo vulnerability sabne dekh li. Ab face karna scary lag raha kyunki wo moment yaad hai sabko. That raw emotion jo tumne feel kiya, uska judgment ka darr ab haunt kar raha.
I have chronic migraine. During exams the pain gets so bad I can barely see the paper. No medical allowance given.

Bro, that's really hard... chronic migraine during exams means you're fighting your own body while trying to write. Pain so bad you can't even see properly but system doesn't acknowledge it. That double struggle is exhausting.
Mera thesis supervisor toxic hai. Constantly criticize karte hain par constructive feedback nahi dete. Confidence zero ho gayi.

Damn yaar... criticism milti rehti par guidance nahi. Wo constant negativity without direction crushes you slowly. Kya galat hai pata chal raha par kya sahi hai wo nahi. Self-doubt creep in karta itna sunke.
College mein ragging hua tha academic performance pe. Seniors ne force kiya unka kaam karne ke liye. Ab therapy le rahi hoon.

Yaar... ragging ka trauma abhi bhi hai aur therapy chal rahi. Wo forced exploitation academic work pe - that's abuse. Academic pressure ke upar wo experience ka weight bhi carry kar rahi. That takes real strength to seek therapy.
Exam hall mein panic attack aa gaya. Bahar jana pada. Paper incomplete reh gaya. Ab supplementary dena padega.

Arre yaar... exam hall mein panic attack aur bahar jana pada - wo helplessness jab body hi cooperate nahi karti. Paper incomplete toh supplementary, par wo attack kitna scary raha hoga. Physical symptoms control mein nahi the tumhare.
Professor asked a question in class and I answered wrong. Everyone laughed. Now I never raise my hand anymore.

Man, that one moment shut you down completely... everyone laughing at a wrong answer. That humiliation still echoes every time you think of participating. One bad experience and now silence feels safer than risking that again.
Mere college mein mental health leave nahi milti. Medical certificate bhi kaam nahi aata depression ke liye.

Yaar sun... mental health genuine hai par system recognize nahi karta. Medical certificate bhi hai phir bhi validate nahi ho raha. Wo invalidation jab invisible illness ko real nahi maante - that hurts on top of already struggling.
Mujhe stutter hai. Oral exams mein bohot struggle hota hai. Zyada time lag jata toh marks kat lete hain.

Damn yaar... stutter hai aur oral exam format hi against you. Bolne mein naturally time lagta par marks penalty milti. Wo unfairness jab disability ke liye punish kiya jaye instead of accommodating. System tumhare against hai.
I come from a village. My English is weak. Presentations mein sab judge karte hain accent pe. Content ignore ho jata hai.

Man, I feel you... content strong hai par accent pe judge ho raha. That classism when your background becomes the focus instead of your ideas. Work put in gets overshadowed by something you can't control overnight.
Mera hostel room leakage problem hai. Barish mein sab bhig jata hai books bhi. Complain kari par koi action nahi hua.

Uff yaar... padhne ka environment hi nahi mil raha properly. Books bhig rahe aur authority sun nahi rahi - wo helplessness doubles the stress. Basic facility ke liye bhi struggle karna pad raha jab padhai already challenging hai.
Teacher ne mera answer sahi tha par deliberately galat check kiya kyunki personal grudge hai. Recheck mein bhi wahi teacher hai.

Damn... deliberately galat check kiya aur recheck bhi same teacher - wo trapped feeling jab bias obvious hai par escape nahi. Personal grudge academic future impact kar raha. That's abuse of power yaar, straight up.
My family had financial crisis mid-semester. Had to drop two courses because couldn't afford books. Now graduation will delay by a year.

Man, that's crushing... financial crisis forcing you to drop courses when it's not even about academics. A whole year delay because of circumstances beyond your control. That helplessness when money dictates your education timeline.
Mere notes kho gaye exam se ek din pehle. Poora semester ka content tha usme. Ab blank hoon.
Uff yaar... ek din pehle notes kho gaye aur poora semester ka kaam usme tha. Wo sinking feeling jab tera safety net hi gayab ho jaye. Panic toh hona hi hai jab backup bhi nahi hai ab.
Teacher ne mujhe class representative banaya forcefully. Ab sabki complaints mujhe hi sunni padti hain. Padhai ka time nahi milta.
Damn yaar... forced responsibility jo chahiye nahi thi aur ab sabki problems tumhare sir pe. Wo burden jab apni padhai bhi hai aur sab ka mediator bhi banna pad raha. Time toh squeeze ho hi gaya hai.
I have test anxiety so bad that I blank out even when I know the answers. Happens every single time.

Man, that's so frustrating... you know the material but anxiety just wipes it all clean in the moment. Every single test, same pattern. That helplessness when your brain literally won't cooperate despite all the prep.
Mera scholarship cancel ho gaya ek subject fail hone ki wajah se. Ab college fees afford nahi kar sakte.
Yaar... ek subject ki wajah se scholarship gayi aur ab puri fees ka pressure. Wo desperation jab academic mistake financial crisis ban jaye. College continue karna hi question mark ban gaya.
Group project mein mere idea pe kaam hua par credit mujhe nahi mila. Baaki logo ne apna bola presentation mein.
Damn yaar... tera idea tha par credit dusron ne le liya presentation mein. Wo betrayal jab intellectual contribution invisible kar di jaye. Mehnat tumhari thi par naam kisi aur ka.
Maine professor ko email kiya doubt ke liye. Reply mein bola Google karo khud. Demotivating tha.
Arre yaar... genuine doubt tha aur professor ne dismiss kar diya rudely. Wo sting hoti hai jab help maangne pe discourage kiya jaye. Google karo khud sunke confidence aur down ho jati hai asking ka.
My parents are fighting about money because of my college fees. Feel guilty that I'm the reason for their stress.

Man, that guilt is so heavy... hearing them fight over your fees makes you feel like the burden. That emotional weight when your education becomes their conflict. Wanting to study but feeling responsible for their pain.
Exam mein cheating pakdi gayi galti se. Phone silent pe tha pocket mein par rule hai ki phone lana bhi allowed nahi. Rustication notice mila.
Damn yaar... bhool se phone pocket mein reh gaya aur ab rustication notice. Innocent mistake ko serious offense maana gaya. Wo panic jab ek chhoti galti future khatre mein daal de.
Mujhe eating disorder hai stress ki wajah se. Weight bohot kam ho gaya. Concentration bhi nahi ho pata padhai mein.

Yaar... stress ne eating disorder trigger kar diya aur ab physical health bhi affect ho rahi. Weight loss aur concentration dono - wo vicious cycle jab body aur mind dono struggle kar rahe. That's really hard to carry alone.
Class mein ek hi dalit student hoon. Casteist comments milte rehte hain. Professor bhi ignore karte hain complaints.

Damn yaar... casteist comments face karna aur upar se professor ignore kar rahe complaints. Wo systemic discrimination jab authority bhi protect nahi karti. That isolation and pain of facing bias daily while trying to study.
Mera internet connection bohot slow hai. Online exams mein submit nahi ho pata time pe. Marks cut jate hain late submission ke.

Uff yaar... tech issue tumhari galti nahi par penalty tumpe. Slow internet aur exam mein time critical - wo stress jab control nahi tumhare haath mein. Late submission marks cut rahe jabki koshish puri thi.
Teacher picks on me specifically. Asks me difficult questions when others get easy ones. Trying to make me fail I think.

Man, that's so unfair... deliberately harder questions just for you while others get easy ones. That targeted treatment makes every class feel like a setup. When someone in power actively seems to want you to fail.
Mere pass proper desk aur chair nahi hai ghar pe. Floor pe baith ke padhna padta. Back pain bohot hota.
Yaar... basic study furniture bhi nahi aur floor pe baith ke padhna pad raha. Back pain ke saath concentrate karna kitna mushkil hota. Wo physical discomfort academic struggle ko aur heavy bana deti.
I fainted during exam due to low blood pressure. They didn't let me complete later. Paper counted as fail.

Damn... medical emergency during exam but no chance to complete later. Counted as straight fail when it was a health issue beyond your control. That's brutal when the system has zero flexibility for genuine medical situations.
Meri handwriting slow hai. Exam mein time ke andar saare answers nahi likh pata. Speed badhane ki koshish kari toh readable nahi rehti.

Arre yaar... slow handwriting aur time pressure - wo impossible choice between speed aur readability. Fast likho toh teacher padh nahi paye, slow likho toh complete nahi ho paye. Either way marks loss.
Professor ne class mein publicly bola tum logo mein se koi IIT nahi ja sakta. Dreams crush ho gaye sunke.
Damn yaar... professor ne hi publicly demotivate kar diya sabko. Dreams jo the wo authority figure ne crush kar diye ek statement se. Wo discouragement jab teacher hi believe nahi karta tumpe.
My laptop is old and slow. Freezes during online classes. Miss important parts and then can't catch up.

Man, that's frustrating... tech isn't working but expectations remain the same. Missing chunks of lectures because of laptop issues then falling behind. That digital divide affecting your learning directly.
Mera family member critically ill hai. Hospital aur college dono manage karna pad raha. Kisi ko bhi puri attention nahi de pa raha.

Yaar... family crisis aur college pressure dono saath - wo torn feeling jab dono jagah zaroorat hai teri. Na yaha pura ho pata na waha. That guilt of being split between two critical responsibilities.
Maine sincere assignment kiya tha par accidentally galat folder submit kar diya. Zero marks mile. Redo ka option nahi diya.
Damn yaar... mehnat puri kari thi par technical mistake mein galat file chali gayi. Zero marks aur redo nahi - wo helplessness jab kaam toh kiya tha par submission error ne sab waste kar diya.
Teacher ne mere gender identity ko mock kiya class ke saamne. Feel unsafe now attending that class.

Yaar... teacher ne publicly mock kiya gender identity ko - that's discrimination straight up. Ab class attend karna unsafe feel hota kyunki wo authority figure hi respectful nahi. That fear and hurt of being targeted for who you are.
Mere college mein power cut bohot hota hai. Online exam ke beech mein light chali jaati hai. Exam cancel ho jata par marks zero count hota.
Uff yaar... power cut tumhari galti nahi par zero marks tumpe. Exam beech mein stop ho jata aur system mein flexibility nahi. Wo frustration jab infrastructure failure ka penalty tum bhugat rahe ho.
I'm the first person in my family to go to college. No one understands the pressure. They think it's easy and I'm just lazy.

Man, that isolation hurts... carrying this huge responsibility alone and your family doesn't even get what you're going through. They see lazy when you're actually drowning in pressure they can't comprehend.
Lab mein experiment galat ho gaya baar baar. Professor ne kaha tumse scientist nahi banega. Confidence shatter ho gayi.

Damn yaar... repeated failures aur upar se professor ne future hi negate kar diya. Scientist nahi banega sunke jo dream tha wo crushed feel hua. Wo discouragement jab authority figure tumhara potential hi dismiss kar de.
Mera roommate brilliant hai. Usse dekh ke lagta main kabhi uski level tak nahi pahunch paunga. Comparison se depression ho gaya.

Yaar... daily uski brilliance dekhna aur apne aap ko inadequate feel karna - wo constant comparison crushes you slowly. Depression mein chale gaye kyunki standard itna high lag raha ki unreachable hai.
Teacher asked me to stay after class and humiliated me privately. Said I'm wasting everyone's time by being in this course.

Man, that's crushing... private humiliation somehow cuts deeper. Being told you're wasting everyone's time - that attack on your right to even be there. That kind of cruelty from a teacher hits different.
Mujhe OCD hai. Ek hi line baar baar likhta hoon perfect banana ke liye. Exam mein time waste ho jata hai.

Yaar... OCD ki compulsion aur exam ka time pressure - wo conflict kitna exhausting hota. Line perfect chahiye mentally par exam khatam ho raha practically. Brain aur reality dono different demands kar rahe.
College festival mein forced participation hai. Nahi kiya toh internal marks katenge. Par mujhe social anxiety hai bohot.
Uff yaar... social anxiety hai severe par participation compulsory marks ke liye. Wo trapped feeling jab mental health aur marks dono line pe. Force kiya ja raha jo trigger karta hai tumhe.
My thesis got rejected after 8 months of work. Supervisor now wants completely different topic. Feel like quitting.

Damn... eight months gone just like that and now starting from zero with new topic. That devastation when all that time and effort means nothing. Quitting feels like the only escape from starting this exhausting cycle again.
Mere assignment mein grammatical errors hain kyunki English second language hai. Teacher marks kaat deti hai bina content dekhe.

Arre yaar... content strong hai par grammar pe penalty. English second language hai teri toh naturally struggle hoga par teacher sirf errors dekhti content ignore karti. Wo unfairness jab language barrier academic evaluation ban jaye.
Exam center mere ghar se 3 hours door tha. Travel mein hi thak gaya. Exam hall mein concentrate nahi ho paya.
Uff yaar... 3 hours travel aur exam se pehle hi exhausted. Concentrate kaise karega jab energy travel mein hi drain ho gayi. Wo disadvantage jab logistics hi tumhare against ho.
I have hearing impairment. Miss a lot in lectures because can't hear properly. Too embarrassed to ask professor to repeat.

Man, that's really hard... missing chunks of lectures but embarrassment stops you from asking. That double bind when disability needs accommodation but stigma keeps you silent. Learning with gaps because asking feels too vulnerable.
Mere ghar mein koi private space nahi hai study karne ke liye. 6 log ek room mein rehte hain. Noise constant rehta.
Yaar... 6 log ek room aur private space zero. Constant noise mein focus banana impossible hai. Wo struggle jab basic requirement bhi luxury hai - quiet space to study.
Professor ne mera question stupid bola class ke saamne. Ab sawaal puchne se darr lagta hai.
Damn yaar... stupid bola publicly aur ab questioning hi band ho gayi. Wo shame ek baar mein hi learning shut down kar deta. Curiosity thi par humiliation ne silence kar diya.
My coaching teacher said girls can't handle engineering. Now I doubt myself constantly even though I'm doing okay.

Man, that's so toxic... doing okay but that sexist comment planted doubt deep inside. Now every small struggle feels like proof he was right. That internalized voice questioning your capability constantly.
Mera best friend mere saath competition mein hai scholarship ke liye. Friendship strain ho gayi. Kisi ko bhi khona nahi chahta.

Yaar... best friend aur competition - wo conflict jab dono hi important hain par ek hi jeet sakta. Friendship strain ho rahi kyunki stakes high hain. Wo painful choice jab relationship aur opportunity dono line pe.
Maine peer-reviewed journal mein publish karne ki koshish kari. Reviewer comments bohot harsh the. Feel like my research is worthless.

Uff yaar... reviewer comments itne harsh ki worthless feel ho gaya khud ka kaam. Intellectual work ka rejection personally hurt karta hai. Wo discouragement jab expert validation nahi mila tumhare effort ko.
I lost my father last month. Can't focus on studies but professors say personal problems aren't excuses. Feel so alone.

Man, that's heartbreaking... grieving your father but being told personal problems don't matter. That isolation when you need compassion but get cold rules instead. How can anyone focus when carrying that kind of loss.
Mera anxiety itna badh gaya hai ki exam se ek hafte pehle se vomiting shuru ho jaati hai. Weight bhi bohot kam ho gaya.

Yaar... anxiety physical symptoms de rahi ek hafte pehle se. Vomiting aur weight loss - body literally shut down kar raha stress se. That's really serious. Kisi professional se baat kari hai is baare mein?
College ne suddenly syllabus change kar diya mid-semester. Jo padhaya unhone wo exam mein nahi aaya. Sab fail ho gaye.
Damn yaar... syllabus change mid-semester aur exam mein alag hi aaya. Sab fail hue kyunki system ne hi dhoka diya. Wo collective betrayal jab institution ka mismanagement sabka future affect kare.
Teacher ne mere religion pe comment kiya class mein. Ab uncomfortable feel hota attending that subject.

Arre yaar... religious comment publicly - that's discrimination. Ab wo class attend karna uncomfortable kyunki wo space safe nahi raha. Teacher hi bias dikha raha toh trust kaise banaye learning mein.
Mera college transfer ho gaya financial reasons se. New college mein credits transfer nahi hue. 2 saal ka kaam repeat karna padega.

Damn yaar... do saal ki mehnat sab waste ho gayi kyunki credits nahi transfer hue. Financial majboori thi transfer ki par price itna bhaari hai - repeat karna padega sab. Wo hopelessness jab time hi rewind ho jaye.
Teacher ne class mein bola reservation students deserve nahi karte admission. I'm a reserved category student. Felt so attacked.

Man, that's so hurtful... being told you don't deserve to be there because of your category. That public attack on your legitimacy in that space. When the teacher themselves perpetuate that discrimination, where do you even feel safe.
Mere paas smartphone nahi hai. Online resources access nahi kar pata. Sab classmates ke paas hai. Peeche reh gaya hoon.
Yaar... smartphone nahi toh online resources se cut off. Sabke paas hai par tere paas nahi - wo digital divide academically peeche kar raha. Basic access hi nahi hai jo dusron ke paas normal hai.
Maine scholarship interview mein nervous hoke ulti answers diye. Chance gawa diya. Ab afford nahi kar sakte college.
Uff yaar... nervousness mein answers ulte ho gaye aur scholarship gayi. Ab college afford karna question mark ban gaya. Wo regret jab one moment ne future financial security affect kar di.
Professor keeps making inappropriate comments about my appearance. Complaint kiya toh kuch action nahi hua. Scared to attend class alone.
Damn yaar... inappropriate comments aur complaint ke baad bhi no action. Ab class attend karna scary feel hota kyunki unsafe hai. Wo helplessness jab system protect nahi karta harassment se.
My single mother is working two jobs to fund my education. Pressure to succeed is crushing because I see her struggle daily.

Man, that weight is so heavy... watching her work two jobs just for your education. Every assignment feels like carrying her sacrifice on your shoulders. That pressure when failure means her struggle was for nothing.
Exam mein maine answer sahi likha tha par teacher ki handwriting itni kharab thi question samajh nahi aaya. Galat samjha. Marks nahi mile.

Arre yaar... teacher ki kharab handwriting ne tumhara answer galat direction mein le gaya. Effort toh lagi sahi par question hi misread ho gaya. Wo frustration jab clarity teacher provide nahi karta par blame tumpe.
Mera panic disorder hai. Exam hall mein attack aa jata hai. Medical certificate hai par college accept nahi karta.

Yaar... panic attacks exam hall mein aur medical proof hai phir bhi college recognize nahi karta. Wo invalidation jab documented condition ko bhi serious nahi lete. System tumhare reality ko ignore kar raha.
I sleep only 3-4 hours because of study pressure. Started hallucinating in class yesterday. Really scared now.
Bro, that's really serious... sleep deprivation so bad you're hallucinating. Your body is literally breaking down from the pressure. That fear is real when you lose grip on reality from exhaustion.
Lab partner ne deliberately galat data note kiya. Humara experiment fail hua. Uska dusre group ke saath lafda tha toh mujhe bhi involve kar diya.
