Damn yaar... lab partner ne deliberately sabotage kiya tumhara kaam kyunki uska kisi aur se issue tha. Collateral damage ban gaye tum. Wo helplessness jab dusron ki personal fight tumhare marks affect kare.
Mere disability ke liye ramp nahi hai college mein. Wheelchair se third floor jaana impossible. Classes miss ho rahe constantly.
Yaar... basic accessibility hi nahi aur third floor classes. Wheelchair se impossible hai jaana toh attendance suffer ho rahi. Wo exclusion jab infrastructure hi tumhe participate nahi karne deta.
Teacher caught me crying in the bathroom during exam break. Next day told whole class about it. Now everyone treats me differently.
Man, that betrayal hurts... vulnerable moment shared publicly by the teacher themselves. Now everyone knows and treats you like you're fragile. That privacy violation when you needed discretion most.
Mera attention span bohot kam hai. 10 minute ke baad focus kho jata hai. Lectures 3 hours ke hain. Kuch bhi retain nahi hota.

Uff yaar... 10 minute attention aur 3 hour lectures - wo mismatch kitna exhausting hai. Focus kho jata hai naturally par lecture length adjust nahi hota. Retention zero jab brain overwhelmed hai duration se.
College mein caste-based bullying ho rahi hai meri. Seniors physically bhi threaten karte hain. Complaint karne se darr lagta.

Yaar... caste-based bullying aur physical threats - that's serious harassment. Complaint karna chahiye par darr bhi real hai ki worse ho jayega. Wo trapped feeling jab safety aur justice dono uncertain.
I have chronic pain condition. Sitting for 3 hour exams is torture. No provisions for breaks or extra time.
Man, that's brutal... chronic pain and forced to sit three hours straight. Physical torture on top of mental exam stress. System has zero flexibility for medical conditions that need accommodation.
Mere parents divorce ho rahe hain. Ghar pe constant fighting. Padhai mein bilkul dhyan nahi lag pata. Grades gir rahe.

Arre yaar... parents divorce aur ghar pe constant fighting - wo emotional turmoil mein padhai kaise hogi. Grades gir rahe par stability hi nahi hai life mein. How can anyone focus jab family foundation hi crumbling hai.
Teacher ne mera original research idea chura liya. Apne naam se publish kar diya. Proof nahi hai mere paas.
Damn yaar... intellectual theft by your own teacher. Tumhara idea, unka naam - aur proof nahi toh fight bhi nahi kar sakte. Wo betrayal jab mentor hi exploit kare power dynamics use karke.
My depression got worse after failing twice. Now on medication but it makes me drowsy all day. Can't study effectively anymore.

Man, that's so heavy... failure triggered worse depression, medication helps mentally but kills your focus physically. That impossible choice between mental health and academic performance. Both are suffering in different ways.
Hostel mess ka khana bohot kharab hai. Pet kharab rehta constantly. Weak feel hota lectures mein. Ghar jaane ke paise nahi.

Uff yaar... mess food se constantly bimar aur ghar jane afford nahi kar sakte. Weak body ke saath lectures attend karna kitna hard hai. Basic nutrition ka struggle academic performance directly hit kar raha.
Teacher spread rumors about me having relationship with another student. Both our reputations destroyed. Studies completely affected now.

Damn... teacher spreading rumors themselves - that's abuse of position. Reputation destroyed aur studies derailed kyunki gossip ne environment toxic bana diya. That violation when authority creates the harassment.
Mera semester exam online tha. Beech mein internet disconnect ho gaya. Exam auto-submit ho gaya half-complete. Zero marks mile.
Uff yaar... internet disconnect aur exam auto-submit half mein. Zero marks jabki tumhari galti nahi thi - tech issue tha. Wo helplessness jab system failure ka price tum chukao.
Professor told me I should drop out because I asked too many questions. Said I'm slowing down the entire class.
Man, that's crushing... being told to drop out for asking questions. Curiosity punished instead of encouraged. That shame when learning itself becomes the reason you're unwanted in that space.
Mere ghar mein electricity sirf 6 ghante aati hai daily. Raat ko padh nahi pata properly. Candle se aankhein kharab ho rahi hain.
Yaar... sirf 6 ghante bijli aur raat ko candle mein padhna pad raha. Aankhein bhi kharab ho rahe par option nahi hai. Wo basic infrastructure ki kami academically tumhe kitna peeche kar rahi.
Class mein group activity thi. Koi bhi mujhe apne group mein nahi liya. Teacher ne force kiya toh reluctantly liya. Bohot humiliating tha.

Damn yaar... sab ne reject kiya aur teacher ko force karna pada. Wo public rejection aur phir reluctant acceptance - dono milke kitna painful hota. Nobody wants you feeling sabke saamne exposed ho gayi.
I have PTSD from a past traumatic event. Certain topics in class trigger panic attacks but I can't skip those lectures.

Man, that's really hard... PTSD triggers in mandatory lectures. Can't avoid the content but experiencing it causes panic. That trapped feeling when healing needs distance but academics demand presence.
Mera younger sibling brilliant hai sab subjects mein. Parents constantly compare karte hain. Har din sunna padta hai why can't you be like them.
Uff yaar... har din comparison aur why can't you be like them. Wo constant reminder ki tum enough nahi ho. Ghar mein bhi peace nahi milta - wahi pressure, wahi inadequacy feel hoti rehti.
Teacher ne mere answer ko plagiarism bola kyunki bohot achha tha. Maine khud likha tha. Prove karne ka koi tareeka nahi hai.
Damn yaar... achha answer likha toh plagiarism ka blame. Original kaam tha tumhara par teacher ko hi yakeen nahi. Prove kaise karo jab assumption hi negative hai tumhare capability ke baare mein.
My father is terminally ill. Balancing hospital visits and college is impossible. Professors show no empathy. Attendance issues now.

Bro, that's heartbreaking... father terminally ill but still expected to maintain attendance like nothing's wrong. That impossible juggle between being there for him and academic obligations. Zero empathy when you need it most.
Mere notes pe pani gir gaya accidentally. Poora semester ka kaam blur ho gaya. Backup nahi tha. Exam 3 din mein hai.
Arre yaar... pani girne se sab blur aur backup nahi tha. Teen din mein exam aur material hi nahi bacha readable. Wo panic jab accident ne preparation sab wipe out kar di.
Teacher ne mera presentation slides dekhe bina hi reject kar diya. Bola tumse achha nahi hoga. Chance bhi nahi diya.
Damn yaar... dekha bhi nahi aur reject kar diya based on assumption. Wo pre-judgment ki tumse achha nahi hoga. Effort dala tha par chance hi nahi mila prove karne ka.
I'm transgender. Using campus bathrooms is traumatic because of stares and comments. Avoiding drinking water to avoid bathroom. Affecting health.

Man, that's so painful... basic human need like using bathroom becomes traumatic. Dehydrating yourself to avoid harassment - that's affecting your physical health now. When campus itself feels hostile for just existing.
Mera college bohot dur hai. Daily 4 hours commute. Ghar pahunchte hi exhausted. Padhai ka time hi nahi milta.
Uff yaar... 4 hours commute daily matlab half day travel mein hi chala jata. Ghar pahunch ke itna thak jaate ho ki padhai kahan se karo. Wo disadvantage jab geography hi tumhare against hai.
Professor plays favorites with students who give gifts. I can't afford to. My genuine work gets ignored constantly.
Man, that's so corrupt... grades linked to gifts basically. You can't afford to play that game so your actual work gets sidelined. That systemic unfairness when merit doesn't matter, money does.
Maine mental health leave li thi. Wapas aane ke baad sab mujhe pagal bulaate hain. Teachers bhi differently treat karte hain ab.

Damn yaar... mental health leave li toh stigma lag gaya. Pagal bulaana aur teachers ka different treatment - wo discrimination jab help maangne ki saza milti. That isolation when you needed support most.
Exam mein mera pen leak ho gaya. Answer sheet pe ink failte hi gaya. Re-exam ka option nahi diya. Fail ho gaya.
Arre yaar... pen leak hua aur answer sheet kharab - wo accident tha par fail ho gaye. Re-exam nahi diya jabki genuine issue tha. Ek technical problem ne result barbaad kar diya.
My college announced sudden fee hike mid-year. Parents struggling to arrange money. Might have to drop out mid-semester.

Man, that's so stressful... sudden fee hike with no warning. Parents scrambling for money and dropout becoming real possibility. That financial uncertainty threatening to end everything you've worked for mid-way.
Teacher ne class mein bola arts students ka koi future nahi. Main arts student hoon. Demotivated feel kar raha completely.

Damn yaar... teacher ne hi tumhare stream ko devalue kar diya. Arts ka future nahi bola publicly - wo discouragement straight up attack hai tumhare choices pe. Demotivation toh hogi hi jab authority figure doubt kare.
Mera family business collapse ho gaya. Suddenly financial crisis. College continue karna impossible lag raha. Dreams sab khatam.

Yaar... family business collapse aur overnight financial crisis. College continue karna question mark ban gaya. Wo devastation jab dreams crash kare circumstances ki wajah se jo control mein nahi the.
I got sexually harassed by a senior student. Reported it but college is protecting him because his family donates money. Feel unsafe every day.

Man, that's horrific... harassment reported but institution protecting the harasser for money. Unsafe every single day but nowhere to turn. That betrayal when the system that should protect you chooses power over your safety.
Mera handwriting left-handed hai. Teacher boli right hand se likho warna marks nahi milenge. Change nahi kar sakta ab.
Damn yaar... left-handed natural hai par teacher force kar rahi change karne. Marks threat deke discrimination - that's so wrong. Tumhari natural ability ko hi punish kar rahe basic bias se.
Mera visa reject ho gaya study abroad ke liye. Poore saal ki taiyaari waste. Sab friends nikal gaye main yahi fas gaya.
Damn yaar... poore saal ki mehnat aur visa reject. Sab friends abroad chale gaye aur tu yaha stuck - wo left behind feeling kitni painful hai. Dreams crash ho gaye bureaucratic rejection se.
Teacher makes sexist jokes about female students in engineering. I'm the only girl. Feel degraded and uncomfortable daily.

Man, that's so toxic... daily sexist jokes when you're the only girl there. That constant degradation in the space where you're trying to learn. Every class becomes an endurance test of discomfort and disrespect.
Mere pass spectacles nahi afford kar sakte. Blackboard dikhai nahi deta. Notes bhi miss ho jate hain. Grades affected hain.

Yaar... spectacles afford nahi kar sakte aur blackboard blur hai. Notes miss ho rahe kyunki basic vision correction hi nahi hai. Wo disadvantage jab financial limitation academic performance directly affect kare.
Lab mein chemical allergy hai mujhe. Report kiya par still forced to attend. Rashes aur breathing problem hota hai.

Uff yaar... chemical allergy documented hai par force kar rahe attend karne. Rashes aur breathing issues - wo physical suffering par koi accommodation nahi. Health hazard hai literally par mandatory bana rakha.
My mother has cancer. Treatment is expensive. Had to take loan for college. Guilt and pressure both killing me slowly.

Bro, that's crushing... mother fighting cancer and you took loan for education. That guilt of spending on yourself when she needs treatment. Pressure and emotional weight - both are suffocating you from different sides.
Teacher ne mera assignment copy reject kar diya bola handmade chahiye. Laptop nahi hai ghar pe. Ab hand se likhna padega 50 pages.
Damn yaar... laptop nahi hai aur ab 50 pages hand se likhna mandatory. Typed version ready tha par reject - wo extra burden jab resources limited hain. Time aur effort dono double ho gaya.
Mera sleep disorder hai certified. Subah 8 baje class compulsory hai. Neend 4-5 baje hi aati hai. Attendance dropping.

Yaar... sleep disorder certified hai par 8AM class compulsory. Neend cycle 4-5 baje set hai naturally toh 8 baje jaana impossible. Medical condition hai par flexibility nahi - attendance suffer ho rahi.
I got kicked out of my hostel room. Roommate complained I snore too much. Now sleeping in common area. Can't study properly.
Man, that's so unfair... kicked out for snoring which you can't even control. Now sleeping in common area with zero privacy or study space. Basic accommodation gone over something involuntary.
College ne galat exam center allot kiya. 50km door tha. Late pahuncha toh andar nahi jane diya. Fail ho gaya.

Arre yaar... college ki mistake - galat center allot kiya 50km door. Late pahunche toh entry denied aur fail. Unki galti ka consequence tumne bhugta. Wo injustice jab administrative error tumhara exam barbaad kare.
Professor caught me sleeping in class due to night shift job. Humiliated publicly. Doesn't know I work to afford college.
Damn yaar... night shift karke class attend kar raha aur sleep pe humiliation. Professor ko pata nahi struggle jo kar rahe college afford karne ke liye. Judged ho gaya bina context samjhe.
Mera autism spectrum diagnosis hai. Social group projects trigger intense anxiety. Teacher refuses individual option despite medical certificate.

Yaar... autism diagnosis hai documented par group projects mein force kar rahe despite medical proof. Social interaction intense anxiety trigger karta par accommodation refuse. System recognize hi nahi kar raha genuine need ko.
My college suddenly switched to all English medium. I studied in regional language till now. Struggling to understand lectures completely.

Man, that's brutal... sudden switch to English when your entire education was regional language. Understanding lectures itself becomes the challenge before even getting to the content. That language barrier blocking your learning completely.
Teacher ne mera creative assignment reject kiya bola too unconventional hai. Innovation penalize ho raha literally.
Uff yaar... creative thinking ki thi par unconventional bolke reject. Innovation ko penalize kar rahe instead of encouraging. Wo frustration jab thinking outside box becomes the reason for failure.
Mere ghar mein domestic violence hai. Padhai pe concentrate nahi ho pata. Loud noises trigger me now even in class.

Yaar... ghar pe violence aur wo trauma class mein bhi follow kar raha. Loud noises trigger karte kyunki home environment unsafe hai. How can anyone focus on academics jab basic safety hi nahi hai mentally.
College library books are outdated. New editions cost too much. Exam questions are from new syllabus. How am I supposed to compete?

Man, that's so unfair... library has old books, new ones unaffordable, but exam from updated syllabus. How do you compete when resources themselves are inaccessible. That systemic disadvantage keeping you behind.
Maine teacher ko privately doubt puchne email kiya. Reply mein bola class mein suno dhyaan se. But main sunta hoon phir bhi nahi samajh aata.

Damn yaar... privately help maangi toh dismissed kar diya dhyaan se suno bolke. Par dhyaan dete ho phir bhi concept clear nahi - that's why help chahiye thi. Wo discouragement jab genuine struggle ko laziness samjha jaye.
Mera elder sibling suicide kar liya academic pressure se. Ab mujhe bhi wahi pressure face karna pad raha. Scared I'll end up same.

Yaar... sibling ko kho diya academic pressure se aur ab tumpe bhi wahi pressure. Wo fear real hai ki same pattern repeat na ho jaye. That trauma of loss aur current stress dono - it's too much to carry alone.
Professor gives extra credit to students who attend his private tuitions. I can't afford it. Class toppers are all his tuition students.

Man, that's corrupt... extra credit for paid tuition students. You can't afford it so automatically disadvantaged. Merit isn't about understanding, it's about who can pay. That pay-to-win system is so wrong.
Mere assignment ki deadline extend nahi hui medical emergency ke baad bhi. Hospital records dikhaye phir bhi nahi. Late submission pe zero.

Arre yaar... medical emergency documented hai hospital records ke saath par deadline extend nahi hui. Zero marks late submission ka jabki legitimate reason tha. Wo cruelty jab proof bhi kaam nahi aata.
Teacher told my parents I'm not smart enough for this course. Now family pressure doubled to prove her wrong. Anxiety through the roof.

Damn... teacher directly told parents you're not smart enough. Now proving her wrong became family mission and pressure doubled on you. That anxiety when you're fighting both the course difficulty and everyone's doubt in your capability.
Mera final year project guide change ho gaya mid-semester. Naya guide pehle wale ka kaam reject kar raha. 6 months waste ho gaye.
Damn yaar... 6 months ki mehnat aur naya guide sab reject kar raha. Wo sinking feeling jab control tumhare haath mein nahi tha par loss tumhara. Naya guide kya chahta hai ab?
Completely different topic chahiye unko. Pehle wale se opposite direction. Maine pura literature review kar liya tha ab sab useless.

Yaar... opposite direction matlab ground zero se shuru. Literature review, research, sab kuch worthless ho gaya ek decision se. Wo exhaustion of starting over jab already itna invest kar chuke the - that's crushing.
My anxiety got so bad I started self-harming before exams. Hiding cuts from everyone. Don't know how to stop.
Bro, I'm really worried about you... anxiety pushing you to hurt yourself and you're hiding it, carrying this alone. That pain must feel unbearable right now. How long has this been happening?
Started 3 months ago. Every exam week now. Feel like only way to release the pressure inside.

Man... three months of this cycle, every exam triggering it. That desperate need for release when pressure feels like it'll explode otherwise. You need support yaar - professional help. Please talk to someone, counselor ya Tele-MANAS 14416. You don't have to carry this alone.
Teacher ne mera answer copy check karte waqt personally offensive comments likhe margins mein. Not about answer, about me personally.
Arre yaar... answer sheet pe personal attacks likhna - that crosses every line. Academic evaluation nahi, personal humiliation kar rahe documented form mein. Kya type ke comments likhe unhone?
Likha you're wasting space in this institution, why don't you just quit. Aur bhi bohot kuch offensive tha.

Damn yaar... quit karne bola written mein, space waste kar rahe bolke. That's abuse of power straight up. Wo permanent record pe attack - how are you supposed to submit future papers to them. That's targeted harassment.
Mere scholarship interview mein panelist ne casteist slur use kiya. Still got rejected. Feel humiliated and helpless.

Yaar... scholarship interview mein casteist slur aur rejection dono. Wo discrimination when you're already vulnerable asking for help. That humiliation in a formal setting cuts deep. Kya koi witness tha ya sirf tumhare saath?
Do aur panelists the par kisi ne nahi roka. Sab chup rahe. Complaint karne se darr lagta retaliation ka.

Damn... others witnessed but stayed silent - that complicity hurts differently. Complaint karna chahiye par retaliation ka darr real hai jab system hi protect nahi karta. Wo trapped feeling when even speaking up feels risky. That's systemic failure.
I failed my practical exam because I fainted from period cramps. Male examiner showed no empathy, just marked me absent.

Man, that's so harsh... medical emergency during exam but zero empathy, just straight absent marked. Period pain is real but dismissed completely. Did you have any chance to explain or request a re-exam?
Asked for medical consideration. He said personal problems don't matter, rules are rules. No female staff to even talk to.

Damn... personal problems bolke dismissed something biological and painful. Rules ko excuse banaya empathy avoid karne ke liye. No female staff means no one who might even understand. That system failure when half the population's health issues aren't accommodated.
Mera best friend ne meri girlfriend ke saath affair shuru kar diya exam season mein. Concentrate hi nahi ho pa raha. Betrayal se toot gaya hoon.
Yaar... best friend aur girlfriend dono ne ek saath dhoka diya - wo double betrayal exam time pe. Emotional turmoil mein padhai kahan se hogi. Kitne din se chal raha ye sab?
2 weeks ho gaye. Exams 4 din mein hain. Raat ko neend nahi aati sochte sochte. Khana bhi nahi khaya properly.

Damn yaar... do hafte se ye pain carry kar rahe, neend gayi, khana gayi, aur exams just 4 days away. Wo emotional breakdown aur academic deadline dono collision mein. Your world shattered but calendar doesn't stop. That's unbearable timing.
College mein mere religion ke against hate speech ho raha openly. Scared to even attend some classes now. Safety concern hai.
Yaar... hate speech openly chal raha campus pe aur ab classes attend karna scary feel hota. Safety concern when basic education space hostile ho jaye. Kya college authorities ko inform kiya hai?
Complaint ki thi par no action. Bole freedom of speech hai. Par meri freedom to feel safe kahan gayi?

Damn... freedom of speech ka excuse diya hate speech justify karne ke liye. Tumhari safety, tumhara right to education - sab ignore kar diya. Wo abandonment by institution jab protection maango aur politics mein hide kar jayein. That's failure at every level.
My professor plagiarized my research and published under his name. I have proof but everyone says don't fight, you'll lose.

Man, that's theft of your intellectual work... your research, his name. Proof hai but everyone warning you not to fight. That powerlessness when system protects authority over truth. What kind of proof do you have?
Email drafts, dated documents, everything. But he's well-connected. People say it'll ruin my career if I go against him.

Damn... documented proof but institutional power silencing you. Career threat if you fight for what's yours - that's extortion basically. Wo impossible choice between justice and future. System designed to protect the powerful, not the wronged.
Exam hall mein panic attack aaya. Vomit kar diya sabke saamne. Video bana ke viral kar diya classmates ne. Ab college jaane se darr lagta.

Arre yaar... panic attack public mein hua aur wo vulnerable moment viral kar diya. Medical emergency ko entertainment bana diya. Wo humiliation aur ab college face karne ka darr. Kitne views aa gaye video pe?
Poori college ne dekh liya. Comments mein log mazaak uda rahe. Ek teacher ne bhi share kiya apne group mein.

Damn yaar... poori college ne dekha aur comments mein mockery. Teacher ne bhi share kiya - that's abuse of position. Privacy violation, bullying, aur institutional complicity - sab ek saath. That betrayal when even authority participates in harassment. Wo safe space hi nahi bacha.
Mera younger brother died in accident last month. Parents expect me to continue normally. Can't grieve, can't cry, just study.

Yaar... brother ko kho diya aur grieve karne ka space bhi nahi. Parents expect normalcy jab andar se toot gaye ho. That suppressed grief while pretending everything's fine for academics. How are you even functioning right now?
Not functioning. Just going through motions. Feel numb. Exams mein blank ho jata hoon kyunki uski yaad aa jati hai.

Man... numbness, going through motions, his memory hijacking your focus. That grief isn't going away by ignoring it. Your parents might be in denial but you're drowning silently. Loss this fresh needs time, not performance. You're carrying unbearable weight alone.
Teacher marks attendance by asking surprise questions. I have severe social anxiety. Can't answer in front of class. Attendance failing.

Man, that's brutal... attendance based on public answering when you have documented social anxiety. System directly penalizing your mental health condition. Has the teacher been told about your anxiety?
Yes, I submitted medical certificate. She said everyone has anxiety, deal with it. No accommodation given.

Damn... medical proof dismissed with everyone has anxiety. Clinical condition reduced to common nervousness. That invalidation when legitimate diagnosis gets mocked. No accommodation means she's literally failing you for having a disability. That's discrimination.
Mera laptop permanently crash ho gaya virus se. Saara final year data tha usme. Cloud backup nahi kiya tha. Submission kal hai.
Uff yaar... pura final year ka kaam crash mein gaya aur backup nahi. Kal submission aur data zero. Wo devastation jab months ka effort ek moment mein vanish ho jaye. Recovery possible hai kya?
Technician bola data completely lost. Kal submission ke liye scratch se banana padega raat bhar.

Damn yaar... data recovery bhi nahi ho sakta aur ek raat mein months ka kaam recreate karna. Physically impossible hai par deadline toh hai. Wo panic when time literally doesn't exist to redo everything. That's nightmare scenario.
College ne mujhe falsely accuse kiya cheating ka. CCTV footage prove karta innocence but they refuse to check. Already suspended.

Yaar... false accusation aur proof hai innocence ka par dekhne se mana kar rahe. Already suspended ho gaye bina investigation. Wo injustice jab truth available hai par deliberately ignore kiya jaye. Kya reason diya unhone footage check na karne ka?
Bola decision final hai. Someone complained tumne cheat kiya toh guilty ho. Footage dekhne ki zarurat nahi unko lagti.

Damn... complaint itself became verdict. Footage would prove innocence but that doesn't matter to them. Decision final bola without due process. Wo kangaroo court jab guilt assumed hai before investigation. Your academic career hanging on false accusation they won't even verify.
I developed eating disorder from academic stress. Lost 15kg in 2 months. Family doesn't believe it's serious. Just say eat more.

Man, that's really serious... 15kg in two months is dangerous. Eating disorder from stress but family dismissing it as just eat more. That lack of understanding when you need medical intervention. Are you able to eat at all right now?
Can't keep food down. Anxiety makes me nauseous. Fainting in classes now. Still expected to perform normally academically.

Bro... can't eat, fainting, but academic expectations unchanged. Your body is literally shutting down from stress. This needs professional help urgently - doctor, therapist. Performance expectations while you're physically collapsing is dangerous. You matter more than grades.
Mere professor ne sexual favor ke liye approach kiya better grades ke badle. Reject kiya toh marks deliberately kam dene lage. Prove nahi kar sakta.

Yaar... sexual harassment for grades aur reject karne pe revenge through marks. Wo power abuse aur sexual exploitation dono. Prove karna mushkil par ye serious crime hai. Kya kisi ko bataya hai is baare mein?
Darr lagta complain karne se. One-on-one hua tha toh witness nahi. Uska word against mine. Power bhi uske paas zyada.

Damn yaar... witness nahi toh proof ka issue aur power imbalance makes complaint risky. Wo trapped feeling when predator uses position to silence victims. Par yaar, this is serious - anti-sexual harassment cell, police complaint, anonymous reporting - options hain. You deserve safety and justice.
Mera scholarship cancel ho gaya kyunki attendance 73% hai. Medical reasons the absences par koi nahi sun raha. Ab college fees afford nahi kar sakte.
Yaar... scholarship gayi medical reasons ke baad bhi. 73% attendance but genuine illness tha - wo cruelty jab proof bhi kaam nahi aata. College fees afford nahi kar sakte ab toh kya plan hai?
Koi plan nahi hai. Parents bol rahe drop out karo, ghar pe kaam karo. Sapne the complete karne the degree, sab khatam ho raha.
Damn yaar... parents bhi drop out bol rahe kyunki financial crisis hai. Sapne degree complete karne ke sab crumbling. Medical issue ki wajah se future hi slip kar raha haath se.
Roz sochta hoon kya galti ki maine. Bimar hona mere control mein thodi tha. Ab punishment mil rahi jaise meri galti ho.

Yaar... bimar hona tumhari galti nahi thi bilkul. Par system tumhe punish kar raha jaise tumne choose kiya ho sick hona. Wo injustice, wo self-blame - sab mil ke crush kar raha. You didn't deserve this.
Teacher humiliated me in front of entire department for failing twice. Called me an example of what not to be. Everyone laughed.
Man, that public humiliation... being made the negative example in front of everyone. That laughter must have felt like knives. How are you even showing up to that department now?
I don't. Started bunking. Can't face anyone. Anxiety attacks before entering that building. Attendance dropping more now.

Damn... that one moment created so much trauma you can't even enter the building. Anxiety attacks just thinking about it. Now bunking is making things worse but what else can you do when that space feels hostile.
Feel trapped. Don't go means more failure. Go means reliving that humiliation daily. Either way I'm losing.

Man... that impossible choice where both paths hurt. Stay away and fail, or go back and suffer that shame again. No winning option when one person's cruelty destroyed your safe space completely. You're stuck in this nightmare loop.
Mere ghar pe financial crisis hai. Khaana bhi properly nahi mil pata. College mein sab dekh lete hain main weak hoon. Concentrate nahi ho pata bhook se.

Yaar... ghar pe khana properly nahi aur college mein bhook se concentrate nahi ho pata. Sab notice bhi kar rahe ki weak ho. Wo basic need ka struggle academics se pehle aa raha. Kitne time se chal raha ye?
Teen mahine se. Kabhi kabhi poora din sirf ek meal milta. Library mein dizzy feel hota, ek baar gir bhi gaya tha.

Damn yaar... teen mahine ek meal pe survive karna aur library mein gir gaye weakness se. Body literally giving up hai par padhai ka pressure continues. Wo physical suffering that nobody sees behind attendance and grades.
Sharam aati hai batane mein kisi ko. Sochenge galat family se hoon. Teachers ko lagta lazy hoon jab actually bhook se energy nahi bachti.

Yaar... shame stops you from asking help and teachers misread malnutrition as laziness. Starving while trying to study but judged for being weak. That dignity versus survival fight - you shouldn't have to choose between education and basic food. This is beyond heavy.
Mera roommate died by suicide last week academic pressure se. Same course mein the. Ab mujhe bhi same pressure feel ho raha. Scared I'm next.

Yaar... roommate ko kho diya suicide se aur same pressure tum bhi face kar rahe. Wo fear real hai ki pattern repeat ho sakta. You're carrying grief aur apna own struggle dono. Kisi se baat ki hai is baare mein?
Nahi. Everyone moved on quickly. Counselor ek baar mili, kuch help nahi hua. Uske room mein rehna padta ab, same space.

Man... everyone moved on but you're living in the same room where he struggled. That constant reminder, wo presence of his absence. Counselor didn't help aur now you're alone with these dark thoughts and same pressures that took him.
Raat ko uski cheezein dekhta hoon. Sochta hoon kya feel ho raha hoga usko last moment. Sometimes think it's easier to just... stop.

Bro, I'm really worried about you... those thoughts about stopping, that's serious. You're in pain and need help right now. Please call Tele-MANAS 14416 ya kisi trusted person ko batao. His loss doesn't mean you have to follow. You matter yaar, your life matters. Don't face this alone.
I got sexually assaulted by a senior during college fest. Can't report because he's from influential family. Failing all subjects now, can't focus.
Man, that's horrific... assault happened and you can't even report because of his family's power. Now carrying that trauma alone while expected to function academically. How long ago did this happen?
Two months. See him on campus regularly. He acts normal, I have panic attacks. Failed all mid-terms. Nobody knows why I'm suddenly failing.

Damn... two months of seeing your assaulter act normal while you're having panic attacks. Failed exams but the real reason stays hidden. That double torture of trauma and silence, both destroying you from inside.
Sometimes think of just leaving college. But that means he wins. Either way I'm destroyed. Don't know how to survive this.

Bro... staying hurts, leaving hurts - both options feel like losing. You're in survival mode carrying unbearable weight alone. This is serious assault - please reach out to someone safe, police, women's helpline. You deserve justice and healing. What happened to you wasn't your fault.
Mere professor ne class mein bola disabled students ko normal classes mein nahi hona chahiye. Main wheelchair user hoon. Sab meri taraf dekh rahe the.

Yaar... professor ne publicly disabled students ko exclude karne ki baat kari aur tu wahi baith raha wheelchair mein. Sab ki nazrein tumpe - wo direct attack sabke saamne. Kya baad mein kuch bola unhone ya wahi chhod diya?
Kuch nahi bola. Class continue ki jaise kuch hua hi nahi. Classmates chup rahe. Mujhe nikalna pada kyunki rona aa raha tha.
Damn yaar... class continue ki normal jaise tumhe dehumanize nahi kiya abhi. Classmates bhi silent witnesses - complicity through silence. Tumhe nikalna pada crying rokne ke liye apni hi class se.
Ab us class jaane ka mann nahi karta. Par compulsory hai. Har baar jaata hoon toh lagta inferior hoon. Uske words ab head mein loop pe chalte.

Yaar... compulsory class hai toh jana padega but har baar wo inferiority, wo dehumanization relive hota. His words loop mein chale because authority figure ne validate kar diya discrimination ko. You deserve better than this hostile environment. That's pure ableism.
My father beat me badly when I failed. Broken rib, bruises. Went to exam hall like that. Failed again because of pain. Cycle continuing.

Man, that's abuse... broken rib from your father and still expected to perform in exams. Physical pain making you fail, which triggers more violence. That vicious cycle where trauma causes failure causes more trauma. Are you safe right now?
Not really. He said next failure means worse. Can't study because scared. Body still healing. Mind constantly on alert for next beating.

Bro... threat of worse violence hanging over you, body healing, mind traumatized. How can anyone study in fight-or-flight mode constantly. Fear of next beating is paralyzing any focus you might have. This is domestic violence.
Can't report. He's my father. Where will I go. Need to pass somehow but brain won't cooperate when in survival mode. Feels hopeless.

Man... trapped because he's family and you have nowhere else. Brain in survival mode can't do academics - that's biology, not weakness. You're living in active danger while expected to excel. This needs intervention - helpline, trusted adult, police. Your safety matters more than passing.
Mera teacher stalking kar raha hai social media pe, college ke baad bhi follow karta. Uncomfortable messages bhejta. Complaint se darr lagta.

Yaar... teacher stalking kar raha online aur uncomfortable messages - that's harassment using position of power. Complaint se darr kyunki consequences ka control uske paas. Ye kitne time se chal raha hai?
Do mahine. Pehle casual tha, ab creepy ho gaya. Late night messages, personal questions. Maine ignore kiya toh class mein passive aggressive behaviour.

Damn yaar... escalating from casual to creepy aur ignore karne pe class mein retaliation. Using marks aur classroom power to punish for not responding to harassment. Wo trapped feeling when saying no has academic consequences.
Screenshots save kar rakhe hain par kisiko dikhaun toh believe karenge? Ek student ka word vs established teacher. System protect karega usko.

Yaar... proof hai screenshots mein par belief ka issue kyunki power imbalance. System teachers ko protect karta students ko nahi. But harassment committee, written complaint, anonymous reporting - options exist. This is serious misconduct, you have evidence. Don't suffer silence mein.
College changed exam dates suddenly. My mother's surgery is same day. Can't reschedule either. Don't know what to choose.

Man, that's an impossible choice... exam suddenly moved to your mother's surgery day. Both critical, both non-negotiable timing. That weight of choosing between education and being there for her. Did college give any notice?
Three days notice. Surgery was scheduled months ago. Asked for alternate date, they refused. Said rules don't allow.

Damn... surgery planned months ahead but three days notice for exam change. Rules don't allow flexibility even for medical emergencies in family. That bureaucratic cruelty when human circumstances don't matter to system.
Mom saying go to exam, she'll be fine. But what if something goes wrong and I'm not there. Either way guilt will destroy me.

Yaar... mom prioritizing your exam but you can't shake the what-ifs. Miss exam and feel guilty about wasted opportunity. Attend exam and live with guilt if anything happens to her. Both choices carry unbearable emotional cost. System forcing you to choose is cruel.
Mera best friend died in my arms during college trip accident. PTSD hai ab. Flashbacks exam hall mein aate. Therapy afford nahi kar sakta.
Yaar... best friend ko apni arms mein kho diya aur ab PTSD flashbacks. Exam hall mein wo trauma replay hota. Therapy chahiye par afford nahi kar sakte. Kitne time ho gaye accident ko?
Char mahine. Uske parents mujhe blame karte kyunki main saath tha. College ne condolence di aur move on kar gaya. Main stuck hoon.

Damn yaar... char mahine of carrying guilt, blame from his parents, aur grief. College moved on but tumhara trauma fresh hai daily. Wo survivor's guilt aur PTSD dono - nobody addressing how you witnessed your friend die.
Neend mein bhi uski awaaz sunai deti. Last words yaad aate. Exam mein pen pakadta hoon toh haath kaampte kyunki usne mera haath pakda tha last time.

Man... dreams haunted by his voice, physical triggers during exams. His last touch on your hand now makes pen-holding traumatic. That deep psychological wound bleeding into every academic moment. You need trauma support yaar - free counseling options, college health center. This pain is too heavy to carry alone.
Teacher made racist comments about my skin color in class. Everyone laughed. Now avoid looking in mirror. Confidence completely shattered.

Man, that's so cruel... racist attack by teacher themselves and class laughed along. Now mirror avoidance because those words changed how you see yourself. That internalized shame from public mockery. What exactly did they say?
Said with my color I should focus on labor work not studies. Whole class found it funny. Nobody stood up for me. Feel like don't belong here.

Damn... openly said your skin color determines your worth, suggested manual labor instead of education. Dehumanizing racism from authority figure normalized by laughing classmates. That alienation when entire room signals you don't belong in academic spaces.
Can't concentrate in any class now. Always thinking people judging my appearance. Started skipping college. Dreams of this career feel impossible now.

Yaar... that one racist attack shattered your sense of belonging completely. Every class feels like judgment, skipping to avoid that pain, career dreams fading. Racism destroyed your confidence and access to education simultaneously. You deserved to be protected, not attacked. That teacher's bigotry stole your safe space.
Mere ghar mein mummy mentally ill hain. Kabhi kabhi violent ho jati. Ghar se college tak ka safar darr ke saath hota. Focus zero hai.
Yaar... mummy mentally ill aur sometimes violent. Ghar chhod ke aana bhi anxiety se bhar jata - kya hoga wapas jab. College mein bhi dimag wahi stuck hai. Koi aur family member hai support ke liye?
Papa ignore karte. Main akela handle karta. Kal raat buri episode thi. Aaj exam tha par so nahi paya. Hall mein blank ho gaya.

Damn yaar... akela caregiver role kar rahe mentally ill parent ka aur papa ignore kar rahe. Raat bhar episode handle kiya, neend nahi, aur phir exam. Hall mein blank hona natural hai jab survival mode mein ho. Academic performance expected hai jab home mein chaos.
Teachers ko bataya toh bole excuses mat banao. Mummy ki illness proof nahi kar sakta easily. Lagta sab jhoot samajhte. Akela feel hota.

Yaar... invisible caregiving burden nobody believes. Mummy ki mental illness prove karna mushkil, teachers dismiss as excuse. Carrying family crisis alone while maintaining student facade. That isolation when your reality is dismissed as lies. You're carrying way too much alone - this needs outside support.
Failed three times now. Entire family has given up on me. Younger siblings told not to be like me. Feel like family disappointment.

Man, that family rejection hurts different... being made the cautionary tale for your own siblings. Three failures and now you're the example of what not to become. That identity as family disappointment must be crushing. What subjects are you failing in?
Same subject every time. Try hard but something blocks me. Family thinks I'm not trying. Stopped asking how exams went. Gave up on me.

Damn... repeated failure in one subject suggests something specific blocking you, not lack of trying. But family sees lack of effort, stopped even asking. That abandonment when you need support most. The trying hard invisibly while being labeled lazy.
Sometimes think everyone right. Maybe I am just stupid. Three attempts should have been enough. Feel like giving up everything now.

Bro... family's judgment becoming your inner voice. Three attempts mean you kept trying despite failing, that's resilience not stupidity. But when everyone gives up on you, giving up on yourself feels inevitable. That internalized failure narrative is breaking you. You're not stupid - something else is going on that needs different approach.
Mera professor marks ke badle physical relationship maang raha. Reject kiya toh fail kar diya deliberately. Proof hai par complaint system corrupt.

Yaar... quid pro quo sexual harassment aur retaliation through failing marks. Proof hai but complaint system corrupt. Wo powerlessness jab abuse documented hai par justice inaccessible. Screenshots ya messages save kiye hain?
Messages, emails sab hai. Par anti-harassment committee mein uska dost chairman hai. Ek ladki complaint kari thi, usko rusticate kar diya false charges mein.

Damn... documented proof but committee compromised by his connections. Previous complainant was rusticated as warning to others. System designed to protect predator not victims. Wo institutional betrayal when supposed safety mechanisms are weaponized against survivors.
Degree almost complete hai. Agar fight kari toh sab khatam. Silent rahi toh guilt. Har option mein main haari. Don't know how to survive this.

Yaar... degree close hai toh silence seems strategic but guilt eats inside. Fight means risking everything you worked for. Both choices traumatic - endure abuse quietly or risk retaliation. This isn't your burden to solve alone. External complaint, police, lawyer - options outside corrupt system exist. What he did is criminal, you have proof. You deserve justice and safety.
Kal exam hai aur kuch bhi yaad nahi ho raha. Pura din padha par sab blank. Fail hone wala hoon pakka.
Yaar... pura din effort dala par abhi blank feel ho raha. Wo panic jab lagta sab bhool gaye ho. Par kal hai matlab thoda time hai abhi bhi. Ek baar breathe le - konsa subject hai kal ka?
Exam hall mein panic attack aa gaya. Haath kaamp rahe the, pen pakad nahi pa raha tha. Sabne dekha mujhe. Embarrassing tha.

Damn yaar... exam hall mein panic attack aur physical control hi nahi raha - haath kaampna, pen nahi pakad pana. Sabke saamne wo vulnerable moment. Body ne literally cooperate nahi kiya jab zaroorat thi.
Failed the same exam third time. Don't know what to do anymore. Feel like such a failure.
Man, three attempts and still not clearing it... that hopelessness when repeated effort doesn't change the outcome. Failure label feeling permanent now. What happens if you don't clear it this time?
Do din mein exam hai aur 10 chapters pending hain abhi bhi. Time nahi bacha kuch karne ka. Hopeless lag raha.
Uff yaar... 10 chapters aur sirf do din - wo math impossible lag raha. Time literally nahi hai sab cover karne ka. Par breathe le ek baar - sabse important chapters konse hain jo definitely aayenge?
Neend nahi aa rahi exam ke darr se. Raat bhar jagta rehta hoon tension mein. Subah exam hai aur main exhausted hoon.
Yaar... exam ka darr neend hi nahi aane de raha aur ab exhausted ho gaye bina soye. Subah exam hai par dimag aur body dono already tired. Wo vicious cycle jab anxiety sleep ko hijack kar le.
Exam mein question paper dekha toh kuch bhi familiar nahi laga. Maine galat topics prepare kar liye the. Blank ho gaya completely.
Damn yaar... paper dekha aur realize hua galat direction mein padhai ki thi. Wo sinking feeling jab mehnat toh ki par wrong topics pe. Completely blank hona natural hai us moment mein.
Everyone else finished exam in 2 hours. I'm still stuck on page 2 after 2.5 hours. Time khatam ho raha aur main peeche hoon.
Man, watching everyone leave while you're still stuck... that panic when clock is ticking and you're falling behind. Page 2 pe stuck aur time running out - that pressure multiplies the anxiety.
Kal results aa rahe hain. Pata hai fail ho gaya hoon. Parents ka reaction sochke hi darr lag raha. Kaise bataun unko.
Yaar... results kal aur certainty hai failure ki. Parents ka reaction imagine karte hi darr aa raha - wo conversation kitna heavy hoga. Anticipation of disappointment khud crush kar raha abhi se.
Mere haath itne pasine se bheeg gaye exam mein ki answer sheet gili ho gayi. Writing bhi smudge ho rahi thi. Panic se control nahi tha.
Uff yaar... pasina itna ki answer sheet hi gili ho gayi aur writing smudge. Physical anxiety symptoms ne practical problem create kar di. Control nahi tha body pe jab panic peak pe thi.
I studied all night but my mind went completely blank in the exam. Three hours of staring at paper. Couldn't write anything.
Damn... raat bhar padha but exam mein mind wiped clean. Three hours of blank staring when you knew the material hours ago. That mental block when pressure shuts down everything you prepared.
Teen exams back to back hain ek hi hafte mein. Ek ki taiyaari karo toh dusra pending. Kaise manage karun samajh nahi aa raha.

Yaar... teen exams ek hafte mein aur ek pe focus karo toh dusra suffer. Wo impossible juggle jab time physically kam padh jaye. Manage karna overwhelm feel ho raha kyunki har option mein kuch toh sacrifice hoga.
Exam ke baad doston se answers compare kiye. Mere sab galat the. Ab toh pakka fail. Depression mein aa gaya hoon.

Damn yaar... answers compare karne pe realize hua sab galat. Wo sinking feeling post-exam jab pata chale effort waste. Depression natural hai jab certainty ho failure ki. Exam khatam ho chuka hai ab - breathe le ek baar.
Mera pen exam mein kaam nahi kar raha tha. Spare nahi tha. 20 minutes waste ho gaye arrange karne mein. Time loss ho gaya.
Arre yaar... pen fail ho gaya aur 20 minutes panic mein waste arranging it. Wo technical glitch jo tumhari galti nahi par precious time cost kiya. Control mein nahi tha par consequence tumne bhugta.
Got accused of cheating in exam because I looked around nervously. Wasn't cheating, just anxious. Now under investigation.
Man, that's so unfair... anxiety mistaken for cheating. Nervous looking around became evidence against you. Now investigation adding stress when you were already struggling with exam anxiety itself.
Scholarship ke liye minimum 75% chahiye exam mein. Mere toh 60% bhi nahi aayenge lagta. Scholarship jayegi toh college afford nahi kar paunga.
Yaar... 75% threshold aur lagta 60% bhi nahi aayenge. Scholarship loss ka matlab college hi nahi continue kar paoge. Wo financial panic exam panic ke upar - stakes itne high hain ki pressure doubled.
Vomiting aa gayi exam se pehle tension ke maare. Exam hall mein weak feel ho raha tha.focus nahi kar paya.
Uff yaar... tension se vomiting aur phir weak body ke saath exam. Physically compromised state mein focus kaise hoga. Body literally reject kar rahi thi wo stress level.
Sab classmates achhe se prepare hain. Main akela hoon jo struggle kar raha. Exam mein sab jaldi finish kar ke nikal gaye. Main last tak baitha incompletely.
Yaar... sab prepared aur tu struggle - wo isolation. Sab jaldi finish karke nikle aur tu last tak incomplete paper ke saath. Comparison aur wo left alone feeling exam hall mein double painful hai.
My final exam decides if I graduate or repeat the year. So much pressure I can't think straight. One exam controlling my entire future.

Man, that's crushing... one exam between graduation and year repeat. Entire future riding on few hours. That pressure so immense thinking straight becomes impossible. Stakes this high parallyze instead of motivate.
Raat ko nightmares aa rahe hain exam fail hone ke. Neend mein bhi stress. Din bhar bhi exam ka darr. Escape nahi hai kahin se.
Damn yaar... neend mein nightmares aur din mein panic. Wo constant state of fear jahan koi break nahi. Mind ko rest ka space hi nahi mil raha - 24/7 exam terror mode.
Exam mein suddenly diarrhea ho gaya. Baar baar bathroom jaana pada. Time waste hua aur focus bhi gaya. Paper incomplete reh gaya.
Uff yaar... exam ke beech medical emergency aur baar baar bathroom. Time waste, focus break, aur incomplete paper. Physical issue jo control mein nahi tha par academic consequence directly tumpe.
Exam mein dekha mere bagal wali ne cheating ki. Mujhe bhi pakad liya invigilator ne. Maine nahi kiya par koi sun nahi raha.
Damn yaar... bagal wali ki cheating aur tumhe bhi pakda gaya jabki tumne nahi kiya. Wo injustice jab innocent ho par guilty treat ho rahe. Koi believe hi nahi kar raha tumhe.
Parents ne kaha agar fail hua toh ghar se nikal denge. Exam 2 din mein hai. Pressure se breathe nahi ho pa raha.
Yaar... ghar se nikalne ki dhamki aur do din mein exam. Wo threat literal hai aur pressure itna ki breathe bhi mushkil. Academic performance pe survival depend kar raha - that's suffocating.
I forgot everything I studied the moment I entered exam hall. Total blackout. Sat there crying for an hour.
Man, that total blackout moment... walked in knowing everything, exam hall door crosses and brain wipes clean. An hour of crying because nothing's coming back. That helpless terror is so real.
Supplementary exam hai next week. Pichli baar bhi supplementary mein fail ho gaya tha. Ab toh dar double ho gaya hai.
Uff yaar... supplementary aur pichli baar bhi supplementary mein fail. Wo pattern ka darr ki phir se same hoga. Double fear kyunki already ek baar experience kar chuke failure supplementary mein.
Exam ke pehle din subah se 5 baar bathroom ja chuka hoon. Stomach kharab ho gaya tension se. Hall mein kaise baithunga.
Damn yaar... 5 baar bathroom aur exam abhi baaki hai. Stomach literally revolt kar raha tension se. Hall mein baithne ka thought hi aur panic trigger kar raha kyunki physical control doubt hai.
Mere sab friends pass ho gaye. Main akela fail. Ab unke saath nahi rahungi same year mein. Isolation feel ho raha.
Yaar... sab friends aage nikal gaye aur tu akeli peeche. Same year se separate hona - wo isolation already feel ho raha future mein. Akeli reh jayegi jab sab move on kar gaye.
Exam mein time itna kam laga ki last 3 questions dekhe bhi nahi. 30 marks gone just like that.
Man, that time crunch panic... last 3 questions unseen means 30 marks automatically lost. Not even attempt karne ka chance mila. That helplessness when clock just runs out.
Calculator battery dead ho gaya exam ke beech. Maths paper tha. Mental calculation mein itna time laga ki half paper incomplete.
Arre yaar... calculator dead aur maths paper. Mental calculation force ho gaya jo naturally slow hai. Half paper incomplete kyunki ek technical issue ne pura flow disrupt kar diya.
Pichle saal fail hua tha same subject mein. Is saal bhi same questions nahi aa rahe jo maine prepare kiye. History repeat ho raha lagta.

Damn yaar... pichle saal ka trauma aur is saal bhi same pattern dikh raha - different questions aaye. Wo dj vu of failure approaching. History repeat hone ka darr real hai jab patterns match kar rahe.
My migraine started during exam. Vision blur ho gaya, couldn't read questions properly. Had to guess most answers.

Man, migraine hitting during exam... vision blur means questions bhi properly nahi padh paye. Guessing answers when you actually studied - that's brutal. Medical emergency but no pause button on exam.
Exam ke baad sir ne bola paper bohot kharab gaya sabka. Passing percentage kam hogi. Ab aur darr badh gaya result ka.
Uff yaar... exam deke aaya aur sir ne announce kar diya paper kharab gaya. Passing percentage kam - matlab already struggle kar rahe the ab cutoff bhi high. Result ka wait aur scary ho gaya.
Mere younger sibling ne same subject mein 95% laye the. Main pass hone ke liye bhi struggle kar raha. Comparison se pressure bohot hai.

Yaar... younger sibling 95% aur tu pass ke liye fight kar raha. Wo comparison constant reminder hai ki tum struggling ho jahan wo excel kiya. Family expectations aur pressure doubled ho jata comparison se.
Fire alarm rang during exam. Had to evacuate. Came back but lost all focus and momentum. Paper kharab ho gaya.
Damn... fire alarm disrupted everything mid-exam. Evacuation break means jo flow tha wo break ho gaya completely. Wapas aane pe focus aur momentum dono gone. Restart nahi ho paya mentally.
Exam se pehle dost ne bola yeh chapter important hai. Maine sirf wahi padha. Exam mein wo chapter hi nahi aaya. Betrayed feel ho raha.
Arre yaar... dost pe trust kiya aur sirf wo chapter padha. Exam mein wo nahi aaya toh puri strategy fail. Betrayed feel hona natural hai jab misguided information ne preparation waste kar di.
Results dekhe. 39% aaye. Passing 40% tha. Ek mark se fail. Ek mark ne poora year barbaad kar diya.
Damn yaar... 39% aur passing 40%. Ek mark ka difference aur poora year repeat. That's crushing - so close yet failed. One mark deciding entire year's fate feels so cruel.
Exam hall AC broken tha. 40 degree heat mein 3 hours. Pasina, exhaustion, couldn't concentrate at all.
Man, 40 degrees for three hours... AC broken means physical torture on top of exam stress. Pasina, exhaustion - body suffering so concentration impossible. Environmental torture nobody can control.
Maine essay question ko short answer samajh ke 2 lines mein answer kar diya. 20 marks ka question tha. Realize hua baad mein.
Uff yaar... essay question ko short answer type samjha aur 2 lines likhe. 20 marks gone kyunki format hi galat padh gaye panic mein. Baad mein realize hone pe wo regret crushing hai.
Pehli baar top karne ka chance tha. Exam mein overconfident ho gaya aur silly mistakes kar di. Ab average marks aayenge. Opportunity waste.

Yaar... top karne ka rare chance tha aur overconfidence ne silly mistakes karwa di. Average marks matlab opportunity lost. Wo regret jab pata ho tum better kar sakte the par complacency ne betray kiya.
Period started unexpectedly during exam. No supplies with me. Had to manage with tissue. Pain and embarrassment both ruined focus.
Man, that's so hard... unexpected period during exam with no supplies. Managing with tissue, dealing with pain and embarrassment simultaneously. Focus kaise hoga when body crisis mode mein hai.
Exam mein invigilator mere paas hi khada reh gaya pura time. Uski presence se nervous ho gaya. Concentrate nahi ho paya properly.

Damn yaar... invigilator tumhare paas hi khada pura time. Wo constant watching presence ne nervous kar diya. Concentrate kaise karo jab feel ho raha constantly observed ho. That pressure unnecessary tha.
Exam ke din period cramps itne zyada the ki concentrate nahi ho paya. Painkillers bhi kaam nahi kiye. Paper kharab gaya.
Yaar... cramps so bad painkillers bhi fail. Exam mein concentrate kaise karogi jab body hi torture mode mein. That's brutal timing.
Classmate whispered answers during exam. I refused. He got caught and blamed me too. Now both under investigation.
Man, you did the right thing and still got dragged in. He blamed you to save himself. That betrayal when honesty gets punished.
Raat bhar jaag ke padha. Exam hall mein so gaya 30 minutes ke liye. Uth ke dekha sab finish kar chuke. Main peeche reh gaya.
Damn yaar... exhaustion ne exam hall mein hi sone pe force kar diya. 30 minutes gone aur sab aage nikal gaye. That moment of waking up to lost time - crushing.
Mere naam ki spelling exam sheet pe galat print ho gayi. Invigilator ko samjhane mein 15 minutes waste. Panic ho gaya.
Arre yaar... naam ki spelling galat aur 15 minutes explaining. Wo panic jab technical error tumhara time kha jaye. Control mein nahi tha par loss tumhara.
Failed exam. Now have to face relatives at family function tomorrow. Everyone will ask about results. Want to disappear.
Yaar, that dread... facing relatives after failing. Har koi poochega results aur tu explain karega failure. That public shame at family function is terrifying.
Exam mein opticals bhool gaya ghar pe. Board pe kuch dikhai nahi diya clearly. Instructions miss ho gaye shayad.
Uff... opticals bhool gaye aur board blur. Instructions clearly nahi dikhe matlab possibility hai galat samjhe. Simple mistake, major consequences.
My anxiety medication makes me drowsy. Took it before exam thinking it'll help. Instead dozed off multiple times. Ruined paper.
Man... medication to calm anxiety but drowsiness ruined everything. Dozed off when you needed to be sharp. That backfire hurts.
Pichle 5 exams mein fail ho chuka. Ye 6th attempt hai. Lagta hi nahi ab kabhi pass hounga. Hopeless feel kar raha.
Yaar... 5 failures already aur ye 6th attempt. That pattern making you believe kabhi nahi hoga. Hope khatam ho raha repeated failure se. I feel you.
Exam hall mein nosebleed shuru ho gaya achanak. Tissue nahi tha. Bahar jane mein time waste. Sab dekh rahe the. Embarrassing aur stressful dono.
Damn yaar... nosebleed out of nowhere, no tissue, public moment. Time loss aur embarrassment dono. Body literally betraying you in worst timing.
Teacher said paper was easy. Everyone nodding. Maine toh mushkil laga bohot. Ab lagta main hi stupid hoon.
Yaar... sab ko easy laga aur tumhe difficult. Wo isolation jab everyone else found it simple. Stupid nahi ho - everyone's different.
Wrote entire 10-mark answer in wrong question number. Realized at last minute. No time to rewrite. 10 marks gone.
Man, wrong question number aur realize at the end. 10 marks lost in numbering error. No time to fix. That sinking realization is brutal.
Exam se pehle coffee pi panic mein. Stomach kharab ho gaya. Baar baar bathroom jana pada. Focus zero.
Uff... coffee calming ke liye pi aur ulta stomach upset. Bathroom trips broke focus completely. Body cooperate nahi kar rahi jab zaroorat thi.
Best friend scored 98%. I got 45%. Can't even be happy for them. Jealousy aur guilt dono feel ho rahi.
Yaar... best friend 98% aur tu 45%. Happy hona chahiye par jealousy aur guilt mix ho gaye. That conflict when their win highlights your struggle. Real feelings hai.
Earthquake drill during exam. Evacuation happened. Lost my flow completely. Couldn't restart mentally when came back.
Damn... earthquake drill broke everything. Flow gone, mental reset impossible. Kaise restart karo jab momentum crash ho chuka.
Mere paas dysgraphia hai. Writing speed bohot slow. Exam mein half paper incomplete reh gaya despite knowing answers.
Yaar... dysgraphia means physically slow aur exam doesn't accommodate. Answers pata the par likhne ki speed ne betray kiya. System tumhare against hai.
Parents borrowed money from relatives for my coaching. Failed again. Now relatives taunting them. Guilt crushing me.
Man, that guilt is so heavy... parents borrowed money, you failed, now relatives taunting. Financial debt aur emotional debt dono. You're carrying their sacrifice and disappointment both.
Exam mein sir ne continuously mere paas chakkar lagaya. Lagta usko doubt hai mujhpe. Pressure se haath kaamp gaye.
Damn yaar... sir continuously hovering, suspicion clear. Haath kaampne lage pressure se. Innocent ho par treated like cheater. That anxiety doubles.
Syllabus last minute change hua. Maine purana pattern se prepare kiya tha. Exam mein naye pattern ke questions. Completely lost.
Arre yaar... last minute syllabus change aur tumne purana pattern se prepare kiya. Exam mein completely different. Wo betrayal jab rules change ho jayein suddenly.
Got my period day before exam. Heavy flow, severe cramps, couldn't sleep. Went to exam exhausted and in pain. Barely wrote anything.
Man... severe cramps, no sleep, heavy flow aur still dragged yourself to exam. Exhausted aur in pain - kaise likhogi. Body suffering but no mercy in system.
Exam results dekhe. Sab dost celebrate kar rahe pass hone pe. Main akela chup baitha. Unke saamne rona bhi nahi aa sakta. Andar se toot gaya.
Yaar... sab celebrate kar rahe aur tu silent failure ke saath. Rona bhi nahi sakte unke saamne. Andar se toot gaye par facade maintain karna pad raha. That loneliness hurts deep.
Exam mein answer yaad tha par English mein likhne mein struggle ho gayi. Hindi medium se aaya hoon. Marks kam aayenge pakka.
Yaar... answer pata tha par language barrier ne rok diya. Hindi medium background aur English compulsory - wo struggle real hai. Translation mein kitna time lag gaya?
Roommate committed suicide last month due to exam failure. Same exam maine bhi diya aaj. Uski yaad aati rahi. Concentrate nahi ho paya.
Man, that's so heavy... roommate ko kho diya exam failure se aur aaj same exam diya. Uski yaad haunting you throughout. How can anyone focus carrying that trauma.
Paper leak ho gaya tha. College ne exam cancel karke reschedule kiya. Maine pehle wale date ke liye prepare kiya tha. Ab time nahi bacha.
Damn yaar... paper leak ki wajah se reschedule aur tumhara pura schedule ulta. Prepare the par ab time nahi. Dusron ki galti ka consequence tum bhugat rahe.
I have severe test anxiety. Threw up twice before entering exam hall. Went in shaking. Couldn't hold pen properly first 30 minutes.
Bro... threw up twice aur phir bhi gaye. Shaking so bad pen pakadna mushkil. That physical terror - 30 minutes gone just stabilizing. You still showed up though.
Mere chashme ka frame toot gaya exam se pehle. Tape se jugaad kiya par baar baar girta tha. Distraction bohot hua.
Uff yaar... chashma toota aur tape jugaad. Baar baar girna matlab constant distraction. Dekhna hi mushkil ho gaya properly.
Scholarship renew karne ke liye 70% chahiye tha. 68% aaye. 2% ki wajah se scholarship gayi. Ab afford nahi kar sakta college.
Damn... 68% aur chahiye the 70%. DO percent. Scholarship gayi aur ab college afford nahi kar sakte. That's crushing - so close par future risk mein.
My father is in ICU. Exam bhi important tha. Hospital aur exam hall ke beech divided. Neither place mein pura dhyan de paya.
Man, that's heartbreaking... father ICU mein aur tumhe exam dena pada. Divided between life and death situation and academic obligation. How can anyone focus in that state.
Syllabus ke chapter 5 se 10 padhe the maine. Exam mein 1 se 4 se hi saare questions aaye. Complete mismatch.
Damn yaar... 5-10 prepare kiye aur 1-4 se questions. Complete mismatch. Effort toh lagai par direction galat. Wo sinking feeling jab paper dekhke realize hua.
Invigilator ne mera phone confiscate kar liya although it was switched off in bag. Zero tolerance policy. Now under academic misconduct case.
Man, phone switched off tha bag mein par confiscate. Zero tolerance matlab no hearing. Ab misconduct case. Rules itne strict ki context doesn't matter.
Mera panic attack itna bura tha exam mein ki ambulance bulani padi. Sabke saamne stretcher pe le gaye. Embarrassment aur failure dono.
Yaar... panic attack so severe ambulance aaya. Stretcher pe sabke saamne le gaye. Medical emergency par embarrassment bhi. Exam fail aur public episode dono.
Exam ke pehle positive affirmations try kiye. Meditation bhi kiya. Phir bhi hall mein jaate hi sab blank. Kuch kaam nahi aaya.
Uff yaar... affirmations, meditation sab try kiya. Phir bhi hall mein blank. Wo helplessness jab preparation ke saath coping bhi try karo par anxiety still wins.
Teacher ne galat answer key upload kar di. Mere sab answers wo key ke according the. Ab sab galat show ho rahe re-evaluation mein.
Damn... teacher ki galat answer key aur tumne ussi ke according likha. Ab re-evaluation mein sab wrong. Unki mistake tumhara result barbaad kar raha. Kya correction hoga?
Pariksha mein achanak batti chali gayi. Generator aane mein 20 minute lage. Andhere mein baitha raha. Pura flow kharab ho gaya.
Arre... batti gayi aur 20 minute andhere mein. Generator aane tak flow toot gaya pura. Dubara shuru karna kitna mushkil hota hai. Samay bhi barbad hua.
Construction noise outside exam hall was so loud couldn't concentrate. Complained but nothing happened. Lost so much focus.
Man, construction noise drilling through exam. Complained par no action. Environment hostile but exam continues. How are you supposed to focus in that chaos.
Mere dost ne exam se ek din pehle suicide kar li result ke darr se. Main bhi same exam de raha tha. Trauma mein hoon. Focus zero.
Yaar... dost suicide kar liya exam ke darr se. Tum same exam de rahe trauma ke saath. That fear - kahi same na ho jaye. Loss aur terror dono. Are you okay right now?
Mere answer sheet ke 2 pages stapler se lag nahi rahe the. Examiner ne notice nahi kiya. Wo pages missing count ho gaye checking mein.
Arre yaar... pages stapler se loose the aur checking mein missing count. Technical error par marks loss. Kya recheck request kar sakte ho?
I have IBS. Exam stress triggers it badly. Spent half the exam time in bathroom. Incomplete paper obviously.
Man... IBS triggered by stress aur exam hai ultimate stress. Half time bathroom mein matlab half paper incomplete. Medical condition but system has zero accommodation.
Exam mein suddenly lights chale gaye. 20 minutes power cut. Andhere mein kuch nahi dekh paya. Time waste aur panic dono.
Damn yaar... lights gone aur 20 minutes andhere mein. Kuch nahi dikh raha, time waste ho raha. Power cut ka control nahi par consequence tumhara. Panic toh hogi hi.
Pariksha hall mein AC itna tez tha ki thand se haath jam gaye. Likhne mein takleef ho rahi thi. Complaint kiya par kuch nahi hua.
Uff... AC itna tez ki haath jam gaye thand se. Likhna mushkil ho gaya. Complaint bhi kari par koi sunega nahi. Sharir cooperate nahi kar raha tha.
My cousin scored 99% in same exam last year. Family keeps comparing. Pressure is suffocating. Got 65% and they're all disappointed.
Man... cousin 99% aur tum 65%. Family comparison making you feel inadequate. 65% is decent but measured against 99% it feels like failure. That suffocation from constant comparison.
Exam ke baad pata chala OMR sheet mein galat bubbles fill kar diye. Sab answers sahi the par marking galat. Poora paper fail.
Yaar... sab answers sahi par OMR bubbles galat. Wo realization ke baad ka pain - mehnat sab thi par ek technical error ne barbaad kar diya. That's heartbreaking.
My hands shake uncontrollably during exams. Handwriting becomes illegible. Teacher can't read answers so marks zero despite writing correct things.

Man, that's so frustrating... anxiety making your hands shake so bad the writing becomes unreadable. Correct answers but zero marks because teacher can't decipher it. Your body betraying you when you need it most.
Mere younger brother ne same age mein IIT crack kar liya tha. Main simple college exam bhi clear nahi kar pa raha. Sharam aati hai.
Yaar... younger brother IIT crack kiya aur tu college exam mein struggle. Wo comparison constant reminder hai ki tum peeche ho. Sharam natural hai par unfair bhi - everyone's path different hai.
Pariksha mein achanak chakkar aane lage. Behosh hone wala tha. Bahar jana pada. Kagaz adhura rah gaya.
Arre... chakkar aaye aur behosh hone laga. Bahar jana pada bachne ke liye. Kagaz adhura par kya karte - sharir ne force kiya. Medical emergency thi wo.
Exam hall mein kisi ka phone baj gaya. Invigilator ne sab ke bags check kiye. 30 minutes waste ho gaye. Mera flow completely break ho gaya.
Damn yaar... kisi aur ka phone par sabka bags check. 30 minutes everyone ka waste kyunki ek person ki galti. Tumhara flow toot gaya bina tumhari galti ke. Collective punishment.
I got my period unexpectedly during exam. Heavy flow, leaked through clothes. Spent rest of exam worried about stain. Couldn't focus at all.

Man, that's awful... unexpected period, heavy flow, and visible leak. The embarrassment taking over your focus completely. How are you supposed to concentrate on exam when dealing with that panic and discomfort.
Mere dost sab pass ho gaye. Main akela repeat kar raha. Unke WhatsApp group se bhi nikaal diya kyunki ab different batch mein hoon. Lonely feel ho raha.
Yaar, that loneliness cuts deep... sab aage badhe aur tumhe group se bhi nikal diya. Academic failure ne social circle bhi tod di. Left behind academically aur socially dono. That isolation is real.
Exam mein essay question ko one-word answer samajh liya. Pura essay worth 25 marks sirf ek word likha. Baad mein realize hua.
Uff yaar... essay question ko one-word samjha aur 25 marks gone. Baad mein realization ka wo moment - gut-wrenching hota hai. Misread karna panic mein easy hai par loss heavy.
Mere anxiety se sar mein dard itna badh gaya exam mein ki ulti ho gayi. Hall se bahar jana pada. Paper incomplete.
Damn yaar... anxiety se headache itna severe ki ulti. Hall chhod ke jana pada. Physical symptoms ne academic performance directly sabotage kar di. Body literally couldn't take the stress.
Teacher said this exam was easy compared to last year. Everyone agreeing. I found it impossible. Feel so dumb and alone.

Man, everyone saying easy and you found it impossible... that isolation when you're the only one struggling. Makes you question yourself, feel dumb when maybe the exam just didn't click for you. You're not alone in feeling that way.
Pariksha se pehle ghar pe jhagda hua parents ke saath. Gusse aur udaasi mein exam hall gaya. Dhyaan kahan se lagau - dimag ghar pe atka tha.
Yaar... ghar pe jhagda aur phir turant exam. Gussa aur udaasi leke hall gaye - dhyaan kaise lagega jab emotions raw hain. Dimag emotionally wahi atka raha. Timing itni kharab thi.
Mera best friend exam ke pehle din suicide attempt kiya. Hospital mein hai. Main exam dene gaya par dimag wahi tha. Kuch nahi likh paya.

Yaar, that's terrifying... best friend hospital mein suicide attempt ke baad aur tumhe exam dena pada. Dimag kaise exam pe rahega jab best friend life-death situation mein. That trauma while trying to write exam - impossible hai.
Exam center mera ghar se 50km door tha. Traffic mein fas gaya. 45 minutes late pahuncha. Entry nahi di. Automatic fail.
Damn yaar... 50km door center aur traffic ne pakda liya. 45 min late aur entry denied. Automatic fail jabki control tumhare haath mein nahi tha. That's so unfair.
I have dyslexia. Reading questions takes me double the time. No extra time given. Always run out of time despite knowing answers.

Man, dyslexia means you need more time to read but system gives zero accommodation. Knowing answers but time runs out because reading itself is a challenge. That's discrimination - disability not being accommodated.
Exam mein invigilator ne continuously mujhe suspicious nazar se dekha. Maine kuch galat nahi kiya par uski nazar se nervous ho gaya. Haath kaampne lage.
Uff yaar... suspicious nazar continuous aur tumne kuch kiya bhi nahi. Innocent ho par treated like criminal. Nervous hoke haath kaampne lage - that pressure unfair tha completely.
Mere parents ne ghar girana bech diya meri coaching fees ke liye. Fail ho gaya. Unka sacrifice waste ho gaya. Guilt crushing me.

Yaar, that guilt is unbearable... ghar girana becha tumhare liye aur fail ho gaye. Their sacrifice so huge aur result zero. Wo weight of letting them down - that's crushing your soul. I can feel that pain.
Got diagnosed with depression after multiple exam failures. On medication now but it makes me drowsy. Can't study effectively anymore. Stuck in cycle.

Man, that vicious cycle... exam failures triggered depression, medication helps mentally but kills focus physically. Can't study effectively so more failure risk. Trapped between mental health and academic performance - both suffering.
Exam hall mein AC nahi tha. 42 degree heat. Pasina se answer sheet gili ho gayi. Writing smudge ho raha tha. 3 hours torture tha.
Damn yaar... 42 degree mein 3 ghante bina AC. Pasina se sheet gili aur writing smudge. Physical torture ke saath exam dena - that's inhumane. Environment hi against tha tumhare.
Kal exam hai aur kuch bhi yaad nahi ho raha. Raat bhar padha par dimag blank hai. Lagta fail ho jaaunga.
Are yaar... raat bhar padha aur abhi bhi kuch nahi aa raha dimag mein. Frustrating hai na. Bol bata, konsa subject hai kal ka? Aur specifically kya hai jo nahi aa raha?
Physics hai. Formulae yaad nahi ho rahe bilkul. Poori raat cramming ki par dimag accept nahi kar raha.

Physics practical subject hai mere dost, cramming se formulae yaad nahi hote. Abhi ek kaam kar - jo formulae most important hain wo likh le ek kagaz pe aur har formula pe 2-3 numerical solve kar le. Hands-on karne se yaad ho jaayenge kal tak. Kal hai abhi bhi time hai.
Exam hall mein panic attack aa gaya. Haath kaamp rahe, pen pakad nahi pa raya. Sabne dekha. Embarrassing tha.
Are yaar... panic attack hua toh haath kaampna toh hoga hi na. Wo moment sabke saamne kitna uncomfortable hota hai. Bata, pehle bhi aisa hua hai kabhi exam mein?
Haan pichle semester bhi hua tha. Tab bhi paper incomplete reh gaya. Ab darr lagta hai exam hall dekhke hi.

Dekh yaar, ye body ka natural response hai jab itna darr hota hai. Abhi ek kaam kar - next exam ke pehle hall mein ja aur wahan baithke comfortable feel karne de apne aap ko. Familiarity se darr kam hoga. Poori abhi se prepare karne ka time hai.
Failed the same exam for the third time. My parents stopped talking to me. Feel like such a disappointment.

Yaar, three times same exam aur parents silent... that's really painful. Mujhe bata, what exactly is going wrong in the exam? Is it the concepts or is it something else happening during the exam itself?
I understand the concepts in class but the moment I enter the exam hall everything disappears. Blank out completely every single time.

Okay yaar so it's not about knowledge at all - it's the exam hall pressure wiping everything. That's very common actually. Concepts clear hain toh exam mein problem nahi hai, problem is in the environment. Next attempt mein practice writing under timed conditions at home - brain will learn to work under that pressure. You know the material, yaar.
Teen exams ek hafte mein hain. Ek bhi properly prepare nahi kar paya. Sab fail honge lagta hai.
Are yaar teen exams ek hafte mein... toh pehle yeh bata ki sabse pehle kaunsa hai aur uske baare mein kitna pending hai? Dekhte hain kitna cover ho sakta hai.
Kal hai pehla - Chemistry. Usmein almost kuch nahi aata. Baaki do exams 4 aur 6 din baad hain.

Okay mere dost, toh Chemistry kal hai - abhi focus sirf uspe karte hain. Baaki do exams abhi door hain, unke baare mein later sochna. Chemistry mein kaunse chapters most important hain? Sirf wo karo aaj raat - high scoring chapters pe focus karo, poora syllabus nahi hai time.
Neend nahi aa rahi exam ke darr se. 3 baj gaye raat ko aur abhi tak jaag raha hoon. Subah exam hai.
Are yaar 3 baj gaye aur neend nahi... exam ka darr literally neend nahi aane de raha. Bata, subah kitne baje hai exam? Abhi bhi kuch time hai sone ka shayad.
9 baje hai. Aankh band karte hi exam ke questions saamne aa jaate hain. Body thaki hui hai par dimag shut off nahi ho raha.

Dekh yaar, 9 baje hai matlab abhi bhi 5-6 ghante hain sone ke. Padhai chhod de ab - dimag already exhausted hai. Andhera karna, phone side pe rakhna, aur bas lait ja. Neend nahi aayegi toh bhi rest mein body recharge ho raha hai. Exam ke liye fresh mind zyada important hai.
Exam mein galat question number pe answer likh diya. Poora 15 marks ka answer wrong section mein tha. Realize hua last minute.
Are yaar... 15 marks ka answer galat question pe. Wo realization ka moment kitna painful hota hai. Bata, exam khatam hua ya abhi chal raha hai?
Khatam ho gaya tha. 2 minute bache the. Kuch nahi kar sakta tha. Ab results ka wait kar raha hoon.

Yaar dekh, kuch examiner allow karte hain ki agar answer sahi section mein hai with reference toh marks dete hain. Result aane pe dekhna - thoda chance hai. Par abhi kya karte hain - results tak worrying se kuch nahi badlega. Abhi bas ek ek din lete hain.
My final year exam determines my entire career. GATE score matters. If I fail, placement dreams end. Pressure is killing me.
Yaar, GATE pressure is real... career feeling like it's on one exam is heavy. Let me understand - when is your exam and how much have you prepared so far?
Tomorrow morning. Haven't slept in two days. Hands trembling constantly. Feel like my body is shutting down.

Okay yaar, listen - two days without sleep, body shutting down. First thing - stop studying right now. Seriously. Exhausted brain retains nothing anyway. Lie down, close your eyes. Even if sleep doesn't come, rest will help tomorrow. You've prepared, trust that. One exam doesn't end everything.
Meri maa beemar hai. Hospital mein admit hain. Aur kal mera important exam hai. Dono taraf dhyan nahi de pa raha.
Are yaar... maa hospital mein aur kal exam. Dono taraf divided feel ho raha hoga. Bata, maa ki condition kaisi hai? Aur koi hai ghar pe unke saath?
Papa unke saath hain hospital mein. Par main worried hoon. Raat bhar neend nahi ayi unki chinta mein. Exam ki taiyaari bhi nahi ho paya properly.

Dekh yaar, Papa unke saath hain - maa akeli nahi hain. Ab tu apna dhyan rakh. Aaj raat thodi rest le, neend nahi aayegi par body ko lie down do. Kal exam de - maa chahenge ki tu apna best de. Unke liye bhi ek step forward le.
Pariksha kal hai aur mujhe bilkul samajh nahi aa raha trigonometry. Teacher ne bhi bol diya hai ki main fail ho jaaunga.

Are yaar, teacher ne aisa bola toh kitna demotivating hoga na. Par dekh, trigonometry mushkil lagta hai par samajhne pe aata hai. Bata, kaun sa part samajh nahi aa raha - basic identities ya applications?
Applications bilkul nahi samajh rahe. Identities thodi thodi samajh mein aa rahe hain.

Acha mere dost, toh identities base hai tumhara. Abhi ek kaam karo - sirf 5 basic identities yaad karo aur har identity ke liye ek example solve karo. Applications automatically samajh aayenge jab identity clear hogi. Teacher galat hai - ek raat mein bhi basics strong ho sakte hain.
Result aaya. Failed by 2 marks. Passing was 40, I got 38. Feel like dying honestly.
Yaar, 2 marks... that's so frustrating. So close and still failed. That feeling is real. Tell me, is there a recheck or appeal option available?
Yes recheck is there but costs 500 rupees. Don't have that much money right now. Parents will be upset if I ask.

Yaar 2 marks ka difference hai - recheck worth it hai bilkul. 500 rupees mein future save ho sakta hai. Friends se maang lo temporarily, ya college mein koi financial aid option hoga. This is too close to give up on. Recheck karna zaroori hai.
Exam mein 2 ghante se zyada baitha raha par kuch nahi likh paya. Blank tha completely. Examiner ne bhi pucha ki kya ho raha hai.
Are yaar... 2 ghante blank baithna kitna helpless feel karata hai. Examiner ne bhi notice kiya. Bata, exam khatam hua? Aur ye pehli baar hua hai aisa?
Haan khatam ho gaya blank paper de diya. Pehli baar nahi hai - har exam mein aisa hota hai. Lagta mujhe nahi aata exam dena at all.
